 14334                                  
 14335                                  ;Break	<LRUFCB - perform LRU on FCB sfts>
 14336                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14337                                  ;
 14338                                  ;   LRUFCB - find LRU fcb in cache. Set ThisSFT and return it. We preserve
 14339                                  ;	the first keepcount sfts if they are network sfts or if sharing is
 14340                                  ;	loaded.  If carry is set then NO BLASTING is NECESSARY.
 14341                                  ;
 14342                                  ;   Inputs:	none
 14343                                  ;   Outputs:	ES:DI point to SFT
 14344                                  ;		ThisSFT points to SFT
 14345                                  ;		SFT is zeroed
 14346                                  ;		Carry set of closes failed
 14347                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 14348                                  ;
 14349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14350                                  ;
 14351                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 14352                                  ;IF 0	; rewritten this routine
 14353                                  ;
 14354                                  ;LRUFCB: ; MSDOS 3.3 - IBMDOS.COM (1987) - Offset 25ADh
 14355                                  ;	call	save_world
 14356                                  ;	
 14357                                  ; Find nth oldest NET/SHARE FCB. We want to find its age for the second scan
 14358                                  ; to find the lease recently used one that is younger than the open age.  We
 14359                                  ; operate be scanning the list n times finding the least age that is greater
 14360                                  ; or equal to the previous minimum age.
 14361                                  ;
 14362                                  ;   BP is the count of times we need to go through this loop.
 14363                                  ;   AX is the current acceptable minimum age to consider
 14364                                  ;
 14365                                  ;	mov	bp,[CS:KEEPCOUNT]	; k = keepcount;
 14366                                  ;	XOR	AX,AX			; low = 0;
 14367                                  ;
 14368                                  ; If we've scanned the table n times, then we are done.
 14369                                  ;
 14370                                  ;lru1:
 14371                                  ;	CMP	bp,0			; while (k--) {
 14372                                  ;	JZ	short lru75
 14373                                  ;	DEC	bp
 14374                                  ;
 14375                                  ; Set up for scan.
 14376                                  ;
 14377                                  ;   AX is the minimum age for consideration
 14378                                  ;   BX is the minimum age found during the scan
 14379                                  ;   SI is the position of the entry that corresponds to BX
 14380                                  ;
 14381                                  ;	MOV	BX,-1			;     min = 0xffff;
 14382                                  ;	MOV	si,BX			;     pos = 0xffff;
 14383                                  ;	LES	DI,[CS:SFTFCB]		;     for (CX=FCBCount; CX>0; CX--)
 14384                                  ;	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14385                                  ;	MOV	CX,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]
 14386                                  ;	;lea	di,[di+6]
 14387                                  ;	LEA	DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]
 14388                                  ;
 14389                                  ; Innermost loop.  If the current entry is free, then we are done.  Or, if the
 14390                                  ; current entry is busy (indicating a previous aborted allocation), then we
 14391                                  ; are done.  In both cases, we use the found entry.
 14392                                  ;
 14393                                  ;lru2:
 14394                                  ;	cmp	word [es:di],0
 14395                                  ;	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0
 14396                                  ;	jz	short lru25
 14397                                  ;	;cmp	word [es:di],-1
 14398                                  ;	;cmp	word [es:di+SFT_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy
 14399                                  ;	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy
 14400                                  ;	jnz	short lru3
 14401                                  ;
 14402                                  ; The entry is usable without further scan.  Go and use it.
 14403                                  ;
 14404                                  ;lru25:
 14405                                  ;	MOV	si,DI			;	      pos = i;
 14406                                  ;	JMP	short lru11		;	      goto got;
 14407                                  ;
 14408                                  ; See if the entry is for the network or for the sharer.
 14409                                  ;
 14410                                  ;  If for the sharer or network then
 14411                                  ;	if the age < current minimum AND >= allowed minimum then
 14412                                  ;	    this entry becomes current minimum
 14413                                  ;
 14414                                  ;lru3:
 14415                                  ;	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14416                                  ;	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet 
 14417                                  ;					;	  if (!net[i]
 14418                                  ;	JNZ	short lru35
 14419                                  ;if installed
 14420                                  ;	call	CheckShare		;		&& !sharing)
 14421                                  ;	JZ	short lru5		;	  else
 14422                                  ;ENDIF
 14423                                  ;
 14424                                  ; This SFT is for the net or is for the sharer. See if it less than the
 14425                                  ; current minimum.
 14426                                  ;
 14427                                  ;lru35:
 14428                                  ;	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 14429                                  ;	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+sf_OpenAge]
 14430                                  ;	CMP	DX,AX			;	  if (age[i] >= low &&
 14431                                  ;	JB	short lru5
 14432                                  ;	CMP	DX,BX
 14433                                  ;	JAE	short lru5		;	      age[i] < min) {
 14434                                  ;
 14435                                  ; entry is new minimum.  Remember his age.
 14436                                  ;
 14437                                  ;	mov	bx,DX			;	      min = age[i];
 14438                                  ;	mov	si,di			;	      pos = i;
 14439                                  ;
 14440                                  ; End of loop.	gp back for more
 14441                                  ;
 14442                                  ;lru5:
 14443                                  ;	;add	di,53
 14444                                  ;	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size
 14445                                  ;	loop	lru2			;	      }
 14446                                  ;
 14447                                  ; The scan is complete. If we have successfully found a new minimum (pos != -1)
 14448                                  ; set then threshold value to this new minimum + 1. Otherwise, the scan is
 14449                                  ; complete.  Go find LRU.
 14450                                  ;
 14451                                  ;lru6:	
 14452                                  ;	cmp	si,-1			; position not -1?
 14453                                  ;	jz	short lru75		; no, done with everything
 14454                                  ;	lea	ax,[bx+1]		; set new threshold age
 14455                                  ;	jmp	short lru1		; go and loop for more
 14456                                  ;lru65:	
 14457                                  ;	stc
 14458                                  ;	jmp	short LRUDead		;	  return -1;
 14459                                  ;
 14460                                  ; Main loop is done. We have AX being the age+1 of the nth oldest sharer or
 14461                                  ; network entry. We now make a second pass through to find the LRU entry
 14462                                  ; that is local-no-share or has age >= AX
 14463                                  ;
 14464                                  ;lru75:
 14465                                  ;	mov	bx,-1			; min = 0xffff;
 14466                                  ;	mov	si,bx			; pos = 0xffff;
 14467                                  ;	LES	DI,[CS:SFTFCB]		; for (CX=FCBCount; CX>0; CX--)
 14468                                  ;	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14469                                  ;	MOV	CX,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]
 14470                                  ;	;lea	di,[di+6]
 14471                                  ;	LEA	DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]
 14472                                  ;
 14473                                  ; If this is is local-no-share then go check for LRU else if age >= threshold
 14474                                  ; then check for lru.
 14475                                  ;
 14476                                  ;lru8:
 14477                                  ;	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14478                                  ;	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 14479                                  ;	jnz	short lru85		; is for network, go check age
 14480                                  ;	call	CheckShare		; sharer here?
 14481                                  ;	jz	short lru86		; no, go check lru
 14482                                  ;
 14483                                  ; Network or sharer.  Check age
 14484                                  ;
 14485                                  ;lru85:
 14486                                  ;	;cmp	[es:di+17h],ax
 14487                                  ;	cmp	[es:di+sf_OpenAge],ax
 14488                                  ;	jb	short lru9		; age is before threshold, skip it
 14489                                  ;
 14490                                  ; Check LRU
 14491                                  ;
 14492                                  ;lru86:
 14493                                  ;	;cmp	[es:di+15h],bx
 14494                                  ;	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],bx	; is LRU less than current LRU?
 14495                                  ;	jae	short lru9		; no, skip this
 14496                                  ;	mov	si,di			; remember position
 14497                                  ;	;mov	bx,[es:di+15h]
 14498                                  ;	mov	bx,[es:di+sf_LRU]	; remember new minimum LRU
 14499                                  ;
 14500                                  ; Done with this entry, go back for more.
 14501                                  ;
 14502                                  ;lru9:
 14503                                  ;	;add	di, 53
 14504                                  ;	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size
 14505                                  ;	loop	lru8
 14506                                  ;
 14507                                  ; Scan is complete. If we found NOTHING that satisfied us then we bomb
 14508                                  ; out. The conditions here are:
 14509                                  ;
 14510                                  ;  No local-no-shares AND all net/share entries are older than threshold
 14511                                  ;
 14512                                  ;lru10:
 14513                                  ;	cmp	si,-1			; if no one f
 14514                                  ;	jz	short lru65		;     return -1;
 14515                                  ;lru11:
 14516                                  ;	mov	di,si
 14517                                  ;	MOV	[CS:THISSFT],DI		; set thissft
 14518                                  ;	MOV	[CS:THISSFT+2],ES
 14519                                  ;
 14520                                  ; If we have sharing or thisSFT is a net sft, then close it until ref count
 14521                                  ; is 0.
 14522                                  ;
 14523                                  ;	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14524                                  ;	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 14525                                  ;	JNZ	short LRUClose
 14526                                  ;IF INSTALLED
 14527                                  ;	call	CheckShare
 14528                                  ;	JZ	short LRUDone
 14529                                  ;ENDIF
 14530                                  ;
 14531                                  ; Repeat close until ref count is 0
 14532                                  ;
 14533                                  ;LRUClose:
 14534                                  ;	push	ss
 14535                                  ;	pop	ds
 14536                                  ;	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 14537                                  ;	cmp     word [es:di],0
 14538                                  ;	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SFT.sf_ref_count],0 ; is ref count still <> 0?
 14539                                  ;	JZ	short LRUDone 		; nope, all done
 14540                                  ;	call	DOS_CLOSE
 14541                                  ;	jnc	short LRUClose		; no error => clean up
 14542                                  ;	;cmp	al,6
 14543                                  ;	cmp	al,error_invalid_handle
 14544                                  ;	jz	short LRUClose
 14545                                  ;	stc
 14546                                  ;	JMP	short LRUDead
 14547                                  ;LRUDone:
 14548                                  ;	XOR	AL,AL
 14549                                  ;	call	BlastSFT		; fill SFT with 0 (AL), 'C' cleared
 14550                                  ;
 14551                                  ;LRUDead:
 14552                                  ;	call	restore_world
 14553                                  ;	LES     DI,[CS:THISSFT]
 14554                                  ;	jnc	short LRUFCB_retn
 14555                                  ;LRUFCB_err:
 14556                                  ;	; mov	al, 23h	
 14557                                  ;	MOV	AL,error_FCB_unavailable
 14558                                  ;LRUFCB_retn:	
 14559                                  ;	retn:
 14560                                  ;
 14561                                  ;ENDIF	; LRUFCB has been rewritten below.
 14562                                  
 14563                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14564                                  ; LRUFCB for MSDOS 6.0 !
 14565                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14566                                  ;
 14567                                  ; LruFCB -- allocate the LRU SFT from the SFT Table. The LRU scheme
 14568                                  ; maintains separate counts for net/Share and local SFTs. We allocate a 
 14569                                  ; net/Share SFT only if we do not find a local SFT. This helps keep
 14570                                  ; net/Share SFTs which cannot be regenerated for as long as possible. We
 14571                                  ; optimize regeneration operations by keeping track of the current local
 14572                                  ; SFT. This avoids scanning of the SFTs as long as we have at least one 
 14573                                  ; local SFT in the SFT Block.
 14574                                  ;
 14575                                  ; Inputs: al = 0 => Regenerate SFT operation
 14576                                  ;	    = 1 => Allocate new SFT for Open/Create
 14577                                  ;
 14578                                  ; Outputs: Carry clear
 14579                                  ;	 	es:di = Address of allocated SFT
 14580                                  ;	  	ThisSFT = Address of allocated SFT
 14581                                  ;
 14582                                  ;	  carry set if closes of net/Share files failed 
 14583                                  ;		al = error_FCB_unavailable
 14584                                  ;
 14585                                  ; Registers affected: None
 14586                                  ;
 14587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14588                                  
 14589                                  ;LruFCB	PROC	NEAR
 14590                                  LRUFCB:
 14591                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14592                                  	; DOSCODE:5805h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 14593                                  
 14594                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14595                                  	; DOSCODE:57F1h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 14596                                  
 14597 00001F54 06                      	push	es	; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 14598                                  	
 14599 00001F55 E800E5                  	call	save_world
 14600                                  	
 14601                                  	;getdseg <ds>		;ds = DOSDATA
 14602 00001F58 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 14603                                  
 14604 00001F5D 08C0                    	or	al,al		;Check if regenerate allocation
 14605 00001F5F 751A                    	jnz	short lru1	;Try to find SFT to use
 14606                                  
 14607                                  	; This is a regen call. If LocalSFT contains the address of a valid 
 14608                                  	; local SFT, just return that SFT to reuse
 14609                                  
 14610 00001F61 8B3E[A710]              	mov	di,[LocalSFT]
 14611 00001F65 0B3E[A910]              	or	di,[LocalSFT+2]	;is address == 0?
 14612 00001F69 7410                    	jz	short lru1	;invalid local SFT, find one
 14613                                  
 14614                                  	; We have found a valid local SFT. Recycle this SFT
 14615                                  
 14616 00001F6B C43E[A710]              	les	di,[LocalSFT]
 14617                                  
 14618                                  gotlocalSFT:
 14619 00001F6F 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di
 14620 00001F73 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es
 14621 00001F77 F8                      	clc
 14622 00001F78 E9AD00                  	jmp	LRUDone		;clear up SFT and return
 14623                                  
 14624                                  lru1:
 14625 00001F7B C43E[4000]              	les	di,[SFTFCB]	;es:di = SF Table for FCBs
 14626                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14627 00001F7F 268B4D04                	mov	cx,[es:di+SFT.SFCount]	;cx = number of SFTs
 14628                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 14629 00001F83 8D7D06                  	lea	di,[di+SFT.SFTable]	;es:di = first SFT
 14630                                  
 14631                                  	; We scan through all the SFTs scanning for a free one. It also 
 14632                                  	; remembers the LRU SFT for net/Share SFTs and local SFTs separately. 
 14633                                  	; bx = min. LRU for local SFTs
 14634                                  	; si = pos. of local SFT with min. LRU
 14635                                  	; dx = min. LRU for net/Share SFTs
 14636                                  	; bp = pos. of net/Share SFT with min. LRU
 14637                                  
 14638 00001F86 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,-1		; init. to 0xffff ( max. LRU value )
 14639 00001F89 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 14640 00001F8B 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 14641 00001F8D 89DD                    	mov	bp,bx
 14642                                  
 14643                                  findSFT:
 14644                                  	;See if this SFT is a free one. If so, return it
 14645 00001F8F 26830D00                	or	word [es:di],0
 14646                                  	;or	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ;reference count = 0 ?
 14647 00001F93 744D                    	jz	short gotSFT	;yes, SFT is free
 14648                                  	;;cmp	word [es:di],-1
 14649                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy ;Is it busy?
 14650 00001F95 26833DFF                	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy ; -1 
 14651 00001F99 7447                    	jz	short gotSFT	;no, can use it
 14652                                  
 14653                                  	; Check if this SFT is local and store its address in LocalSFT. Can be 
 14654                                  	; used for a later regen.
 14655                                  
 14656                                  	; 16/12/2022
 14657                                  	; 08/11/2022
 14658                                  	;test	byte [es:di+6],80h
 14659 00001F9B 26F6450680              	test	byte [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags+1],(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 14660                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14661                                  	;;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14662                                  	;test	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet ; network SFT?
 14663 00001FA0 7532                    	jnz	short lru5	;yes, get net/Share LRU
 14664                                  
 14665                                  ;IF installed
 14666 00001FA2 E8B959                  	call	CheckShare	;Share present?
 14667                                  ;ENDIF
 14668 00001FA5 752D                    	jnz	short lru5	;yes, get net/Share LRU
 14669                                  
 14670                                  	;Local SFT, register its address
 14671                                  
 14672                                  	; !!HACK!!!
 14673                                  	; There is a slightly dirty hack out here in a desperate bid to save  
 14674                                  	; code space. There is similar code duplicated at label 'gotSFT'. We 
 14675                                  	; enter from there if al = 0, update the LocalSFT variable, and since 
 14676                                  	; al = 0, we jump out of the loop to the exit point. I have commented 
 14677                                  	; out the code that previously existed at label 'gotSFT'
 14678                                  
 14679                                  hackpoint:
 14680 00001FA7 893E[A710]              	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14681 00001FAB 8C06[A910]              	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es	;store local SFT address
 14682                                  
 14683 00001FAF 08C0                    	or	al,al		;Is operation = REGEN?
 14684 00001FB1 74BC                    	jz	short gotlocalSFT ;yes, return this SFT for reuse
 14685                                  
 14686                                  	;Get LRU for local files
 14687                                  	
 14688                                  	;cmp	[es:di+15h],bx
 14689 00001FB3 26395D15                	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],bx ;SFT.LRU < min?
 14690 00001FB7 7306                    	jae	short lru4	;no, skip 
 14691                                  
 14692                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+15h]
 14693 00001FB9 268B5D15                	mov	bx,[es:di+sf_LRU] ;yes, store new minimum
 14694 00001FBD 89FE                    	mov	si,di		;store SFT position
 14695                                  lru4:
 14696                                  	;add	di,59
 14697 00001FBF 83C73B                  	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size ;go to next SFT
 14698 00001FC2 E2CB                    	loop	findSFT
 14699                                  
 14700                                  	; Check whether we got a net/Share or local SFT. If local SFT 
 14701                                  	; available, we will reuse it instead of net/Share LRU
 14702                                  
 14703 00001FC4 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 14704 00001FC6 83FEFF                  	cmp	si,-1		;local SFT available?
 14705 00001FC9 7517                    	jnz	short gotSFT	;yes, return it
 14706                                  
 14707                                  	;No local SFT, see if we got a net/Share SFT
 14708                                  
 14709 00001FCB 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 14710 00001FCD 83FDFF                  	cmp	bp,-1		;net/Share SFT available?
 14711 00001FD0 7530                    	jnz	short gotnetSFT	;yes, return it
 14712                                  noSFT:
 14713                                  	; NB: This error should never occur. We always must have an LRU SFT. 
 14714                                  	; This error can occur only if the SFT has been corrupted or the LRU 
 14715                                  	; count is not maintained properly.
 14716                                  
 14717 00001FD2 EB51                    	jmp	short errorbadSFT ;error, no FCB available.
 14718                                  
 14719                                  	; Handle the LRU for net/Share SFTs
 14720                                  lru5:
 14721                                  	;cmp	[es:di+15h],dx
 14722 00001FD4 26395515                	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],dx ;SFT.LRU < min?
 14723 00001FD8 73E5                    	jae	short lru4	;no, skip 
 14724                                  
 14725                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+15h]
 14726 00001FDA 268B5515                	mov	dx,[es:di+sf_LRU] ;yes, store new minimum
 14727                                  
 14728 00001FDE 89FD                    	mov	bp,di		;store SFT position
 14729 00001FE0 EBDD                    	jmp	short lru4	;continue with next SFT
 14730                                  
 14731                                  gotSFT:
 14732 00001FE2 08C0                    	or	al,al
 14733 00001FE4 74C1                    	jz	short hackpoint	;save es:di in LocalSFT
 14734                                  
 14735                                  	; HACK!!!
 14736                                  	; The code here differs from the code at 'hackpoint' only in the 
 14737                                  	; order of the check for al. If al = 0, we can jump to 'hackpoint' 
 14738                                  	; and then from there jump out to 'gotlocalSFT'. The original code 
 14739                                  	; has been commented out below and replaced by the code just above.
 14740                                  
 14741                                  ;If regen, then this SFT can be registered as a local one ( even if free ).
 14742                                  ;
 14743                                  ;	or	al,al		  ;Regen?
 14744                                  ;	jnz	short notlocaluse ;yes, register it and return
 14745                                  ;
 14746                                  ;Register this SFT as a local one
 14747                                  ;
 14748                                  ;	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14749                                  ;	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es
 14750                                  ;	jmp	gotlocalSFT	;return to caller
 14751                                  ;
 14752                                  ;notlocaluse:
 14753                                  
 14754                                  	; The caller is probably going to use this SFT for a net/Share file. 
 14755                                  	; We will come here only on a Open/Create when the caller($FCB_OPEN) 
 14756                                  	; does not really know whether it is a local file or not. We 
 14757                                  	; invalidate LocalSFT if the SFT we are going to use was previously 
 14758                                  	; registered as a local SFT that can be recycled.
 14759                                  
 14760 00001FE6 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 14761 00001FE8 393E[A710]              	cmp	[LocalSFT],di		;Offset same?
 14762 00001FEC 7506                    	jne	short notinvalid
 14763 00001FEE 3906[A910]              	cmp	[LocalSFT+2],ax		;Segments same?
 14764 00001FF2 7403                    	je	short zerolocalSFT	;no, no need to invalidate
 14765                                  notinvalid:
 14766 00001FF4 E978FF                  	jmp	gotlocalSFT
 14767                                  
 14768                                  	; The SFT we are going to use was registered in the LocalSFT variable. 
 14769                                  	; Invalidate this variable i.e LocalSFT = NULL
 14770                                  
 14771                                  zerolocalSFT:
 14772 00001FF7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 14773 00001FF9 A3[A710]                	mov	[LocalSFT],ax
 14774 00001FFC A3[A910]                	mov	[LocalSFT+2],ax
 14775                                  
 14776 00001FFF E96DFF                  	jmp	gotlocalSFT
 14777                                  
 14778                                  gotnetSFT:
 14779                                  	; We have an SFT that is currently net/Share. If it is going to be 
 14780                                  	; used for a regen, we know it has to be a local SFT. Update the 
 14781                                  	; LocalSFT variable
 14782                                  
 14783 00002002 08C0                    	or	al,al
 14784 00002004 7508                    	jnz	short closenet
 14785                                  
 14786 00002006 893E[A710]              	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14787 0000200A 8C06[A910]              	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es	;store local SFT address
 14788                                  closenet:
 14789 0000200E 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di	; set thissft
 14790 00002012 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es	
 14791                                  
 14792                                  	; If we have sharing or thisSFT is a net sft, then close it until ref 
 14793                                  	; count is 0.
 14794                                  	; NB: We come here only if it is a net/Share SFT that is going to be 
 14795                                  	; recycled -- no need to check for this.
 14796                                  
 14797                                  LRUClose:
 14798 00002016 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0
 14799                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ; is ref count still <> 0?
 14800 0000201A 740C                    	jz	short LRUDone	; nope, all done
 14801                                  
 14802 0000201C E80D15                  	call	DOS_CLOSE
 14803 0000201F 73F5                    	jnc	short LRUClose	; no error => clean up
 14804                                  
 14805                                  	; Bugbug: I dont know why we are trying to close after we get an 
 14806                                  	; error closing. Seems like we could have a potential infinite loop  
 14807                                  	; here. This has to be verified.
 14808                                  
 14809 00002021 3C06                    	cmp	al,error_invalid_handle ; 6
 14810 00002023 74F1                    	je	short LRUClose
 14811                                  errorbadSFT:
 14812 00002025 F9                      	stc
 14813 00002026 EB05                    	JMP	short LRUDead
 14814                                  LRUDone:
 14815 00002028 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 14816 0000202A E80E01                  	call	BlastSFT		; fill SFT with 0 (AL), 'C' cleared
 14817                                  
 14818                                  LRUDead:
 14819 0000202D E811E4                  	call	restore_world		; use macro
 14820                                  	
 14821 00002030 07                      	pop	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 14822                                  
 14823                                  	;getdseg <es>
 14824 00002031 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 14825 00002036 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]		;es:di points at allocated SFT
 14826                                  
 14827                                  	;;retnc
 14828                                  	;jc	short LruFCB_err
 14829                                  	;retn
 14830                                  
 14831                                  	; 16/12/2022
 14832                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14833 0000203B 7302                    	jnc	short LruFCB_retn
 14834                                  	;jc	short LruFCB_err
 14835                                  	;retn
 14836                                  		
 14837                                  LruFCB_err:
 14838 0000203D B023                    	MOV	AL,error_FCB_unavailable ; 23h
 14839                                  LruFCB_retn:
 14840 0000203F C3                      	retn
 14841                                  	
 14842                                  ;LruFCB	ENDP
 14843                                  
 14844                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14845                                  
 14846                                  ; DOSCODE:58F3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 14847                                  
 14848                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14849                                  ;**** RegenCopyName -- This function copies the filename from the FCB to
 14850                                  ; SFT and also to DOS local buffers. There was duplicate code in FCBRegen
 14851                                  ; to copy the name to different destinations
 14852                                  ;
 14853                                  ; Inputs: ds:si = source string
 14854                                  ;	 es:di = destination string
 14855                                  ;	 cx = length of string
 14856                                  ;
 14857                                  ; Outputs: String copied to destination
 14858                                  ;
 14859                                  ; Registers affected: cx,di,si
 14860                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14861                                  
 14862                                  RegenCopyName:
 14863                                  CopyName:
 14864 00002040 AC                      	lodsb			;load character
 14865 00002041 E8FA35                  	call	UCase		; convert char to upper case
 14866                                  StuffChar2:
 14867 00002044 AA                      	STOSB			;store converted character
 14868 00002045 E2F9                    	LOOP	CopyName	;
 14869                                  DoneName:
 14870 00002047 C3                      	retn
 14871                                  
 14872                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14873                                  
 14874                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14875                                  FCBRegen:
 14876                                  	; called from SFTFromFCB. SS already DOSDATA
 14877                                  
 14878                                  	; General data filling. Mode is sf_isFCB + open_for_both, date/time 
 14879                                  	; we do not fill, size we do no fill, position we do not fill,
 14880                                  	; bit 14 of flags = TRUE, other bits = FALSE
 14881

 15115                                  ;**	BlastSFT - FIll SFT with Garbage
 15116                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15117                                  ;	BlastSFT is used when an SFT is no longer needed; it's called with
 15118                                  ;	various garbage values to put into the SFT.  I don't know why,
 15119                                  ;	presumably to help with debugging (jgl).  We clear the few fields
 15120                                  ;	necessary to show that the SFT is free after filling it.
 15121                                  ;
 15122                                  ;	ENTRY	(es:di) = address of SFT
 15123                                  ;		(al) = fill character
 15124                                  ;	EXIT	(ax) = -1
 15125                                  ;		'C' clear
 15126                                  ;	USES	AX, CX, Flags
 15127                                  
 15128                                  BlastSFT:
 15129 0000213B 57                      	push	di
 15130                                  	;mov	cx,53 ; MSDOS 3.3
 15131                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; MSDOS 6.0
 15132 0000213C B93B00                  	mov	cx,SF_ENTRY.size
 15133 0000213F F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 15134 00002141 5F                      	pop	di
 15135 00002142 29C0                    	sub	ax,ax	; 0		; clear 'C'-----------------;
 15136 00002144 268905                  	mov	[es:di],ax
 15137                                  	;mov	[es:di+SFT_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],ax ; set ref count   ;
 15138                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 15139 00002147 26894515                	mov	[es:di+sf_LRU],ax	; set lru		    ;
 15140 0000214B 48                      	dec	ax	; -1					    ;
 15141                                  	;mov	[es:di+17h],ax ; 0FFFFh ; -1
 15142 0000214C 26894517                	mov	[es:di+sf_OpenAge],ax	; set open age to -1	    ;
 15143                                  BlastSFT_retn:
 15144 00002150 C3                      	retn				; return with 'C' clear     ;

 15146                                  ;Break	<CheckFCB - see if the SFT pointed to by the FCB is still OK>
 15147                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15148                                  ;
 15149                                  ;   CheckFCB - examine an FCB and its contents to see if it needs to be
 15150                                  ;   regenerated.
 15151                                  ;
 15152                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB (not extended)
 15153                                  ;		AL is SFT index
 15154                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Set - FCB needs to be regened
 15155                                  ;		Carry clear - FCB is OK. ES:DI point to SFT
 15156                                  ;   Registers modified: AX and BX
 15157                                  ;
 15158                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15159                                  
 15160                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15161                                  	; DOSCODE:59F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 15162                                  CheckFCB:
 15163                                  		
 15164                                  	; called from $fcb_open and sftfromfcb. SS already set up to DOSDATA
 15165

 15169                                  
 15170                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 15171                                  	
 15172                                  	; SR;
 15173                                  	; We check if the given FCB is for a local file. If so, we return a 
 15174                                  	; bad SFT status forcing the caller to regenerate the SFT.
 15175                                  
 15176                                  	;test	byte [si+19h],0C0h

 15333                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 15334                                  
 15335                                  	; SR;
 15336                                  	; The code below to match a local FCB with its SFT can no longer be
 15337                                  	; used. We just return a no-match status. This check is done right

 15343                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:di+7]

 15351 000021C4 EBD3                    	JMP	short CheckD

 15353                                  ;Break	<SFTFromFCB - take a FCB and obtain a SFT from it>
 15354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15355                                  ;
 15356                                  ;   SFTFromFCB - the workhorse of this compatability crap. Check to see if
 15357                                  ;	the SFT for the FCB is Good. If so, make ThisSFT point to it. If not
 15358                                  ;	good, get one from the cache and regenerate it. Overlay the LRU field
 15359                                  ;	with PID
 15360                                  ;
 15361                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 15362                                  ;   Outputs:	ThisSFT point to appropriate SFT
 15363                                  ;		Carry clear -> OK ES:DI -> SFT
 15364                                  ;		Carry set -> error in ax
 15365                                  ;   Registers modified: ES,DI, AX
 15366                                  ;
 15367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15368                                  
 15369                                  SFTFromFCB:
 15370                                  	; called from fcbio and $fcb_close. SS already set up to DOSDATA
 15371                                  
 15372                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15373                                  
 15374 000021C6 50                      	push	ax
 15375 000021C7 53                      	push	bx
 15376                                  	;mov	al,[si+18h]
 15377 000021C8 8A4418                  	MOV	AL,[SI+fcb_sfn] 	; set SFN for check
 15378 000021CB E883FF                  	call	CheckFCB
 15379 000021CE 5B                      	pop	bx
 15380 000021CF 58                      	pop	ax
 15381                                  	;MOV	[CS:THISSFT],DI		; SS override
 15382                                  	;MOV	[CS:THISSFT+2],ES
 15383 000021D0 36893E[9E05]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT],DI		; SS override
 15384 000021D5 368C06[A005]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT+2],ES
 15385 000021DA 7311                    	JNC	short Set_SFT		; no problems, just set thissft
 15386                                  	
 15387                                  	; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0)
 15388                                  	; 31/05/2019
 15389 000021DC 06                      	push	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21) & (MSDOS 5.0)
 15390 000021DD E878E2                  	call	save_world
 15391 000021E0 E865FE                  	call	FCBRegen
 15392 000021E3 E85BE2                  	call	restore_world		; use macro restore world
 15393 000021E6 07                      	pop	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21) ; 31/05/2019 ; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0)	
 15394                                  
 15395                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:EXTERR]		; SS override
 15396 000021E7 36A1[2403]              	MOV	AX,[SS:EXTERR]		; SS override
 15397 000021EB 72C4                    	jc	short CheckNet_retn
 15398

 15406 000021FB C3                      	retn				; carry is clear

 15441                                  ;============================================================================
 15442                                  ; FCBIO2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 15443                                  ;============================================================================
 15444                                  ; 21/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 15445                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15446                                  
 15447                                  ;**	FCBIO2.ASM - Ancient 1.0 1.1 FCB system calls
 15448                                  ;
 15449                                  ;	GetRR
 15450                                  ;	GetExtent
 15451                                  ;	SetExtent
 15452                                  ;	GetExtended
 15453                                  ;	GetRecSize
 15454                                  ;	FCBIO
 15455                                  ;	$FCB_OPEN
 15456                                  ;	$FCB_CREATE
 15457                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_WRITE_BLOCK
 15458                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_READ_BLOCK
 15459                                  ;	$FCB_SEQ_READ
 15460                                  ;	$FCB_SEQ_WRITE
 15461                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_READ
 15462                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_WRITE
 15463                                  ;
 15464                                  ;	Revision history:
 15465                                  ;
 15466                                  ;		Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 15467                                  ;			 MZ  6 June  1983 completion of functions
 15468                                  ;			 MZ 15 Dec   1983 Brain damaged programs close FCBs multiple
 15469                                  ;				  times.  Change so successive closes work by
 15470                                  ;				  always returning OK.	Also, detect I/O to
 15471                                  ;				  already closed FCB and return EOF.
 15472                                  ;		 MZ 16 Jan   1984 More braindamage.  Need to separate info
 15473                                  ;				  out of sft into FCB for reconnection
 15474                                  ;
 15475                                  ;	    A000   version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 15476                                  
 15477                                  ; Defintions for FCBOp flags
 15478                                  
 15479                                  RANDOM	equ 2				; random operation
 15480                                  FCBREAD equ 4				; doing a read
 15481                                  BLOCK	equ 8				; doing a block I/O
 15482                                  
 15483                                  ;Break <GetRR - return the random record field in DX:AX>
 15484                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15485                                  ;
 15486                                  ;   GetRR - correctly load DX:AX with the random record field (3 or 4 bytes)
 15487                                  ;	from the FCB pointed to by DS:SI
 15488                                  ;
 15489                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to an FCB
 15490                                  ;		BX has record size
 15491                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 15492                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 15493                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15494                                  
 15495                                  GetRR:
 15496                                  	;mov	ax,[si+21h]
 15497 0000221D 8B4421                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR]	; get low order part
 15498                                  	;mov	dx,[si+23h]
 15499 00002220 8B5423                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2]	; get high order part
 15500 00002223 83FB40                  	CMP	BX,64			; ignore MSB of RR if recsiz > 64
 15501 00002226 7202                    	JB	short GetRRBye
 15502 00002228 30F6                    	XOR	DH,DH
 15503                                  GetRRBye:
 15504 0000222A C3                      	retn
 15505                                  
 15506                                  ;Break <GetExtent - retrieve next location for sequential IO>
 15507                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15508                                  ;
 15509                                  ;   GetExtent - Construct the next record to perform I/O from the EXTENT and
 15510                                  ;	NR fields in the FCB.
 15511                                  ;
 15512                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI - point to FCB
 15513                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 15514                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 15515                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15516                                  
 15517                                  GetExtent:
 15518                                  	;mov	al,[si+20h]
 15519 0000222B 8A4420                  	MOV	AL,[SI+SYS_FCB.NR]	; get low order piece
 15520                                  	;mov	dx,[si+0Ch]
 15521 0000222E 8B540C                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT]	; get high order piece
 15522 00002231 D0E0                    	SHL	AL,1
 15523 00002233 D1EA                    	SHR	DX,1
 15524 00002235 D0D8                    	RCR	AL,1	; move low order bit of DL to high order of AH
 15525 00002237 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 15526 00002239 88F2                    	MOV	DL,DH
 15527 0000223B 30F6                    	XOR	DH,DH
 15528 0000223D C3                      	retn
 15529                                  
 15530                                  ;Break <SetExtent - update the extent/NR field>
 15531                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15532                                  ;
 15533                                  ;   SetExtent - change the position of an FCB by filling in the extent/NR
 15534                                  ;	fields
 15535                                  ;
 15536                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 15537                                  ;		DX:AX is a record location in file
 15538                                  ;   Outputs:	Extent/NR fields are filled in
 15539                                  ;   Registers modified: CX
 15540                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15541                                  
 15542                                  SetExtent:
 15543 0000223E 50                      	push	ax
 15544 0000223F 52                      	push	dx
 15545 00002240 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 15546 00002242 247F                    	AND	AL,7FH			; next rec field
 15547                                  	;mov	[si+20h],al
 15548 00002244 884420                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.NR],AL
 15549 00002247 80E180                  	AND	CL,80H			; save upper bit
 15550 0000224A D1E1                    	SHL	CX,1
 15551 0000224C D1D2                    	RCL	DX,1			; move high bit of CX to low bit of DX
 15552 0000224E 88E8                    	MOV	AL,CH
 15553 00002250 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 15554                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch], ax
 15555 00002252 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; all done
 15556 00002255 5A                      	pop	dx
 15557 00002256 58                      	pop	ax
 15558 00002257 C3                      	retn
 15559                                  
 15560                                  ;Break <GetExtended - find FCB in potential extended fcb>
 15561                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15562                                  ;
 15563                                  ;   GetExtended - Make DS:SI point to FCB from DS:DX
 15564                                  ;
 15565                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a possible extended FCB
 15566                                  ;   Outputs:	DS:SI point to the FCB part
 15567                                  ;		zeroflag set if not extended fcb
 15568                                  ;   Registers modified: SI
 15569                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15570                                  
 15571                                  GetExtended:
 15572 00002258 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; point to Something
 15573 0000225A 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],-1		; look for extention
 15574 0000225D 7503                    	JNZ	short GetBye		; not there
 15575 0000225F 83C607                  	ADD	SI,7			; point to FCB
 15576                                  GetBye:
 15577 00002262 39D6                    	CMP	SI,DX			; set condition codes
 15578                                  getextd_retn:
 15579 00002264 C3                      	retn
 15580                                  
 15581                                  ;Break <GetRecSize - return in BX the FCB record size>
 15582                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15583                                  ;
 15584                                  ;   GetRecSize - return in BX the record size from the FCB at DS:SI
 15585                                  ;
 15586                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to a non-extended FCB
 15587                                  ;   Outputs:	BX contains the record size
 15588                                  ;   Registers modified: None
 15589                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15590                                  
 15591                                  	; 07/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15592                                  GetRecSize:
 15593                                  	;mov	bx,[si+0Eh]
 15594 00002265 8B5C0E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ]	; get his record size
 15595 00002268 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX			; is it nul?
 15596 0000226A 74F8                    	jz	short getextd_retn
 15597 0000226C BB8000                  	MOV	BX,128			; use default size
 15598                                  	;mov	[si+0Eh],bx
 15599 0000226F 895C0E                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],BX	; stuff it back
 15600 00002272 C3                      	retn
 15601                                  
 15602                                  ;BREAK <FCBIO - do internal FCB I/O>
 15603                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15604                                  ;
 15605                                  ;   FCBIO - look at FCBOP and merge all FCB operations into a single routine.
 15606                                  ;
 15607                                  ;   Inputs:	FCBOP flags which operations need to be performed
 15608                                  ;		DS:DX point to FCB
 15609                                  ;		CX may have count of number of records to xfer
 15610                                  ;   Outputs:	AL has error code
 15611                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 15612                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15613                                  
 15614                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15615                                  	; DOSCODE:5B17h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15616                                  FCBIO:
 15617                                  
 15618                                  FEOF	EQU	1
 15619                                  FTRIM	EQU	2
 15620                                  
 15621                                  %define	FCBErr	byte [bp-1]  ; byte	
 15622                                  %define	cRec	word [bp-3]  ; word	
 15623                                  ;%define RecPos	word [bp-7]  ; dword

 15633                                  %define	FCBOp	byte [bp-20] ; byte
 15634                                  
 15635                                  	;Enter
 15636                                  
 15637 00002273 55                      	push	bp
 15638 00002274 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 15639 00002276 83EC14                  	sub	sp,20
 15640                                  	;mov	[bp-20],al
 15641 00002279 8846EC                  	MOV	FCBOp,AL

 15649                                  GetPos:
 15650                                  	;mov	[bp-3],cx

 15653 00002292 E8D0FF                  	call	GetRecSize		;   RecSize = GetRecSize ();

 15658 0000229C 7403                    	JZ	short GetRec
 15659 0000229E E87CFF                  	call	GetRR			;	RecPos = GetRR ();
 15660                                  GetRec:

 15669 000022AF 89C7                    	MOV	DI,AX
 15670                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-7]
 15671 000022B1 8B46F9                  	MOV	AX,RecPosL
 15672 000022B4 F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 15673 000022B6 01FA                    	ADD	DX,DI
 15674                                  	;mov	[bp-13],ax
 15675 000022B8 8946F3                  	MOV	bPosL,AX
 15676                                  	;mov	[bp-11],dx
 15677 000022BB 8956F5                  	MOV	bPosH,DX
 15678                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-3]
 15679 000022BE 8B46FD                  	MOV	AX,cRec 		;   cByte = cRec * RecSize;
 15680 000022C1 F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 15681                                  	;mov	[bp-15],ax
 15682 000022C3 8946F1                  	MOV	cByte,AX
 15683                                  
 15684                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 15685 000022C6 360306[2C03]            	ADD	AX,[SS:DMAADD]		;   if (cByte+DMA > 64K) {
 15686 000022CB 83D200                  	ADC	DX,0
 15687 000022CE 7419                    	JZ	short DoOper
 15688                                  	;mov	byte [bp-1],2
 15689 000022D0 C646FF02                	MOV	FCBErr,FTRIM		;	FCBErr = FTRIM;
 15690

 15723                                  FCBDeath:

 15750

 15914                                  ;Break <$FCB_Open - open an old-style FCB>
 15915                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15916                                  ;
 15917                                  ;   $FCB_Open - CPM compatability file open. The user has formatted an FCB
 15918                                  ;	for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 15919                                  ;
 15920                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB
 15921                                  ;   Outputs:	AL indicates status 0 is ok FF is error
 15922                                  ;		FCB has the following fields filled in:

 15926                                  _$FCB_OPEN:			; System call 15
 15927                                  
 15928 00002412 B80200                  	MOV	AX,SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 15929

 15931 00002415 B9[7331]                	MOV	CX,DOS_OPEN
 15932                                  
 15933                                  ; The following is common code for Creation and openning of FCBs. AX is
 15934                                  ; either attributes (for create) or open mode (for open)... DS:DX points to
 15935                                  ; the FCB
 15936                                  
 15937                                  DoAccess:

 15939 00002419 52                      	push	dx

 15942

 15951                                  FCBOpenErr:

 15956                                  
 15957                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 15965 0000242F B001                    	mov	al,1			;indicate Open/Create operation
 15966 00002431 E820FB                  	call	LRUFCB			; get a sft entry (no error)
 15967 00002434 58                      	pop	ax
 15968 00002435 722A                    	jc	short HardMessage
 15969                                  	
 15970                                  	;mov	word [es:di+2],8000h
 15971 00002437 26C745020080            	mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 15972 0000243D 1E                      	push	ds
 15973 0000243E 56                      	push	si	
 15974 0000243F 53                      	push	bx			; save fcb pointer
 15975 00002440 89CE                    	MOV	SI,CX
 15976                                  
 15977                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 15978 00002442 16                      	push	ss
 15979 00002443 1F                      	pop	ds			    ; let DOS_Open see variables
 15980 00002444 FFD6                    	CALL	SI ; DOS_OPEN or DOS_CREATE ; go open the file
 15981 00002446 5B                      	pop	bx
 15982 00002447 5E                      	pop	si
 15983 00002448 1F                      	pop	ds			; get fcb
 15984                                  
 15985                                  ;hkn; SS override
 15986 00002449 36C43E[9E05]            	LES	DI,[SS:THISSFT]		; get sf pointer
 15987 0000244E 7318                    	JNC	short FCBOK		; operation succeeded
 15988                                  failopen:
 15989 00002450 50                      	PUSH	AX
 15990 00002451 B052                    	MOV	AL,"R"	; 52h		; clear out field (free sft)
 15991 00002453 E8E5FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 15992 00002456 58                      	POP	AX
 15993                                  	;cmp	ax,4
 15994 00002457 83F804                  	CMP	AX,error_too_many_open_files
 15995 0000245A 7405                    	JZ	short HardMessage
 15996                                  	;cmp	ax,24h
 15997 0000245C 83F824                  	CMP	AX,error_sharing_buffer_exceeded
 15998 0000245F 7505                    	jnz	short DeadFCB
 15999                                  HardMessage:
 16000 00002461 50                      	PUSH	AX
 16001 00002462 E897FD                  	call	FCBHardErr
 16002 00002465 58                      	POP	AX
 16003                                  DeadFCB:
 16004                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 16005                                  	;jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 16006 00002466 EBC0                    	jmp	short FCBOpenErr
 16007                                  FCBOK:
 16008                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 16009 00002468 E8EFF3                  	call	IsSFTNet		;AN007;F.C. >32mb  Non Fat file?
 16010 0000246B 750F                    	JNZ	short FCBOK2		;AN007;F.C. >32mb  yes
 16011 0000246D E8EE54                  	call	CheckShare		;AN000;F.C. >32mb  share around?
 16012 00002470 750A                    	JNZ	short FCBOK2		;AN000;F.C. >32mb  yes
 16013                                  ;SR;
 16014                                  ; If we reach here, we know we have got a local SFT. Let's update the 
 16015                                  ; LocalSFT variable to reflect this.
 16016                                  
 16017 00002472 36893E[A710]            	mov	[ss:LocalSFT],di
 16018 00002477 368C06[A910]            	mov	[ss:LocalSFT+2],es; Store the SFT address
 16019                                  ;;SR;
 16020                                  ;; The check below is not valid anymore since we regenerate for media > 32M.
 16021                                  ;;
 16022                                  ;;	CMP	WORD [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_dirsec+2],0 
 16023                                  ;;					       ;AN000;F.C. >32mb  if dirsec >32mb
 16024                                  ;;	JZ	short FCBOK2		       ;AN000;F.C. >32mb    then error
 16025                                  ;;	MOV	AX,error_sys_comp_not_loaded   ;AN000;F.C. >32mb
 16026                                  ;;	JMP	short failopen		       ;AN000;F.C. >32mb
 16027                                  
 16028                                  FCBOK2:
 16029                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 16030 0000247C 26FF05                  	inc	word [es:di]
 16031                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count] ; increment reference count
 16032 0000247F E802FA                  	call	SaveFCBInfo
 16033                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 16034                                  	;call	SetOpenAge
 16035                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 16036                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 16037                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 16038 00002482 26F6450580              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device  ; 28/07/2019
 16039 00002487 7508                    	JNZ	short FCBNoDrive	; do not munge drive on devices
 16040 00002489 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]			; get drive byte
 16041 0000248B E82F4C                  	call	GETTHISDRV		; convert
 16042                                  	;INC	AL
 16043                                  	; 17/12/2022
 16044 0000248E 40                      	inc	ax
 16045 0000248F 8804                    	MOV	[SI],AL			; stash in good drive letter
 16046                                  FCBNoDrive:
 16047                                  	;mov	word [si+0Eh],128
 16048 00002491 C7440E8000              	MOV	word [SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],80h ; stuff in default record size
 16049                                  
 16050                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+0Dh]
 16051 00002496 268B450D                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time] ; set time
 16052                                  	;mov	[si+16h],ax
 16053 0000249A 894416                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FTIME],AX
 16054                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+0Fh]
 16055 0000249D 268B450F                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date] ; set date
 16056                                  	;mov	[si+14h],ax
 16057 000024A1 894414                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FDATE],AX
 16058                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+11h]
 16059 000024A4 268B4511                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size] ; set sizes
 16060                                  	;mov	[si+10h],ax
 16061 000024A8 894410                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ],AX
 16062                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+13h]
 16063 000024AB 268B4513                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size+2]
 16064                                  	;mov	[si+12h],ax
 16065 000024AF 894412                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ+2],AX
 16066 000024B2 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			; convenient zero
 16067                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch],ax
 16068 000024B4 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; point to beginning of file
 16069                                  
 16070                                  ; We must scan the set of FCB SFTs for one that appears to match the current
 16071                                  ; one.	We cheat and use CheckFCB to match the FCBs.
 16072                                  
 16073                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 16074 000024B7 36C43E[4000]            	LES	DI,[SS:SFTFCB]		; get the pointer to head of the list
 16075                                  	;mov	ah,[es:di+4]
 16076 000024BC 268A6504                	MOV	AH,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]	; get number of SFTs to scan
 16077                                  OpenScan:
 16078                                  	;cmp	al,[si+18h]
 16079 000024C0 3A4418                  	CMP	AL,[SI+fcb_sfn]		; don't compare ourselves
 16080 000024C3 7407                    	JZ	short SkipCheck
 16081 000024C5 50                      	push	ax			; preserve count
 16082 000024C6 E888FC                  	call	CheckFCB		; do they match
 16083 000024C9 58                      	pop	ax			; get count back
 16084 000024CA 7309                    	JNC	short OpenFound		; found a match!
 16085                                  SkipCheck:
 16086 000024CC FEC0                    	INC	AL			; advance to next FCB
 16087 000024CE 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH			; table full?
 16088 000024D0 75EE                    	JNZ	short OpenScan		; no, go for more
 16089                                  OpenDone:
 16090 000024D2 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; return success
 16091 000024D4 C3                      	retn
 16092                                  
 16093                                  ; The SFT at ES:DI is the one that is already in use for this FCB. We set the
 16094                                  ; FCB to use this one. We increment its ref count. We do NOT close it at all.
 16095                                  ; Consider:
 16096                                  ;
 16097                                  ;   open (foo)	delete (foo) open (bar)
 16098                                  ;
 16099                                  ; This causes us to recycle (potentially) bar through the same local SFT as
 16100                                  ; foo even though foo is no longer needed; this is due to the server closing
 16101                                  ; foo for us when we delete it. Unfortunately, we cannot see this closure.
 16102                                  ; If we were to CLOSE bar, the server would then close the only reference to
 16103                                  ; bar and subsequent I/O would be lost to the redirector.
 16104                                  ;
 16105                                  ; This gets solved by NOT closing the sft, but zeroing the ref count
 16106                                  ; (effectively freeing the SFT) and informing the sharer (if relevant) that
 16107                                  ; the SFT is no longer in use. Note that the SHARER MUST keep its ref counts
 16108                                  ; around. This will allow us to access the same file through multiple network
 16109                                  ; connections and NOT prematurely terminate when the ref count on one
 16110                                  ; connection goes to zero.
 16111                                  
 16112                                  OpenFound:
 16113                                  	;mov	[si+18h],al
 16114 000024D5 884418                  	MOV	[SI+fcb_sfn],AL 	; assign with this
 16115 000024D8 26FF05                  	inc	word [es:di]
 16116                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 16117                                  					; remember this new invocation
 16118 000024DB 36A1[1000]              	MOV	AX,[SS:FCBLRU]		; update LRU counts
 16119                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 16120 000024DF 26894515                	MOV	[ES:DI+sf_LRU],AX
 16121                                  ;
 16122                                  ; We have an FCB sft that is now of no use.  We release sharing info and then
 16123                                  ; blast it to prevent other reuse.
 16124                                  ;
 16125 000024E3 16                      	push	ss
 16126 000024E4 1F                      	pop	ds
 16127 000024E5 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 16128 000024E9 26FF0D                  	dec	word [es:di]
 16129                                  	;DEC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 16130                                  					; free the newly allocated SFT
 16131 000024EC E8A754                  	call	ShareEnd
 16132 000024EF B043                    	MOV	AL,'C'	 ; 43h
 16133 000024F1 E847FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 16134 000024F4 EBDC                    	JMP	short OpenDone
 16135                                  
 16136                                  ;BREAK	<$FCB_Create - create a new directory entry>
 16137                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16138                                  ;
 16139                                  ;   $FCB_Create - CPM compatability file create. The user has formatted an
 16140                                  ;	FCB for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 16141                                  ;
 16142                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB
 16143                                  ;   Outputs:	AL indicates status 0 is ok FF is error
 16144                                  ;		FCB has the following fields filled in:
 16145                                  ;		    Time/Date Extent/NR Size
 16146                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16147                                  
 16148                                  _$FCB_CREATE:		; System call 22
 16149                                  
 16150                                  ;hkn; DOS_Create is in DOSCODE
 16151 000024F6 B9[4930]                	MOV	CX,DOS_CREATE		; routine to call
 16152 000024F9 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			; attributes to create
 16153 000024FB E85AFD                  	call	GetExtended		; get extended FCB

 16161                                  ;BREAK <$FCB_Random_write_Block - write a block of records to a file >

 16165                                  ;	and write a number of blocks from it.

 16223 00002517 E959FD                  	jmp	FCBIO
 16224

 16257                                  ;============================================================================
 16258                                  ; SEARCH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 16264
