 18564                                  ;Break	<FastOpen_Update - update dir info in fastopen>
 18565                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18566                                  ; Procedure Name : FastOpen_Update
 18567                                  ;
 18568                                  ; Inputs:
 18569                                  ;	DL     drive number (A=0,B=1,,,)
 18570                                  ;	CX     first cluster #
 18571                                  ;	AH     0 updates dir entry
 18572                                  ;	       1 updates CLUSNUM , BP = new CLUSNUM
 18573                                  ;	ES:DI  directory entry
 18574                                  ; Function:
 18575                                  ;	Call FastOpen to update the dir info.
 18576                                  ; Outputs:
 18577                                  ;	None
 18578                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18579                                  
 18580                                  FastOpen_Update:
 18581 00002CF2 9C                      	PUSHF			; save flag
 18582 00002CF3 56                      	PUSH	SI
 18583 00002CF4 53                      	PUSH	BX		; save regs
 18584 00002CF5 50                      	PUSH	AX
 18585 00002CF6 B004                    	MOV	AL,FONC_update	; al = 4
 18586 00002CF8 EBD4                    	JMP	short fastinvoke
 18587                                  
 18588                                  	; 17/05/2019
 18589                                  
 18590                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18591                                  ;entry Fast_Dispatch		; future fastxxxx entry	;AN000;
 18592                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18593                                  Fast_Dispatch:
 18594                                  ;hkn; FastTable is in DOSDATA
 18595 00002CFA BE[6512]                	MOV	SI,FastTable+2	; index to the	     ;AN000;
 18596                                  ;hkn; use SS override
 18597 00002CFD 36FF1C                  	CALL	far [SS:SI]	; RMFD call fastopen
 18598 00002D00 C3                      	retn
 18599                                  
 18600                                  ;============================================================================
 18601                                  ; RENAME.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 18602                                  ;============================================================================
 18603                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 18604                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18605                                  
 18606                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_RENAME - Internal RENAME call for MS-DOS
 18607                                  ;	NAME	DOS_RENAME
 18608                                  
 18609                                  ;**	Low level routine for renaming files
 18610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18611                                  ;	DOS_RENAME
 18612                                  ;
 18613                                  ;	Modification history:
 18614                                  ;
 18615                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 18616                                  
 18617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18618                                  ;
 18619                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 18620                                  ;
 18621                                  ; Inputs:
 18622                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 18623                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 18624                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 18625                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18626                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18627                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 18628                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 18629                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18630                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18631                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18632                                  ; Function:
 18633                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 18634                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 18635                                  ; Outputs:
 18636                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18637                                  ;	    OK
 18638                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18639                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18640                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 18641                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 18642                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 18643                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 18644                                  ;		error_access_denied
 18645                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 18646                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 18647                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 18648                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 18649                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 18650                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18651                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 18652                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 18653                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 18654                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 18655                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 18656                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 18657                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 18658                                  ;
 18659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18660                                  
 18661                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 18662                                  
 18663                                  DOS_RENAME:
 18664                                  
 18665                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up
 18666                                  ;hkn; at this point to DOSDATA.
 18667                                  
 18668 00002D01 E83DEB                  	call	TestNet
 18669 00002D04 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_RENAME
 18670                                  
 18671                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 18672                                  ;	transfer NET_RENAME
 18673                                  ;ELSE
 18674                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 18675                                  	;INT	2FH
 18676                                  	;return
 18677                                  
 18678 00002D06 B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 18679 00002D09 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 18680                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 18681                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 18682                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 18683                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 18684 00002D0B C3                      	retn
 18685                                  ;ENDIF
 18686                                  
 18687                                  LOCAL_RENAME:
 18688 00002D0C C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk ; 2
 18689 00002D11 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 18690 00002D15 8B3E[B405]              	MOV	DI,[REN_WFP]
 18691 00002D19 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 18692 00002D1B 8A25                    	MOV	AH,[DI]
 18693 00002D1D 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020H		; Lower case
 18694 00002D20 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH
 18695 00002D22 7405                    	JZ	short SAMEDRV
 18696 00002D24 B81100                  	MOV	AX,error_not_same_device ; 11h
 18697 00002D27 F9                      	STC
 18698 00002D28 C3                      	retn
 18699                                  
 18700                                  SAMEDRV:
 18701 00002D29 FF36[2E03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 18702 00002D2D FF36[2C03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD]
 18703 00002D31 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	[DMAADD+2],DS
 18704                                  
 18705                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 18706 00002D35 C706[2C03][2006]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],RENAMEDMA
 18707 00002D3B C606[7005]00            	MOV	byte [FOUND_DEV],0	; Rename fails on DEVS, assume not a dev
 18708 00002D40 E8C0EB                  	call	ECritDisk
 18709 00002D43 E8F505                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST	; Sets [NoSetDir] to 1, [CURBUF+2]:BX
 18710                                  					;    points to entry
 18711 00002D46 7314                    	JNC	short Check_Dev
 18712 00002D48 83F812                  	CMP	AX,error_no_more_files ; 12h
 18713 00002D4B 7503                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 18714 00002D4D B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found ; 2
 18715                                  GOTERR:
 18716 00002D50 F9                      	STC
 18717                                  RENAME_POP:
 18718 00002D51 8F06[2C03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD]
 18719 00002D55 8F06[2E03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 18720                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18721                                  	;retn
 18722                                  	; 16/12/2022
 18723 00002D59 E9D4EB                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18724                                  
 18725                                  Check_Dev:
 18726                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18727                                  	;mov	ax,5
 18728 00002D5C B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; Assume error
 18729                                  	
 18730                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18731 00002D5F 1E                      	PUSH	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 18732 00002D60 C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		      ;PTM.  chek if source a dir   ;AN000;
 18733                                  	;add	si,21
 18734 00002D64 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 18735                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 18736 00002D67 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;PTM.	    ;AN000;
 18737 00002D6B 7407                    	JZ	short notdir		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 18738 00002D6D 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		      ;PTM.  if yes, make sure path ;AN000;
 18739 00002D71 E8CEFA                  	call	Check_PathLen2		      ;PTM.   length < 67	    ;AN000;
 18740                                  notdir:
 18741 00002D74 1F                      	POP	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 18742 00002D75 77D9                    	JA	short GOTERR		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 18743                                  
 18744                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 18745 00002D77 803E[7005]00            	CMP	byte [FOUND_DEV],0
 18746 00002D7C 75D2                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 18747                                  
 18748                                  ; At this point a source has been found. There is search continuation info (a
 18749                                  ; la DOS_SEARCH_NEXT) for the source at RENAMEDMA, together with the first
 18750                                  ; directory entry found.
 18751                                  ; [THISCDS], [THISDPB], and [THISDRV] are set and will remain correct
 18752                                  ; throughout the RENAME since it is known at this point that the source and
 18753                                  ; destination are both on the same device.
 18754                                  ; [SATTRIB] is also set.
 18755                                  
 18756 00002D7E 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 18757                                  	;add	si,26
 18758 00002D80 83C61A                  	ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first
 18759 00002D83 E8CFFE                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 18760 00002D86 7305                    	JNC	short REN_OK1
 18761 00002D88 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 18762 00002D8B EBC4                    	JMP	short RENAME_POP
 18763                                  
 18764                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18765                                  ; Check if the source is a file or directory. If file, delete the entry
 18766                                  ; from the Fastopen cache. If directory, rename it later
 18767                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18768                                  
 18769                                  REN_OK1:				;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
 18770                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18771 00002D8D 56                      	PUSH	SI
 18772 00002D8E C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;BN00X; PTM. check if source a dir ;AN000;
 18773                                  	;add	si,21
 18774 00002D92 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	;;BN00XPTM.P5520		;AN000;
 18775                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 18776 00002D95 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;;BN00XPTM. ;AN000;
 18777 00002D99 7403                    	JZ	short NOT_DIR1		;;BN00XPTM.			;AN000;
 18778 00002D9B 5E                      	POP	SI			;BN00X
 18779 00002D9C EB04                    	JMP	SHORT SWAP_SOURCE	;BN00X
 18780                                  NOT_DIR1:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 18781 00002D9E 5E                      	POP	SI
 18782                                  
 18783                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)	
 18784 00002D9F E821FF                  	call	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 18785                                  SWAP_SOURCE:
 18786                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 18787                                  	;MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]
 18788                                  	;MOV	[WFP_START],SI
 18789                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18790 00002DA2 A1[B205]                	MOV	AX,[WFP_START]		; Swap source and destination
 18791 00002DA5 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		; Swap source and destination
 18792 00002DA9 8936[B205]              	MOV	[WFP_START],SI		; WFP_START = Destination path
 18793 00002DAD A3[B405]                	MOV	[REN_WFP],AX		; REN_WFP   = Source path
 18794                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 18795 00002DB0 C706[B605]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1	; No current dir on dest
 18796                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 18797 00002DB6 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0FFh  ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 18798                                  					; A rename is like a CREATE_NEW as far
 18799                                  					; as the destination is concerned.
 18800 00002DBC E85F17                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 18801                                  
 18802                                  ;   If this GETPATH fails due to file not found, we know all renames will work
 18803                                  ;   since no files match the destination name. If it fails for any other
 18804                                  ;   reason, the rename fails on a path not found, or whatever (also fails if
 18805                                  ;   we find a device or directory). If the GETPATH succeeds, we aren't sure
 18806                                  ;   if the rename should fail because we haven't built an explicit name by
 18807                                  ;   substituting for the meta chars in it. In this case the destination file
 18808                                  ;   spec with metas is in [NAME1] and the explicit source name is at RENAMEDMA
 18809                                  ;   in the directory entry part.
 18810                                  	
 18811 00002DBF 7223                    	JC	short NODEST
 18812                                  	
 18813                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18814                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC 		; Dest string is a directory	;AC000;
 18815                                  	; !! MSDOS 3.3 !!
 18816                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC ; !!	; Dest string is a directory
 18817                                  
 18818 00002DC1 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Device?
 18819 00002DC3 792C                    	JNS	short SAVEDEST		; No, continue
 18820                                  BAD_ACC:
 18821 00002DC5 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 18822 00002DC8 F9                      	STC
 18823                                  RENAME_CLEAN:
 18824 00002DC9 9C                      	PUSHF				; Save carry state
 18825 00002DCA 50                      	PUSH	AX			; and error code (if carry set)
 18826 00002DCB A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 18827 00002DCE E8A232                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 18828 00002DD1 58                      	POP	AX
 18829 00002DD2 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 18830 00002DD7 7504                    	JNZ	short BAD_ERR		; User FAILed to I 24
 18831 00002DD9 9D                      	POPF
 18832 00002DDA E974FF                  	JMP	RENAME_POP
 18833                                  
 18834                                  BAD_ERR:
 18835 00002DDD 58                      	POP	AX			; Saved flags
 18836                                  	; 16/12/202
 18837                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18838                                  BAD_PATH: ; *
 18839 00002DDE B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 18840 00002DE1 E96CFF                  	JMP	GOTERR
 18841                                  
 18842                                  NODEST:
 18843 00002DE4 75F8                    	JNZ	short BAD_PATH
 18844 00002DE6 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 18845 00002DEB 75F1                    	JNZ	short BAD_PATH		; Search for dest failed 
 18846                                  					; because user FAILed on I 24
 18847                                  	; 14/11/2022
 18848 00002DED 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 18849                                  	;JNZ	short SAVEDEST
 18850                                  	; 17/05/2019
 18851 00002DEF 74ED                    	jz	short BAD_PATH ; *
 18852                                  ;BAD_PATH: ; *
 18853                                  ;	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 18854                                  ;	;STC
 18855                                  ;	;JMP	RENAME_POP
 18856                                  ;	; 17/05/2019
 18857                                  ;	jmp	GOTERR 
 18858                                  
 18859                                  ; 16/12/2022
 18860                                  %if 0
 18861                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18862                                  	or	cl,cl
 18863                                  	jnz	short SAVEDEST
 18864                                  	;jz	short BAD_PATH ; *
 18865                                  BAD_PATH: ; *
 18866                                  	;mov	ax,3
 18867                                  	mov	ax,error_path_not_found
 18868                                  	stc
 18869                                  	jmp	RENAME_POP
 18870                                  %endif
 18871                                  
 18872                                  SAVEDEST:
 18873 00002DF1 16                      	push	ss
 18874 00002DF2 07                      	pop	es
 18875                                  
 18876                                  ;hkn; NAME1 & NAME2 is in DOSDATA
 18877 00002DF3 BF[5705]                	MOV	DI,NAME2
 18878 00002DF6 BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1
 18879                                  
 18880 00002DF9 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 18881 00002DFC F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB			; Save dest with metas at NAME2
 18882 00002DFE A1[C205]                	MOV	AX,[DIRSTART]
 18883 00002E01 A3[6405]                	MOV	[DESTSTART],AX
 18884                                  BUILDDEST:
 18885 00002E04 16                      	push	ss
 18886 00002E05 07                      	pop	es			; needed due to JMP BUILDDEST below
 18887                                  
 18888                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA, NAME1, NAME2 in DOSDATA
 18889 00002E06 BB[3506]                	MOV	BX,RENAMEDMA+21		; Source of replace chars
 18890 00002E09 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1		; Real dest name goes here
 18891 00002E0C BE[5705]                	MOV	SI,NAME2		; Raw dest
 18892                                  
 18893 00002E0F B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 18894                                  
 18895                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18896                                  	
 18897                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18898 00002E12 E81201                  	CALL	NEW_RENAME		;IFS. replace ? chars	;AN000;
 18899                                  
 18900                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 18901                                  
 18902                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 18903                                  ; MSDOS 6.0 
 18904                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18905                                  ;Procedure: NEW_RENAME
 18906                                  ;
 18907                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 18908                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 18909                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 18910                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 18911                                  ;	   put in destination string
 18912                                  ;Output: ES:DI-> new string
 18913                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18914                                  ;
 18915                                  ;NEW_RENAME:
 18916                                  ;NEWNAM:
 18917                                  ;	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 341Ah
 18918                                  ;	LODSB
 18919                                  ;	CMP	AL,"?"
 18920                                  ;	JNZ	short NOCHG
 18921                                  ;	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 18922                                  ;NOCHG:
 18923                                  ;	STOSB
 18924                                  ;	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 18925                                  ;	LOOP	NEWNAM
 18926                                  ;	; MSDOS 6.0
 18927                                  ;	;retn
 18928                                  
 18929                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 18930                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 18931 00002E15 C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_all	; Stop duplicates with any attributes
 18932 00002E1A C606[7E05]FF            	MOV	byte [CREATING],0FFH
 18933 00002E1F E8AA19                  	call	DEVNAME 		; Check if we built a device name
 18934 00002E22 73A1                    	JNC	short BAD_ACC
 18935 00002E24 8B1E[6405]              	MOV	BX,[DESTSTART]
 18936 00002E28 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 18937 00002E2C E88C16                  	call	SETDIRSRCH		; Reset search to start of dir
 18938 00002E2F 7294                    	JC	short BAD_ACC 		; Screw up
 18939 00002E31 E84615                  	call	FINDENTRY		; See if new name already exists
 18940 00002E34 738F                    	JNC	short BAD_ACC 		; Error if found
 18941 00002E36 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 18942 00002E3B 752A                    	JNZ	short BAD_ACCJ		; Find failed because user FAILed to I 24
 18943 00002E3D A1[6405]                	MOV	AX,[DESTSTART]		; DIRSTART of dest
 18944 00002E40 3B06[2F06]              	CMP	AX,[RENAMEDMA+15]	; DIRSTART of source
 18945 00002E44 745D                    	JZ	short SIMPLE_RENAME	; If =, just give new name
 18946                                  
 18947                                  	;mov	al,[RENAMEDMA+32]
 18948 00002E46 A0[4006]                	MOV	AL,[RENAMEDMA+21+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 18949 00002E49 A810                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory ; 10h
 18950 00002E4B 751A                    	JNZ	short BAD_ACCJ		; Can only do a simple rename on dirs,
 18951                                  					; otherwise the . and .. entries get
 18952                                  					; wiped.
 18953 00002E4D A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 18954 00002E50 8C1E[A005]              	MOV	[THISSFT+2],DS
 18955                                  
 18956                                  ;hkn; AUXSTACK is in DOSDATA
 18957                                  	;mov	si,[RENAMEDMA+145h]
 18958 00002E54 BE[6507]                	MOV	SI,AUXSTACK-SF_ENTRY.size  ; RENAMEDMA+325
 18959 00002E57 8936[9E05]              	MOV	[THISSFT],SI
 18960                                  	;mov	word [SI+2],2
 18961 00002E5B C744020200              	MOV	word [SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 18962 00002E60 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX			; Set "device ID" for call into makenode
 18963 00002E62 E84521                  	call	RENAME_MAKE		; This is in mknode
 18964 00002E65 7303                    	JNC	short GOT_DEST
 18965                                  BAD_ACCJ:
 18966 00002E67 E95BFF                  	JMP	BAD_ACC
 18967                                  
 18968                                  GOT_DEST:
 18969 00002E6A 53                      	push	bx
 18970 00002E6B C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; RENAME_MAKE entered this into sharing
 18971 00002E6F E8244B                  	call	ShareEnd		; we need to remove it.
 18972 00002E72 5B                      	pop	bx
 18973                                  
 18974                                  ; A zero length entry with the correct new name has now been made at
 18975                                  ;   [CURBUF+2]:BX.
 18976                                  
 18977 00002E73 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 18978                                  
 18979                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18980                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 18981 00002E77 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 18982                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 18983 00002E7C 7508                    	JNZ	short yesdirty1		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 18984 00002E7E E8F732                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 18985                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 18986 00002E81 26804D0540              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18987                                  yesdirty1:
 18988 00002E86 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 18989                                  	;add	di,11
 18990 00002E88 83C70B                  	ADD	DI,dir_entry.dir_attr	; Skip name
 18991                                  
 18992                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 18993                                  	;mov	si,[RENAMEDMA+32]
 18994 00002E8B BE[4006]                	MOV	SI,RENAMEDMA+21+dir_entry.dir_attr
 18995                                  	;mov	cx,21
 18996 00002E8E B91500                  	MOV	CX,dir_entry.size-dir_entry.dir_attr
 18997 00002E91 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB
 18998 00002E93 E87B00                  	CALL	GET_SOURCE
 18999 00002E96 7276                    	JC	short RENAME_OVER
 19000 00002E98 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19001 00002E9A 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 19002 00002E9E B0E5                    	MOV	AL,DIRFREE ; 0E5h
 19003 00002EA0 AA                      	STOSB				; "free" the source
 19004 00002EA1 EB13                    	JMP	SHORT DIRTY_IT
 19005                                  
 19006                                  SIMPLE_RENAME:
 19007 00002EA3 E86B00                  	CALL	GET_SOURCE		; Get the source back
 19008 00002EA6 7266                    	JC	short RENAME_OVER
 19009 00002EA8 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19010 00002EAA 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 19011                                  
 19012                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 19013 00002EAE BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1		; New Name
 19014 00002EB1 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 19015 00002EB4 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB
 19016                                  DIRTY_IT:
 19017 00002EB6 8B3E[E205]              	MOV	DI,[CURBUF]
 19018                                  
 19019                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19020 00002EBA 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19021                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 19022 00002EBF 7508                    	JNZ	short yesdirty2		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 19023 00002EC1 E8B432                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 19024                                  	
 19025 00002EC4 26804D0540              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 19026                                  
 19027                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19028                                  ; Check if the source is a directory of file. If directory rename it to the
 19029                                  ; the new name in the Fastopen cache buffer. If file name it has been
 19030                                  ; previously deleted.
 19031                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19032                                  
 19033                                  yesdirty2:
 19034                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19035 00002EC9 56                      	PUSH	SI
 19036 00002ECA C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;;BN00XPTM. chek if source a dir ;AN000;
 19037 00002ECE 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	;;BN00XPTM.P5520		;AN000;
 19038 00002ED1 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;;BN00XPTM.	;AN000;
 19039 00002ED5 7406                    	JZ	short NOT_DIR2		;;BN00XPTM.			;AN000;
 19040 00002ED7 E8FEFD                  	call	FastOpen_Rename		;;BN00X rename dir entry in fastopen
 19041 00002EDA 5E                      	POP	SI
 19042 00002EDB EB01                    	JMP	SHORT NOT_DIRTY1
 19043                                  NOT_DIR2:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19044 00002EDD 5E                      	POP	SI
 19045                                  NOT_DIRTY1:				;;BN00X
 19046                                  NEXT_SOURCE:
 19047                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19048 00002EDE BE[2106]                	MOV	SI,RENAMEDMA+1		;Name
 19049                                  
 19050                                  ; WARNING! Rename_Next leaves the disk critical section *ALWAYS*. We need
 19051                                  ; to enter it before going to RENAME_Next.
 19052                                  
 19053 00002EE1 E81FEA                  	call	ECritDisk
 19054 00002EE4 C606[7E05]00            	MOV	byte [CREATING],0 ; Correct setting for search (we changed it
 19055                                  				  ;  to FF when we made the prev new file).
 19056 00002EE9 E88705                  	call	RENAME_NEXT
 19057                                  
 19058                                  ; Note, now, that we have exited the previous ENTER and so are back to where
 19059                                  ; we were before.
 19060                                  
 19061 00002EEC 7220                    	JC	short RENAME_OVER
 19062                                  
 19063                                  	;lea	si,[bx+26]
 19064 00002EEE 8D771A                  	LEA	SI,[BX+dir_entry.dir_first]
 19065 00002EF1 E861FD                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19066 00002EF4 7306                    	JNC	short REN_OK2
 19067 00002EF6 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation ; 20h
 19068                                  jmp_to_rename_clean: ; 28/12/2022
 19069 00002EF9 E9CDFE                  	JMP	RENAME_CLEAN ; 10/08/2018
 19070                                  
 19071                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19072                                  ; Check if file or directory. If file, delete file from the Fastopen cache,
 19073                                  ; if directory, rename directory name in the Fastopen cache.
 19074                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19075                                  
 19076                                  REN_OK2:
 19077                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19078                                  	;mov	al,[RERNAMEDMA+32]
 19079 00002EFC A0[4006]                	MOV	AL,[RENAMEDMA+21+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; PTR P5622
 19080                                  	;test	al,10h
 19081 00002EFF A810                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory	;;BN00X directory
 19082 00002F01 7406                    	JZ	short Ren_Directory	;;BN00X no - file, delete it
 19083                                  	
 19084                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19085 00002F03 E8BDFD                  	call	FastOpen_Delete 	;;BN00X delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 19086                                  jmp_to_builddest: ; 28/12/2022
 19087 00002F06 E9FBFE                  	JMP	BUILDDEST		;;BN00X
 19088                                  
 19089                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19090                                  Ren_Directory:
 19091 00002F09 E8CCFD                  	call	FastOpen_Rename 	;;BN00X delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 19092                                  	;JMP	BUILDDEST
 19093                                  	; 28/12/2022
 19094 00002F0C EBF8                    	jmp	short jmp_to_builddest
 19095                                  
 19096                                  RENAME_OVER:
 19097 00002F0E F8                      	CLC
 19098                                  	;JMP	RENAME_CLEAN ; 10/08/2018
 19099                                  	; 28/12/2022
 19100 00002F0F EBE8                    	jmp	short jmp_to_rename_clean
 19101                                  
 19102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19103                                  ; Procedure: GET_SOURCE
 19104                                  ;
 19105                                  ; Inputs:
 19106                                  ;	RENAMEDMA has source info
 19107                                  ; Function:
 19108                                  ;	Re-find the source
 19109                                  ; Output:
 19110                                  ;	[CURBUF] set
 19111                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX points to entry
 19112                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 19113                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19115                                  
 19116                                  GET_SOURCE:
 19117 00002F11 8B1E[2F06]              	MOV	BX,[RENAMEDMA+15]	; DirStart
 19118 00002F15 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 19119 00002F19 E89F15                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 19120 00002F1C 7214                    	JC	short gs_ret_label	; retc
 19121 00002F1E E88A18                  	call	STARTSRCH
 19122 00002F21 A1[2D06]                	MOV	AX,[RENAMEDMA+13]	; Lastent
 19123                                  	;call	GETENT
 19124                                  	; 18/12/2022
 19125 00002F24 E96515                  	jmp	GETENT
 19126                                  ;gs_ret_label:
 19127                                  	;retn
 19128                                  
 19129                                  ; MSDOS 6.0 
 19130                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19131                                  ;Procedure: NEW_RENAME
 19132                                  ;
 19133                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19134                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 19135                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 19136                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 19137                                  ;	   put in destination string
 19138                                  ;Output: ES:DI-> new string
 19139                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19140                                  
 19141                                  NEW_RENAME:
 19142                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19143                                  NEWNAM:
 19144                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19145 00002F27 AC                      	LODSB
 19146 00002F28 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?" ; 3Fh
 19147 00002F2A 7502                    	JNZ	short NOCHG
 19148 00002F2C 8A07                    	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 19149                                  NOCHG:
 19150 00002F2E AA                      	STOSB
 19151 00002F2F 43                      	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 19152 00002F30 E2F5                    	LOOP	NEWNAM
 19153                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19154                                  gs_ret_label:	; 18/12/2022
 19155 00002F32 C3                      	retn

 19163                                  ;**	Low level routines for returning file information and setting file
 19164                                  ;	attributes
 19165                                  ;
 19166                                  ;	GET_FILE_INFO
 19167                                  ;	SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19168                                  ;
 19169                                  ;	Modification history:
 19170                                  ;
 19171                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19172                                  ;
 19173                                  ;	M025: Return access_denied if attempting to set
 19174                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.
 19175                                  ;
 19176                                  
 19177                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19178                                  
 19179                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19180                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19181                                  ;
 19182                                  ; Inputs:
 19183                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19184                                  ;		terminated)
 19185                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19186                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19187                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19188                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19189                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19190                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19191                                  ; Function:
 19192                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19193                                  ; Returns:
 19194                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19195                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19196                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19197                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19198                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19199                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19200                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19201                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19202                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19203                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19204                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19205                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19206                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19207                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19208                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19209                                  
 19210                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19211                                  
 19212                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 19213                                  
 19214                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 19215                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19216                                  
 19217 00002F33 E80BE9                  	call	TestNet
 19218 00002F36 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 19219                                  
 19220                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19221                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 19222                                  ;ELSE
 19223                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 19224                                  ;	INT	2FH
 19225                                  ;	return
 19226                                  
 19227 00002F38 B80F11                  	mov     ax, 110Fh
 19228 00002F3B CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19229                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19230                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19231                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = file attributes
 19232 00002F3D C3                      	retn
 19233                                  ;ENDIF
 19234                                  
 19235                                  LOCAL_INFO:
 19236 00002F3E E8C2E9                  	call	ECritDisk
 19237 00002F41 C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1	; if we find a dir, don't change to it
 19238                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19239                                  	;call	GETPATH
 19240                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19241 00002F46 E8D800                  	call	GET_FAST_PATH
 19242                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19243 00002F49 7312                    	JNC	short info_check_dev
 19244                                  NO_PATH:
 19245 00002F4B 750B                    	JNZ	short bad_path1
 19246 00002F4D 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 19247 00002F4F 7407                    	JZ	short bad_path1
 19248                                  info_no_file:
 19249 00002F51 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 19250                                  BadRet:
 19251 00002F54 F9                      	STC
 19252                                  JustRet:
 19253                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19254                                  	;retn
 19255                                  	; 18/12/2022
 19256 00002F55 E9D8E9                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19257                                  
 19258                                  bad_path1:
 19259 00002F58 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 19260 00002F5B EBF7                    	jmp	short BadRet
 19261                                  
 19262                                  info_check_dev:
 19263 00002F5D 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 19264 00002F5F 78F0                    	JS	short info_no_file	; device
 19265                                  
 19266                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19267                                  ;SR;
 19268                                  ; If root dir then CurBuf == -1. Check for this case and return subdir attr
 19269                                  ;for a root dir
 19270                                  
 19271 00002F61 833E[E205]FF            	cmp	word [CURBUF],-1	;is it a root dir?
 19272 00002F66 7506                    	jne	short not_root		;no, CurBuf ptr is valid
 19273                                  
 19274 00002F68 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 19275 00002F6A B010                    	mov	al,attr_directory ; 10h
 19276                                  	;clc
 19277                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19278                                  	; (DOSCODE:683Eh)
 19279                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19280                                  	;clc
 19281 00002F6C EBE7                    	jmp	short JustRet
 19282                                  
 19283                                  not_root:
 19284                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19285 00002F6E 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 19286 00002F6F 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 19287 00002F73 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19288 00002F75 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			; Assume size=0 (dir)
 19289 00002F77 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19290                                  	;mov	cx,[si+16h]
 19291 00002F79 8B4C16                  	MOV	CX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_time]
 19292                                  	;mov	dx,[si+18h]
 19293 00002F7C 8B5418                  	MOV	DX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_date]
 19294 00002F7F 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 19295                                  	;mov	al,[si+0Bh]
 19296 00002F81 8A440B                  	MOV	AL,[SI+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 19297                                  	;test	al,10h
 19298 00002F84 A810                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory
 19299 00002F86 7506                    	JNZ	short NO_SIZE
 19300                                  	;mov	di,[si+1Ch]
 19301 00002F88 8B7C1C                  	MOV	DI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_size_l]
 19302                                  	;mov	bx,[si+1Eh]
 19303 00002F8B 8B5C1E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_size_h]
 19304                                  NO_SIZE:
 19305 00002F8E 1F                      	POP	DS
 19306                                  	;CLC
 19307                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19308                                  	; (DOSCODE:6864h)
 19309                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19310                                  	;clc
 19311 00002F8F EBC4                    	jmp	short JustRet
 19312                                  
 19313                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 19314                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19315                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19316                                  ; Inputs:
 19317                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19318                                  ;		terminated)
 19319                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19320                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19321                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19322                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19323                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19324                                  ;	[SATTRIB] is attribute of search (determines what files may be found)
 19325                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 19326                                  ; Function:
 19327                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 19328                                  ; Returns:
 19329                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19330                                  ;	    No error
 19331                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19332                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19333                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19334                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19335                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19336                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19337                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19338                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19339                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19340                                  ;			Attempt to set an attribute which cannot be set
 19341                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 19342                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19343                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 19344                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 19345                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 19346                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19347                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19348                                  
 19349                                  SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE:
 19350                                  
 19351                                  ;hkn; set_file_attr is called from file.asm. DS has been set 
 19352                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19353                                  
 19354 00002F91 A9D8FF                  	TEST	AX,~attr_changeable ; 0FFD8h
 19355 00002F94 7414                    	JZ	short set_look
 19356                                  _BAD_ACC:
 19357 00002F96 C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 19358 00002F9B C606[2703]07            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_CLASS],errCLASS_Apperr ; 7
 19359 00002FA0 C606[2603]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_ACTION],errACT_Abort ; 4
 19360 00002FA5 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied ; 5
 19361 00002FA8 F9                      	STC
 19362 00002FA9 C3                      	retn
 19363                                  
 19364                                  set_look:
 19365 00002FAA E894E8                  	call	TestNet
 19366 00002FAD 7308                    	JNC	short LOCAL_SET
 19367                                  
 19368                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19369                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19370                                  ;ELSE
 19371 00002FAF 50                      	PUSH	AX
 19372                                  	
 19373                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 14
 19374                                  	;INT	2FH
 19375                                  
 19376 00002FB0 B80E11                  	mov     ax, 110Eh
 19377 00002FB3 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - SET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19378                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19379                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19380                                  			; STACK: WORD new file attributes
 19381                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19382                                  
 19383 00002FB5 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 19384 00002FB6 C3                      	retn
 19385                                  ;ENDIF
 19386                                  
 19387                                  LOCAL_SET:
 19388 00002FB7 E849E9                  	call	ECritDisk
 19389 00002FBA 50                      	PUSH	AX			; Save new attributes
 19390 00002FBB C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1	; if we find a dir, don't change to it
 19391 00002FC0 E85515                  	call	GETPATH 		; get path through fastopen if there	;AC000;
 19392 00002FC3 7303                    	JNC	short set_check_device
 19393 00002FC5 5B                      	POP	BX			; Clean stack (don't zap AX)
 19394 00002FC6 EB83                    	JMP	short NO_PATH
 19395                                  
 19396                                  set_check_device:
 19397 00002FC8 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 19398 00002FCA 7906                    	JNS	short set_check_share
 19399 00002FCC 58                      	POP	AX
 19400 00002FCD E860E9                  	call	LCritDisk
 19401 00002FD0 EBC4                    	JMP	short _BAD_ACC 		; device
 19402                                  
 19403                                  set_check_share:
 19404 00002FD2 58                      	POP	AX			; Get new attributes
 19405                                  
 19406                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19407 00002FD3 833E[E205]FF            	cmp	word [CURBUF], -1	; M025: Q: is this the root dir
 19408 00002FD8 740A                    	je	short cannot_set_root	; M025: Y: return error
 19409                                  
 19410                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19411 00002FDA E878FC                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19412 00002FDD 730B                    	JNC	short set_do
 19413 00002FDF B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation ; 32
 19414 00002FE2 EB3A                    	jmp	short OK_BYE
 19415                                  
 19416                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19417                                  cannot_set_root:			; M025:
 19418 00002FE4 B80500                  	mov	ax,error_access_denied	; M025: return error is attempting
 19419 00002FE7 F9                      	stc				; M025: to set attr. of root
 19420 00002FE8 EB34                    	jmp	short OK_BYE		; M025:
 19421                                  
 19422                                  set_do:
 19423                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19424 00002FEA C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 19425 00002FEE 2680670BD8              	AND	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],~attr_changeable ; 0D8h
 19426 00002FF3 2608470B                	OR	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],AL
 19427                                  
 19428                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19429 00002FF7 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19430                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 19431 00002FFC 7508                    	JNZ	short yesdirty3		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 19432 00002FFE E87731                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 19433                                  	
 19434 00003001 26804D0540              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 19435                                  yesdirty3:
 19436 00003006 A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 19437                                  ;;;; 10/1/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 19438 00003009 52                      	PUSH	DX
 19439 0000300A 57                      	PUSH	DI
 19440 0000300B B400                    	MOV	AH,0		  ; dir entry update
 19441 0000300D 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL		  ; drive number A=0,B=1,,
 19442 0000300F 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX		  ; ES:DI -> dir entry
 19443 00003011 E8DEFC                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 19444 00003014 5F                      	POP	DI
 19445 00003015 5A                      	POP	DX
 19446                                  ;;;; 9/11/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 19447 00003016 E85A30                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 19448 00003019 7303                    	JNC	short OK_BYE
 19449 0000301B B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 19450                                  OK_BYE:
 19451                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19452                                  	;retn
 19453                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19454 0000301E E90FE9                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19455                                  
 19456                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19457                                  
 19458                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19459                                  GET_FAST_PATH:
 19460                                  ;hkn; use SS override for FastOpenFlg
 19461 00003021 36800E[6D12]01          	OR	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set
 19462                                  					;FO. trigger fastopen	;AN000;
 19463 00003027 E8EE14                  	call	GETPATH
 19464 0000302A 9C                      	PUSHF			 	;FO.			;AN000;
 19465 0000302B 368026[6D12]80          	AND	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes 
 19466                                  					;FO. clear all fastopen flags ;AN000;
 19467 00003031 9D                      	POPF				;FO.			;AN000;
 19468 00003032 C3                      	retn

 19471                                  ; DUP.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19472                                  ;============================================================================
 19473                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19474                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19475                                  
 19476                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 19477                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 19478                                  ;
 19479                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 19480                                  ;
 19481                                  ;	Modification history:
 19482                                  ;
 19483                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19484                                  
 19485                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 19486                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19487                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 19488                                  ;
 19489                                  ; Inputs:
 19490                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 19491                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 19492                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 19493                                  ; Function:
 19494                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 19495                                  ; Returns:
 19496                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 19497                                  ;    Carry clear
 19498                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 19499                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 19500                                  ; NOTE:
 19501                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 19502                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 19503                                  ;	that time.
 19504                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19505                                  
 19506                                  DOS_DUP:
 19507                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 19508                                  
 19509                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19510 00003033 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 19511 00003038 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 19512                                  
 19513                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 19514                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 19515 0000303D E81AE8                  	call	IsSFTNet
 19516 00003040 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 19517 00003042 E8A01B                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 19518                                  DO_INC:
 19519                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 19520 00003045 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 19521                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 19522 00003048 C3                      	retn

 19530                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 19531                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 19532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19533                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 19534                                  ;
 19535                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 19536                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 19537                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 19538                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 19539                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 19540                                  ;
 19541                                  ;	Revision history:
 19542                                  ;
 19543                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 19544                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 19545                                  
 19546                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 19547                                  
 19548                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 19549                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 19550                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 19551                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 19552                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 19553                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 19554                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 19555                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 19556                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 19557                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 19558                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 19559                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 19560                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 19561                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 19562                                  
 19563                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 19564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19565                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 19566                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 19567                                  ;
 19568                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 19569                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 19570                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19571                                  ;			terminated)
 19572                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19573                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19574                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19575                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19576                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19577                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 19578                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 19579                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19580                                  ;
 19581                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 19582                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 19583                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 19584                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 19585                                  ;		CARRY SET
 19586                                  ;		    AX is error code
 19587                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 19588                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19589                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 19590                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 19591                                  ;			error_access_denied
 19592                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 19593                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 19594                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 19595                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 19596                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 19597                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 19598                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19599                                  
 19600                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19601                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 19602                                  
 19603                                  DOS_CREATE:
 19604                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19605                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19606                                  
 19607                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 19608                                  ;hkn; this point.
 19609                                  
 19610 00003049 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 19611                                  
 19612                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 19613                                  ;
 19614                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 19615                                  
 19616                                  Create_inter:
 19617 0000304B A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 19618                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 19619 0000304D 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 19620 0000304F A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 19621 00003051 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 19622                                  	
 19623                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19624                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19625 00003053 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 19626                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19627                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 19628                                  	
 19629 00003058 B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 19630                                  NoReset:
 19631 0000305A 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20 h
 19632 0000305C A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 19633 0000305E 740A                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 19634                                  AttErr:
 19635 00003060 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 19636 00003063 C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 19637 00003068 EB66                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 19638                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 19639                                  ATT_OK:
 19640 0000306A C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 19641 0000306E 06                      	PUSH	ES
 19642 0000306F C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 19643 00003073 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 19644 00003076 751D                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 19645                                  
 19646                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 19647                                  
 19648 00003078 07                      	POP	ES
 19649                                  
 19650                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19651                                  ;Extended open hooks
 19652                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 19653 00003079 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 19654 0000307E 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 19655                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 19656 00003080 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 19657                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 19658 00003081 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 19659 00003084 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 19660 00003086 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 19661 00003087 C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.
 19662 0000308C C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
 19663                                  NOEXTOP:				    ;AN000;
 19664                                  ;Extended open hooks
 19665                                  
 19666                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19667                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_CREATE
 19668                                  ;ELSE
 19669 0000308D 50                      	PUSH	AX
 19670                                  
 19671                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 24
 19672                                  	;INT	2FH
 19673                                  
 19674 0000308E B81811                  	mov     ax,1118h
 19675 00003091 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE FILE
 19676                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 19677                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19678                                  			; STACK: WORD file creation mode???
 19679                                  
 19680 00003093 5B                      	POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 19681 00003094 C3                      	retn
 19682                                  ;ENDIF
 19683                                  
 19684                                  ;	We have a CDS. See if it's network
 19685                                  
 19686                                  TEST_RE_NET:
 19687                                  	;;test	word [es:si+43h],8000h
 19688                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 19689                                  	; 07/12/2022
 19690                                  	;test	byte [es:si+44h],80h
 19691                                  	; 17/12/2022
 19692 00003095 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 19693 0000309A 07                      	POP	ES
 19694 0000309B 7419                    	JZ	short LOCAL_CREATE
 19695                                  
 19696                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19697 0000309D E8BF00                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode		    ;AN000;EO.
 19698 000030A0 7205                    	JC	SHORT dochk		    ;AN000;EO.
 19699                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 19700                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 19701                                  	; 17/12/2022
 19702 000030A2 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 19703                                  
 19704                                  ;Extended open hooks
 19705                                  dochk:
 19706 000030A7 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 19707 000030AC 75D2                    	JNZ	short IFS_extopen	    ;AN000;EO. yes, issue extended open
 19708                                  ;Extended open hooks
 19709                                  
 19710                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19711                                  ;	transfer NET_CREATE
 19712                                  ;ELSE
 19713 000030AE 50                      	PUSH	AX
 19714                                  	
 19715                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 23
 19716                                  	;INT	2FH
 19717                                  	
 19718 000030AF B81711                  	mov     ax,1117h
 19719 000030B2 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE REMOTE FILE
 19720                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 19721                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 19722                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19723                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19724                                  
 19725 000030B4 5B                      	POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 19726                                  ;nomore:
 19727 000030B5 C3                      	retn
 19728                                  ;ENDIF
 19729                                  
 19730                                  ;**	It's a local create. We have a local CDS for it.
 19731                                  
 19732                                  LOCAL_CREATE:
 19733                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19734 000030B6 E8A600                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode	;AN000;EO. set mode if from extended open
 19735 000030B9 7205                    	JC	short setdone	;AN000;EO.
 19736                                  	
 19737                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19738                                  	; 17/12/2022
 19739                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 19740                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 19741                                  	;or	byte [es:di+2],2
 19742 000030BB 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both	
 19743                                  setdone:
 19744 000030C0 E840E8                  	call	ECritDisk
 19745 000030C3 E8BE1E                  	call	MakeNode
 19746 000030C6 7317                    	JNC	short Create_ok
 19747 000030C8 C606[A10A]FF            	mov	byte [VOLCHNG_FLAG],-1	; indicate no change in volume label
 19748 000030CD E860E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 19749                                  
 19750                                  	;entry	SET_MKND_ERR
 19751                                  SET_MKND_ERR:
 19752                                  
 19753                                  ;	Looks up MakeNode errors and converts them. AL is MakeNode
 19754                                  ;	error, SI is GETPATH bad spot return if path_not_found error.
 19755                                  
 19756                                  ;hkn; CRTERRTAB is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE)
 19757 000030D0 BB[D730]                	MOV     BX,CRTERRTAB
 19758                                  	;XLAT  ; MSDOS 3.3
 19759                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19760 000030D3 2E                      	CS
 19761 000030D4 D7                      	XLAT
 19762                                  CreatBadRet:
 19763 000030D5 F9                      	STC
 19764 000030D6 C3                      	retn
