 19766                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19767                                  ; DOSCODE:69C4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19769                                  
 19770                                  ;** Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 19771                                  
 19772                                  ; 17/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19773                                  ; Offset 12B1h of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 19774                                  
 19775                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 19/07/2018 - MSDOS 3.3	
 19776                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h
 19777                                  
 19778                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 18/05/2019 - MSDOS 6.0	
 19779                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h,2
 19780                                  
 19781                                  ; 08/08/2018
 19782                                  
 19783                                  CRTERRTAB:	;LABEL BYTE	; Lookup table for MakeNode returns
 19784 000030D7 00                      	DB	0			; none
 19785 000030D8 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 19786 000030D9 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 19787 000030DA 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 19788 000030DB 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 19789 000030DC 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 19790 000030DD 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 19791                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19792 000030DE 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7
 19793                                  
 19794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19795                                  
 19796                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 19797                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 19798                                  ; file to the current size.
 19799                                  
 19800                                  ; If we created a volume id on the diskette, set the VOLCHNG_FLAG to logical
 19801                                  ; drive number to force a Build BPB after Media Check.
 19802                                  
 19803                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 19804                                  Create_ok:
 19805 000030DF E8E1FB                  	call	FastOpen_Delete
 19806                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86

 19808 000030E5 A808                    	test	al,attr_volume_id
 19809 000030E7 741C                    	jz	short NoVolLabel
 19810 000030E9 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 19811                                  	;mov	ah,[ES:DI+curdir.text]	; get drive letter
 19812 000030ED 268A25                  	mov	ah,[ES:DI] ; 09/08/2018
 19813 000030F0 80EC41                  	sub	ah,'A'	; 41h		; convert to drive number
 19814 000030F3 8826[A10A]              	mov	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],ah	;Set flag to indicate volid change
 19815                                  	
 19816                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19817                                  
 19818                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19819 000030F7 B701                    	MOV	BH,1			;AN000;>32mb set volume id to boot record
 19820 000030F9 E81F00                  	CALL	Set_Media_ID		;AN000;>32mb
 19821

 19829                                  ;if installed
 19830                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 19831 0000310C FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)] ; 14 = ShSU
 19832                                  ;else
 19833                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 19834                                  ;endif

 19838                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19839                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 19840                                  ;
 19841                                  ; Inputs:
 19842                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19843                                  ;		terminated)
 19844                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19845                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19846                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19847                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19848                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19849                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 19850                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 19851                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19852                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 19853                                  ; Function:
 19854                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 19855                                  ; Outputs:
 19856                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 19857                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19858                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 19859                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 19860                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19861                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19862                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19863                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19864                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19865                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19866                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19867                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 19868                                  ;		error_file_exists
 19869                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 19870                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19871                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19872                                  
 19873                                  DOS_Create_New:
 19874 00003116 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 19875 00003118 E930FF                  	JMP	Create_inter
 19876                                  
 19877                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 19878                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19879                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 19880                                  ;
 19881                                  ; Inputs:
 19882                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 19883                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 19884                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 19885                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP
 19886                                  ; Function:
 19887                                  ;	Set Volume ID to DOS 4.00 Boot record.
 19888                                  ; Outputs:
 19889                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19890                                  ;	    volume id set
 19891                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19892                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19893                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19894                                  
 19895                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19896                                  Set_Media_ID:
 19897 0000311B 50                      	PUSH	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19898 0000311C 06                      	PUSH	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 19899 0000311D 57                      	PUSH	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 19900                                  
 19901 0000311E FEC4                    	INC	AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive #
 19902 00003120 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive # (A=1,B=2,,,)
 19903 00003122 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb  generic IOCTL
 19904 00003124 B96608                  	MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id
 19905                                  
 19906                                  ;hkn; PACKET_TEMP is in DOSDATA
 19907 00003127 BA[BD0D]                	MOV	DX,Packet_Temp	;AN000;>32mb
 19908                                  
 19909 0000312A 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19910 0000312B 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19911 0000312C 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 19912                                  
 19913                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 19914 0000312E E840F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 19915                                  
 19916 00003131 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19917 00003132 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19918 00003133 7224                    	JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 19919                                  
 19920 00003135 08FF                    	OR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb delete volume id
 19921 00003137 7405                    	JZ	short NoName	;AN000;>32mb yes
 19922                                  
 19923                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 19924 00003139 BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1	;AN000;>32mb
 19925                                  
 19926 0000313C EB03                    	JMP	SHORT doset	;AN000;>32mb yes
 19927                                  NoName: 			;AN000;
 19928                                  
 19929                                  ;hkn; NO_NAME_ID is in DOSDATA
 19930 0000313E BE[0A0E]                	MOV	SI,NO_NAME_ID	;AN000;>32mb
 19931                                  
 19932                                  doset:				;AN000;
 19933 00003141 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19934                                  	;add	di,6
 19935 00003143 83C706                  	ADD	DI,MEDIA_ID_INFO.MEDIA_Label ;AN000;;>32mb
 19936                                  
 19937                                  ;hkn; ES & DS must point to SS
 19938                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 19939 00003146 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 19940                                  
 19941 00003147 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;;>32mb
 19942                                  
 19943                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb
 19944 00003148 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb
 19945                                  
 19946 00003149 07                      	POP	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 19947 0000314A B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11		;AN000;;>32mb
 19948 0000314D F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB		;AN000;;>32mb
 19949 0000314F B94608                  	MOV	CX,0846H	;AN001;;>32mb
 19950 00003152 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb
 19951 00003154 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 19952                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb  set volume id
 19953 00003156 E818F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 19954                                  geterr: 			;AN000;
 19955                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;>32mb
 19956 00003159 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;>32mb
 19957                                  
 19958 0000315A 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;>32mb   ds= dosgroup
 19959                                  
 19960 0000315B 5F                      	POP	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 19961 0000315C 07                      	POP	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 19962 0000315D 58                      	POP	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 19963 0000315E C3                      	retn			;AN000;>32mb
 19964

 19990                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 19991 0000316C 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 19992 00003170 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.

 19999                                  ;============================================================================
 20000                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20001                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20002                                  
 20003                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 20004                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 20005                                  
 20006                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 20007                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20008                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 20009                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 20010                                  ;
 20011                                  ;	DOS_Open
 20012                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 20013                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 20014                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 20015                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 20016                                  ;
 20017                                  ;	Revision history:
 20018                                  ;
 20019                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20020                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 20021                                  ;
 20022                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 20023                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 20024                                  ;
 20025                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 20026                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 20027                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 20028                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 20029                                  ;	       else do not.
 20030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 20031                                  
 20032                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20033                                  
 20034                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 20035                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20036                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20037                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 20038                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 20039                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 20040                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 20041                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 20042                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 20043                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 20044                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 20045                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20046                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20047                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20048                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20049                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20050                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20051                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20052                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20053                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20054                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20055                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 20056                                  ;
 20057                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 20058                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 20059                                  
 20060                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 20061                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20062                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 20063                                  ;
 20064                                  ; Inputs:
 20065                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20066                                  ;		terminated)
 20067                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20068                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20069                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20070                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20071                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20072                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 20073                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20074                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20075                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 20076                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20077                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20078                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20079                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20080                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20081                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20082                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20083                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20084                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20085                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20086                                  ;
 20087                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20088                                  ;		(not checked)
 20089                                  ; Function:
 20090                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 20091                                  ; Outputs:
 20092                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20093                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20094                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20095                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20096                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20097                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20098                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20099                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20100                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20101                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20102                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20103                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 20104                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 20105                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20106                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 20107                                  ;			open a directory
 20108                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20109                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20110                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 20111                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20112                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20113                                  
 20114                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20115                                  ; DOSCODE:6A60h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20116                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20117                                  ; DOSCODE:6A4Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20118                                  
 20119                                  DOS_OPEN:
 20120                                  	; DS has been set up to DOSDATA in file.asm and fcbio2.asm. 
 20121                                  
 20122 00003173 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 20123 00003178 E83301                  	CALL	Check_Access_AX
 20124 0000317B 722B                    	JC	short do_ret_label	    ; retc
 20125                                  
 20126 0000317D C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20127 00003181 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 20128                                  
 20129                                  	; sleaze! move only access/sharing mode in. Leave sf_isFCB unchanged
 20130                                  
 20131 00003183 26884502                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AL ; For moment do this on FCBs too
 20132 00003187 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20133 00003188 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20134                                  	; 18/08/2018
 20135 0000318C 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20136 0000318F 7530                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET1
 20137 00003191 07                      	POP	ES
 20138                                  
 20139                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20140                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20141 00003192 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extnded open		;AN000;
 20142 00003197 7410                    	JZ	short _NOEXTOP 		    ;FT. no, do normal			;AN000;
 20143                                  _IFS_extopen:									;AN000;
 20144 00003199 A0[0106]                	MOV	AL,[SAVE_BX]		    ; M034 - save_bx has original bx  
 20145                                  					    ; with which call was made. This
 20146                                  					    ; has the open access bits. 
 20147                                  	;;MOV	AL,[SAVE_CX]		    ; M034 - FT. al= create attribute
 20148                                  	
 20149 0000319C 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;FT. pass create attr to IFS	;AN000;
 20150                                  	;mov	ax,112Eh
 20151                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;FT. issue extended open verb	;AN000;
 20152 0000319D B82E11                  	mov	ax,(MultNET*256)+46 
 20153 000031A0 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20154 000031A2 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;FT. trash bx			;AN000;
 20155 000031A3 C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20156                                  
 20157                                  do_ret_label:
 20158 000031A8 C3                      	retn				    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20159                                  _NOEXTOP:
 20160                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20161                                  	;
 20162                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20163                                  	;transfer NET_SEQ_OPEN
 20164                                  ;ELSE
 20165                                  	
 20166                                  do_net_int2f:
 20167 000031A9 F606[8600]01            	test	byte [DOS_FLAG],EXECOPEN ; Q: was this open call made from exec
 20168 000031AE 7409                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20169                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware
 20170                                  					;    of this 
 20171                                  	
 20172                                  					; M042 - start
 20173                                  	;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],EXEC_AWARE_REDIR ; 800h
 20174 000031B0 F606[1206]08            	test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],(EXEC_AWARE_REDIR>>8)
 20175                                  					; Q: does this redir know how to 
 20176                                  					;    this
 20177 000031B5 7402                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20178                                  					; Y: set bit 3 of access byte and 
 20179                                  					;    set sharing mode to DENY_WRITE
 20180                                  					; M042 - end
 20181                                  	
 20182                                  	; NOTE: This specific mode has not been set for the code assembled
 20183                                  	; under the "NOT Installed" conditional. Currently Installed is 
 20184                                  	; always one.
 20185                                  					; M035 - set the bits on the stack
 20186                                  	;mov	al,23h
 20187 000031B7 B023                    	mov	AL,SHARING_DENY_WRITE+EXEC_OPEN
 20188                                  	
 20189                                  not_exec_open:
 20190                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20191 000031B9 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20192                                  
 20193                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 22
 20194                                  	;INT	2FH
 20195                                  
 20196 000031BA B81611                  	mov     ax,1116h
 20197 000031BD CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - OPEN EXISTING REMOTE FILE
 20198                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20199                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 20200                                  			; STACK: WORD file open mode
 20201                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 20202                                  
 20203 000031BF 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 20204                                  ;do_ret_label: ; 09/08/2018
 20205 000031C0 C3                      	retn
 20206                                  ;ENDIF
 20207                                  
 20208                                  TEST_RE_NET1:
 20209                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 20210                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20211 000031C1 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 20212 000031C6 07                      	POP	ES
 20213                                  	; 18/05/2019
 20214 000031C7 7409                    	JZ	short LOCAL_OPEN
 20215                                  
 20216                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20217                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20218 000031C9 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open	;AN000;
 20219 000031CE 75C9                    	JNZ	short _IFS_extopen	      ;FT. isuue extended open	;AN000;
 20220                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20221                                  
 20222                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20223                                  ;	transfer NET_OPEN
 20224                                  ;ELSE
 20225 000031D0 EBD7                    	jmp	short do_net_int2f
 20226                                  ;ENDIF
 20227                                  
 20228                                  LOCAL_OPEN:
 20229                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20230 000031D2 E82EE7                  	call	ECritDisk
 20231                                  
 20232                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 20233                                  
 20234                                  	;or	byte [FastOpenFlg],5
 20235 000031D5 800E[6D12]05            	OR	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set+Special_Fill_Set ; only open can
 20236                                  
 20237 000031DA E83B13                  	call	GETPATH
 20238                                  
 20239                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 20240                                  
 20241 000031DD 731D                    	JNC	short Open_found
 20242 000031DF 7511                    	JNZ	short bad_path2
 20243 000031E1 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 20244 000031E3 740D                    	JZ	short bad_path2
 20245                                  OpenFNF:
 20246 000031E5 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found	; 2
 20247                                  OpenBadRet:
 20248                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA use SS override
 20249                                  	; 12/08/2018
 20250                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FastOpenFlg],0 ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) offset 36CAh
 20251                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20252 000031E8 368026[6D12]80          	AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes    ;; DOS 3.3
 20253 000031EE F9                      	STC
 20254                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20255                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20256 000031EF E93EE7                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20257                                  	;;JMP	Clear_FastOpen ; 10/08/2018
 20258                                  	;retn 	; 08/09/2018
 20259                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20260                                  	;jmp	Clear_FastOpen
 20261                                  
 20262                                  bad_path2:
 20263 000031F2 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found	; 3
 20264 000031F5 EBF1                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 20265                                  
 20266                                  Open_Bad_Access:
 20267 000031F7 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; 5
 20268 000031FA EBEC                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 20269                                  
 20270                                  Open_found:
 20271 000031FC 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 20272 000031FE 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 20273 00003200 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 20274 00003202 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 20275                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 20276 00003206 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 20277 0000320A A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 20278 0000320C 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 20279 0000320E A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 20280 00003210 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 20281                                  
 20282                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 20283                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 20284                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 20285                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 20286                                  ;
 20287                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 20288                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 20289                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 20290                                  
 20291 00003212 1E                      	push	ds
 20292 00003213 56                      	push	si
 20293 00003214 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 20294                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 20295 00003218 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 20296                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20297                                  	;test	ch,80h
 20298 0000321B F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 20299                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 20300 0000321E 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 20301 00003220 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 20302 00003222 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 20303 00003225 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 20304 00003228 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 20305                                  ResetAccess:
 20306                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 20307                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 20308                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20309 0000322A 80E1F0                  	and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 20310                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 20311 0000322D 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 20312 00003230 EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 20313                                  
 20314                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 20315                                  
 20316                                  NormalOpen:
 20317 00003232 80E10F                  	AND	CL,access_mask	;0Fh	; remove extras
 20318 00003235 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 20319 00003238 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT
 20320 0000323A 5E                      	pop	si
 20321 0000323B 1F                      	pop	ds
 20322 0000323C EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 20323                                  ;
 20324                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 20325                                  ;
 20326                                  FillSFT:
 20327 0000323E 5E                      	pop	si
 20328 0000323F 1F                      	pop	ds
 20329                                  open_ok:
 20330 00003240 E8FF1E                  	call	DOOPEN			; Fill in SFT
 20331                                  
 20332                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA. use SS override
 20333                                  	; 18/05/2019
 20334                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlag],80h
 20335 00003243 368026[6D12]80          	AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	;; DOS 3.3
 20336                                  	; 12/08/2018
 20337                                  	;and	byte [FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	
 20338                                  
 20339                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20340 00003249 E84300                  	CALL	DO_SHARE_CHECK
 20341 0000324C 7303                    	JNC	short SHARE_OK
 20342                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20343                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20344 0000324E E9DFE6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20345                                  	;;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 20346                                  	;retn	; 18/05/2019
 20347                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20348                                  	;jmp	short Clear_FastOpen	
 20349                                  
 20350                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 20351                                  ;DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 20352                                  ;	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 20353                                  ;OpenShareRetry:
 20354                                  ;	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 20355                                  ;	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 20356                                  ;	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 20357                                  ;	JNC	short SHARE_OK		; No problem with access
 20358                                  ;	call	Idle
 20359                                  ;	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 20360                                  ;OpenShareFail:
 20361                                  ;	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20362                                  ;	call	SHARE_ERROR
 20363                                  ;	JNC	short DO_SHARE_CHECK	; User wants more retry
 20364                                  	
 20365                                  	;12/08/2018
 20366                                  	;mov	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],0
 20367                                  	;08/09/2018
 20368                                  	;mov	byte [FastOpenFlg],0
 20369                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20370                                  	;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 20371                                  	;retn
 20372                                  
 20373                                  SHARE_OK:
 20374                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20375 00003251 B80300                  	MOV	AX,3
 20376 00003254 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20377                                  ;if installed
 20378                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 20379 00003258 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]  ; 14 = ShSU
 20380                                  ;else
 20381                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 20382                                  ;endif
 20383 0000325C E8D1E6                  	call	LCritDisk
 20384                                  	
 20385                                  	;FallThru Set_SFT_Mode
 20386                                  
 20387                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20388                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_SFT_MODE
 20389                                  ;
 20390                                  ; Finish SFT initialization for new reference. Set the correct mode.
 20391                                  ;
 20392                                  ;   Inputs:
 20393                                  ;	ThisSFT points to SFT
 20394                                  ;
 20395                                  ;   Outputs:
 20396                                  ;	Carry clear
 20397                                  ;   Registers modified: AX.
 20398                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20399                                  
 20400                                  ;hkn; called from create. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 20401                                  
 20402                                  SET_SFT_MODE:
 20403 0000325F C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20404 00003263 E87F19                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20405                                  	;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 20406                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20407                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 20408 00003266 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8
 20409                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; Clears carry
 20410 0000326B 7407                    	JZ	short Clear_FastOpen	; sf_mode correct (retz)
 20411 0000326D A1[3003]                	MOV	AX,[CurrentPDB]
 20412                                  	;mov	[es:di+31h],ax
 20413 00003270 26894531                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],AX ; For FCB sf_PID=PDB
 20414                                  
 20415                                  Clear_FastOpen:
 20416 00003274 C3                      	retn			       ;;;;; DOS 3.3
 20417                                  
 20418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20419                                  ; Procedure Name : SHARE_ERROR
 20420                                  ;
 20421                                  ; Called on sharing violations. ES:DI points to SFT. AX has error code
 20422                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 20423                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 20424                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved
 20425                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20426                                  
 20427                                  SHARE_ERROR:
 20428                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20429                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 20430 00003275 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8 ; 80h
 20431                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; 8000h

 20448                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20450                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 20451                                  ;
 20452                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 20453                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 20454                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 20455                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok

 20459                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 20460 0000328F E871E6                  	call	ECritDisk		; enter critical section
 20461                                  OPN_RETRY:
 20462 00003292 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 20463                                  OpenShareRetry:

 20480                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20481                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 20482                                  ;
 20483                                  ; Inputs:
 20484                                  ;	AX is mode
 20485                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20486                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20487                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20488                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20489                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20490                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20491                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20492                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20493                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20494                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20495                                  ; Function:
 20496                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 20497                                  ; Outputs:
 20498                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 20499                                  ;	Carry Clear
 20500                                  ;		Mode is correct
 20501                                  ;		AX unchanged
 20502                                  ;	Carry Set
 20503                                  ;		Mode is bad
 20504                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 20505                                  ; No other registers effected
 20506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20507                                  
 20508                                  Check_Access_AX:
 20509 000032AE A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 20510 000032B1 53                      	PUSH	BX
 20511                                  
 20512                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 20513                                  
 20514 000032B2 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 20515 000032B4 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 20516 000032B7 803E[7205]FF            	CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 20517 000032BC 7505                    	JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 20518 000032BE 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB
 20519 000032C1 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 20520                                  CheckShareMode:
 20521 000032C3 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 20522 000032C6 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 20523                                  CheckAccessMode:
 20524 000032C8 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 20525 000032CA 80E30F                  	AND	BL,access_mask
 20526 000032CD 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 20527 000032D0 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 20528 000032D2 5B                      	POP	BX
 20529 000032D3 F8                      	CLC
 20530 000032D4 C3                      	retn
 20531                                  
 20532                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 20533 000032D5 B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 20534 000032D8 5B                      	POP	BX
 20535 000032D9 F9                      	STC
 20536 000032DA C3                      	retn

 20539                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20540                                  ;============================================================================
 20541                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20542                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20543                                  
 20544                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 20545                                  ;	  or NET device
 20546                                  ;
 20547                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 20548                                  ;
 20549                                  ;	  Modification history:
 20550                                  ;
 20551                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20552                                  
 20553                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 20554                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20555                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 20556                                  ;
 20557                                  ; Inputs:
 20558                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 20559                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 20560                                  ; Function:
 20561                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 20562                                  ; Returns:
 20563                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 20564                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 20565                                  ;	CX = Sector size
 20566                                  ;	AL = Sectors per allocation unit
 20567                                  ;	AH = FAT ID BYTE
 20568                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 20569                                  ; Segs except ES preserved, others destroyed
 20570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20571                                  
 20572                                  ;hkn; called from getset.asm and misc.asm. DS has already been set up to 
 20573                                  ;hkn; DOSDATA. 
 20574                                  
 20575                                  DISK_INFO:
 20576                                  	; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20577                                  	; IBM DOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 37C5h
 20578                                  
 20579 000032DB E863E5                  	call	TestNet
 20580 000032DE 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DSK_INFO
 20581                                  
 20582                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20583                                  ;	transfer NET_DISK_INFO
 20584                                  ;ELSE
 20585                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 12
 20586                                  	;INT	2FH
 20587                                  	;return
 20588                                  
 20589 000032E0 B80C11                  	mov     ax,110Ch
 20590 000032E3 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET DISK SPACE
 20591                                  			; ES:DI -> current directory
 20592                                  			; Return: AL = sectors per cluster, BX = total clusters
 20593                                  			; CX = bytes per sector, DX = number of available clusters
 20594 000032E5 C3                      	retn
 20595                                  ;ENDIF
 20596                                  
 20597                                  LOCAL_DSK_INFO:
 20598 000032E6 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 20599 000032EB E815E6                  	call	ECritDisk
 20600 000032EE E8DC29                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; perform media check.
 20601 000032F1 7241                    	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 20602 000032F3 BB0200                  	MOV	BX,2
 20603 000032F6 E83D28                  	call	UNPACK			; Get first FAT sector into CURBUF
 20604 000032F9 7239                    	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 20605 000032FB C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 20606                                  	;mov	ah,[si+20]
 20607 000032FF 8A6418                  	MOV	AH,[SI+BUFINSIZ]	; get FAT ID BYTE
 20608                                  
 20609                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 20610 00003302 16                      	push	ss
 20611 00003303 1F                      	pop	ds
 20612                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 20613 00003304 268B4E0D                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 20614                                  
 20615                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 20616                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 20617                                  
 20618                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 20619 00003308 268B561F                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 20620 0000330C 83FAFF                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 20621 0000330F 7404                    	JZ	short DoScan
 20622                                  
 20623                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 20624                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 20625                                  ; the count.
 20626                                  
 20627 00003311 39CA                    	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 20628 00003313 7222                    	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 20629                                  DoScan:
 20630 00003315 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 20631 00003317 49                      	DEC	CX
 20632                                  SCANFREE:
 20633 00003318 E81B28                  	call	UNPACK
 20634 0000331B 7217                    	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 20635 0000331D 7501                    	JNZ	short NOTFREECLUS
 20636 0000331F 42                      	INC	DX			; A free one
 20637                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 20638 00003320 43                      	INC	BX			; Next cluster
 20639 00003321 E2F5                    	LOOP	SCANFREE
 20640 00003323 4B                      	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 20641                                  ReturnVals:
 20642 00003324 4B                      	DEC	BX			; count
 20643                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 20644 00003325 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 20645 00003329 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; Sectors/cluster
 20646                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 20647 0000332B 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Bytes/sector
 20648                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx
 20649 0000332F 2689561F                	MOV	[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],DX
 20650 00003333 F8                      	CLC
 20651                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 20652                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20653                                  	;retn
 20654                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20655 00003334 E9F9E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20656                                  
 20657                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 20658                                  ; return.
 20659                                  
 20660                                  GotVal: 
 20661 00003337 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX			; get cluster count
 20662 00003339 EBE9                    	JMP	short ReturnVals

 20669                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_SEARCH - Internal SEARCH calls for MS-DOS
 20670                                  ;	NAME	DOS_SEARCH
 20671                                  
 20672                                  ;**	Low level routines for doing local and NET directory searches
 20673                                  ;
 20674                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 20675                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 20676                                  ;	RENAME_NEXT
 20677                                  ;
 20678                                  ;	Revision history:
 20679                                  ;
 20680                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20681                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 20682                                  ;	    A001	PTM 3564 -- search for fastopen
 20683                                  
 20684                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20685                                  
 20686                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20687                                  ;
 20688                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 20689                                  ;
 20690                                  ; Inputs:
 20691                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20692                                  ;		terminated)
 20693                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20694                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20695                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20696                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20697                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20698                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20699                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer
 20700                                  ; Function:
 20701                                  ;	Initiate a search for the given file spec
 20702                                  ; Outputs:
 20703                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20704                                  ;	    The 53 bytes ot DMAADD are filled in as follows:
 20705                                  ;
 20706                                  ;	LOCAL
 20707                                  ;	    Drive Byte (A=1, B=2, ...) High bit clear
 20708                                  ;		NEVER STORE DRIVE BYTE AFTER  found_it
 20709                                  ;	    11 byte search name with Meta chars in it
 20710                                  ;	    Search Attribute Byte, attribute of search
 20711                                  ;	    WORD LastEnt value
 20712                                  ;	    WORD DirStart
 20713                                  ;	    4 byte pad
 20714                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 20715                                  ;	NET
 20716                                  ;	    21 bytes First byte has high bit set
 20717                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 20718                                  ;
 20719                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20720                                  ;	    AX = error code
 20721                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 20722                                  ;			No match for this file
 20723                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20724                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20725                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20726                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20727                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20728                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20729                                  
 20730                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20731                                  	; DOSCODE:6C22h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20732                                  
 20733                                  DOS_SEARCH_FIRST:
 20734                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3 kernel) - Offset 3826h
 20735                                  
 20736 0000333B C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 20737 0000333F 83FFFF                  	CMP	DI,-1
 20738 00003342 7506                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET2
 20739                                  
 20740                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20741                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_SEARCH_FIRST
 20742                                  ;ELSE
 20743                                  	;mov	ax,1119h
 20744 00003344 B81911                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|25
 20745 00003347 CD2F                    	INT	2Fh
 20746 00003349 C3                      	retn
 20747                                  ;ENDIF
 20748

 20750                                  	;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h

 20763 00003354 CD2F                    	INT	2FH

 20922                                  ;BREAK <DOS_SEARCH_NEXT - scan for subsequent matches>
 20923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20924                                  ;
 20925                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 20926                                  ;
 20927                                  ; Inputs:
 20928                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer returned by DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 20929                                  ;	    (only first 21 bytes must have valid information)
 20930                                  ; Function:
 20931                                  ;	Look for subsequent matches
 20932                                  ; Outputs:
 20933                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20934                                  ;	    The 53 bytes at DMAADD are updated for next call
 20935                                  ;		(see DOS_SEARCH_FIRST)
 20936                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20937                                  ;	    AX = error code
 20938                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 20939                                  ;			No more files to find
 20940                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed

 20956                                  		     ; SS = DS = DOS CS, [DTA] = 21-byte findfirst search data
 20957                                  		     ; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 20958                                  		     ; CF clear if successful
 20959 00003437 C3                      	retn
 20960                                  ;ENDIF
