 24386                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 24387                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 24388                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24389                                  ;
 24390                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 24391                                  ;
 24392                                  ; Inputs:
 24393                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 24394                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 24395                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 24396                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 24397                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 24398                                  ;
 24399                                  ; Function:
 24400                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 24401                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 24402                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 24403                                  ;
 24404                                  ; Outputs:
 24405                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 24406                                  ;
 24407                                  ; Uses:
 24408                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 24409                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 24410                                  ;
 24411                                  ; Notes:
 24412                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 24413                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 24414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24415                                  ;M039: Created
 24416                                  
 24417                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24418                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24419                                  
 24420                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24421                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24422                                  
 24423                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 24424                                  ;
 24425                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 24426                                  
 24427                                  DskRdBufScan:
 24428 00003FA7 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 24429 00003FAD 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 24430                                  
 24431 00003FAF 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 24432 00003FB4 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 24433 00003FB6 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 24434 00003FB8 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 24435                                  
 24436 00003FBB E83F1F                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 24437                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 24438 00003FBE 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 24439 00003FC1 36A3[A512]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 24440                                  		
 24441                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24442                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 24443                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 24444                                  	; 15/12/2022
 24445 00003FC5 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 24446                                  
 24447                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 24448                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 24449                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 24450                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 24451                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 24452                                  
 24453                                  bufq:	
 24454                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 24455 00003FC9 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 24456 00003FCC 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 24457                                  
 24458                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 24459                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 24460                                  
 24461                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 24462 00003FCE 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 24463 00003FD1 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 24464                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 24465 00003FD3 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 24466                                  bufq01:
 24467 00003FD6 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 24468                                  
 24469                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 24470                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 24471                                  
 24472                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 24473 00003FD8 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 24474 00003FDB 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 24475                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 24476 00003FDD 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 24477                                  bufq02:
 24478 00003FE0 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 24479                                  bufq1:	
 24480 00003FE2 363B3E[A512]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 24481 00003FE7 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 24482                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 24483 00003FE9 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 24484                                  bufx:
 24485 00003FEB C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 24486                                  
 24487                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 24488                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 24489                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 24490                                  
 24491                                  bufq2:	
 24492 00003FEC 50                      	push	ax
 24493                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 24494 00003FED F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 24495 00003FF1 742D                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 24496                                  
 24497                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 24498 00003FF3 51                      	push	cx
 24499 00003FF4 52                      	push	dx
 24500 00003FF5 56                      	push	si
 24501 00003FF6 57                      	push	di
 24502 00003FF7 06                      	push	es
 24503                                  
 24504 00003FF8 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 24505                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 24506 00003FFA 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 24507 00003FFD F7D8                    	neg	ax
 24508                                  
 24509                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 24510                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 24511                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 24512                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 24513                                  
 24514                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 24515 00003FFF 8D7518                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 24516                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 24517 00004002 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 24518 00004006 F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 24519 00004008 368B3E[0C06]            	mov     di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 24520 0000400D 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 24521 0000400F 368E06[0E06]            	mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 24522 00004014 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 24523                                  
 24524                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 24525                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 24526                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 24527                                  
 24528 00004016 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 24529                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 24530                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 24531                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 24532                                  	;jnc	short bufq03	
 24533                                  	;movsb
 24534                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24535                                  	;adc	cx,0
 24536                                  	;rep	movsb
 24537                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24538 00004018 7301                    	jnc	short bufq03
 24539 0000401A A4                      	movsb
 24540                                  bufq03:
 24541                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 24542 0000401B 07                      	pop	es
 24543 0000401C 5F                      	pop	di
 24544 0000401D 5E                      	pop	si
 24545 0000401E 5A                      	pop	dx
 24546 0000401F 59                      	pop	cx
 24547                                  
 24548                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 24549                                  bufq3:	
 24550 00004020 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 24551                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 24552 00004022 E8EA1E                  	call	SCANPLACE
 24553 00004025 363B06[A512]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 24554 0000402A 58                      	pop	ax
 24555                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 24556                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 24557                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 24558                                  	;retn
 24559                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 24560 0000402B 759C                    	jne	short bufq
 24561 0000402D EBBC                    	jmp	short bufx
 24562                                  
 24563                                  ;EndProc DskRdBufScan
 24564

 24574                                  ; Procedure Name : DISKWRITE
 24575                                  ;
 24576                                  ; Inputs:
 24577                                  ;       Outputs of SETUP

 24579                                  ;       Perform disk write

 24639                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24640                                  	; mov 	ax,[es:di+11h]
 24641 0000403E 268B4511                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size]		;M039

 24643                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+13h]

 24653

 24713                                  ;       DX = # of bytes in last sector to write (the "tail").

 24721 00004088 E8B902                  	call	DIV32           	;DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)

 25198                                  SKIPRESET:                            		;AN002; BL
 25199 0000427A 07                      	POP     ES                    		;AN002; BL
 25200                                  ;
 25201 0000427B BAFFFF                  	MOV     DX,0FFFFH
 25202 0000427E E83912                  	call	RELBLKS
 25203                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25204                                  	; 20/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25205 00004281 73C0                    	jnc	short UPDATE
 25206                                  SET_ACC_ERRWJ:
 25207                                  	;JC	short SET_ACC_ERRWJ2
 25208                                  	;JMP	SHORT UPDATE
 25209                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25210 00004283 E95FFC                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25211                                  	; 20/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25212                                  	;JC	short SET_ACC_ERRWJ2
 25213                                  	;JMP	SHORT UPDATE
 25214                                  
 25215                                  KILLFIL:
 25216 00004286 31DB                    	XOR     BX,BX
 25217 00004288 06                      	PUSH    ES

 25219                                  	;mov	[es:di+19h],bx

 25230 0000429C 74A5                    	jz	short UPDATE
 25231                                  	; 20/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25232                                  	;jz	short UPDATEJ
 25233                                  
 25234                                  ;; 10/23/86 FastOpen update
 25235 0000429E 06                      	PUSH	ES              ; since first cluster # is 0
 25236 0000429F 55                      	PUSH	BP              ; we must delete the old cache entry
 25237 000042A0 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25238 000042A1 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25239 000042A2 52                      	PUSH	DX
 25240 000042A3 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]             ; get current DPB
 25241                                  	; 15/12/2022

 25246 000042AD B402                    	MOV	AH,2                     ; delete cache entry by drive:firclus
 25247 000042AF E840EA                  	call	FastOpen_Update          ; call fastopen
 25248 000042B2 5A                      	POP	DX

 25250 000042B4 58                      	POP	AX

 25252 000042B6 07                      	POP	ES

 25254

 25256 000042BA 72C7                    	JC	short SET_ACC_ERRWJ
 25257                                  UPDATEJ:
 25258                                  	; 20/11/2022
 25259 000042BC EB85                    	JMP	short UPDATE ; 10/08/2018

 25261                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 25262                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25263                                  ;
 25264                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 25265                                  ;
 25266                                  ; Inputs:
 25267                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 25268                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 25269                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 25270                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 25271                                  ;
 25272                                  ; Function:
 25273                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 25274                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 25275                                  ;
 25276                                  ; Outputs:
 25277                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 25278                                  ; Uses:
 25279                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 25280                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 25281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25282                                  ;M039: Created
 25283                                  
 25284                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 25285                                  ;
 25286                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 25287                                  
 25288                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25289                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25290                                  
 25291                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25292                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 25293                                  
 25294                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 25295                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 25296 000042BE 53                      	push	bx
 25297 000042BF 51                      	push	cx
 25298                                  
 25299 000042C0 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 25300 000042C5 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 25301 000042C7 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 25302 000042C9 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 25303                                  
 25304                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25305                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 25306                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 25307                                  	; 15/12/2022
 25308 000042CC 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 25309                                  
 25310                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 25311                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 25312                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 25313                                  
 25314 000042D0 36833E[7700]00          	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 25315 000042D6 7431                    	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 25316                                  
 25317                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 25318                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 25319                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 25320                                  
 25321 000042D8 363A06[9C12]            	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 25322 000042DD 752A                    	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 25323                                  
 25324 000042DF 50                      	push    ax
 25325 000042E0 36A1[010E]              	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 25326 000042E4 368B3E[030E]            	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 25327                                  
 25328                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 25329                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 25330                                  
 25331 000042E9 39FE                    	cmp	si,di
 25332 000042EB 7502                    	jne	short sc01
 25333 000042ED 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 25334                                  sc01: 
 25335 000042EF 7617                    	jbe	short sc5	
 25336                                  
 25337 000042F1 360306[7700]            	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 25338 000042F6 83D700                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 25339                                  	
 25340                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 25341                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 25342                                  
 25343 000042F9 39FB                    	cmp	bx,di
 25344 000042FB 7502                    	jne	short sc02
 25345 000042FD 39C2                    	cmp	dx,ax
 25346                                  sc02:
 25347 000042FF 7307                    	jnb	short sc5
 25348                                  
 25349 00004301 36C706[050E]0000        	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 25350                                  sc5:	
 25351 00004308 58                      	pop     ax
 25352                                  
 25353                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 25354                                  ;	written.
 25355                                  
 25356                                  nosc:	
 25357 00004309 E8F11B                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 25358                                  
 25359                                  _bufq:	
 25360                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 25361 0000430C 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 25362 0000430F 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 25363                                  
 25364                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 25365                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 25366                                  
 25367                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 25368 00004311 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 25369 00004314 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 25370                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 25371 00004316 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 25372                                  bufq04:
 25373 00004319 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 25374                                  
 25375                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 25376                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 25377                                  
 25378                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 25379 0000431B 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 25380 0000431E 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 25381                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 25382 00004320 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 25383                                  bufq05:
 25384 00004323 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 25385                                  
 25386                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 25387                                  
 25388                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 25389 00004325 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 25390 00004329 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 25391 0000432B E8501E                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 25392                                  bufq4:
 25393                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 25394 0000432E C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 25395                                  
 25396 00004333 E8D91B                  	call	SCANPLACE
 25397 00004336 EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 25398                                  bufq5: 
 25399 00004338 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 25400                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 25401                                  bufq6: 
 25402 0000433A 363B3E[A512]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 25403 0000433F 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 25404                                  	
 25405                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 25406 00004341 59                      	pop	cx
 25407 00004342 5B                      	pop	bx
 25408 00004343 C3                      	retn
 25409                                  
 25410                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 25411                                  
 25412                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 25413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25414                                  ;
 25415                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 25416                                  ;
 25417                                  ; Inputs:
 25418                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 25419                                  ; Function:
 25420                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 25421                                  ; Outputs:
 25422                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 25423                                  ; Uses:
 25424                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 25425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25426                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 25427                                  
 25428                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25429                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25430                                  
 25431                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25432                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 25433                                  
 25434                                  DIV32:
 25435 00004344 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 25436 00004348 7515                    	jne	short div5
 25437                                  
 25438 0000434A 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 25439 0000434C 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 25440 0000434E 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 25441 00004352 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 25442 00004354 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 25443 00004356 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 25444 00004358 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 25445 0000435A D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 25446 0000435C D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 25447 0000435E C3                      	retn
 25448                                  div5:	
 25449 0000435F 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 25450 00004361 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 25451 00004363 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 25452 00004365 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 25453 00004367 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 25454 00004368 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 25455 0000436A C3                      	retn
 25456                                  
 25457                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 25458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25459                                  ;
 25460                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 25461                                  ;
 25462                                  ; Inputs:
 25463                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 25464                                  ; Function:
 25465                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 25466                                  ; Outputs:
 25467                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 25468                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 25469                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 25470                                  ; Uses:
 25471                                  ;       DX,CX
 25472                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25473                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 25474                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 25475                                  
 25476                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25477                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25478                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25479                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 25480                                  
 25481                                  SHR32:
 25482                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 25483 0000436B 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 25484 0000436F 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 25485 00004371 E306                    	jcxz	norota
 25486                                  
 25487                                  rotashft2:
 25488 00004373 D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 25489 00004375 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 25490 00004377 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 25491                                  norota:
 25492 00004379 C3                      	retn
 25493                                  
 25494                                  ;============================================================================
 25495                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 25496                                  ;============================================================================
 25497                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25498                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 25499                                  
 25500                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 25501                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 25502                                  
 25503                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 25504                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25505                                  ;
 25506                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 25507                                  ;
 25508                                  ; Inputs:
 25509                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 25510                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 25511                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 25512                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 25513                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 25514                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 25515                                  ; Function:
 25516                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 25517                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 25518                                  ; Outputs:
 25519                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 25520                                  ;	ELSE
 25521                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 25522                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 25523                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 25524                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 25525                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 25526                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 25527                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 25528                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 25529                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 25530                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 25531                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 25532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25533                                  
 25534                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 25535                                  ;hkn; this point.
 25536                                  
 25537                                  SEARCH:
 25538                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25539                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 25540                                  
 25541                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25542                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCA (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25543                                  
 25544                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25545                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h 
 25546                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 25547                                  
 25548                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 25549                                  FINDENTRY:
 25550 0000437A E82E04                  	call	STARTSRCH
 25551 0000437D A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 25552                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 25553 00004380 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 25554                                  	;cmp	al,8
 25555 00004382 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 25556 00004384 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 25557 00004386 E86D01                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 25558                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 25559 00004389 E8FD00                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 25560 0000438C 7303                    	JNC	short SRCH
 25561 0000438E E99100                  	JMP	SETESRET
 25562                                  
 25563                                  	;entry	Srch
 25564                                  SRCH:
 25565 00004391 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25566 00004392 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 25567                                  
 25568                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 25569                                  
 25570 00004396 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 25571                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 25572 00004398 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 25573 0000439A 7436                    	JZ	short FREE
 25574                                  
 25575                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25576 0000439C 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 25577 000043A1 742F                    	JZ	short FREE
 25578                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 25579 000043A3 F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 25580                                  					; Volume ID file?
 25581 000043A7 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 25582                                  
 25583                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25584 000043A9 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 25585                                  CHKFNAM:
 25586                                  ;	Context ES
 25587 000043AE 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 25588 000043B0 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 25589 000043B2 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 25590                                  
 25591                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 25592 000043B4 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 25593                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 25594                                  
 25595                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 25596                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check
 25597                                  	;JNZ	short NO_E5
 25598                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:NAME1],05H
 25599                                  	; 22/09/2023
 25600 000043B7 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 25601 000043BB 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 25602 000043BD 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 25603                                  NO_E5:
 25604                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 25605 000043C1 E86100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 25606 000043C4 7428                    	JZ	short FOUND
 25607 000043C6 1F                      	POP	DS
 25608                                  
 25609                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 25610                                  NEXTENT:
 25611 000043C7 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 25612 000043CB E86600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 25613 000043CE 73C1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 25614 000043D0 EB50                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 25615                                  
 25616                                  FREE:
 25617 000043D2 1F                      	POP	DS
 25618 000043D3 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 25619 000043D7 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 25620 000043DB 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 25621 000043DD 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 25622                                  TSTALL:
 25623 000043E1 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 25624                                  NEXTENTJ:
 25625 000043E5 74E0                    	je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 25626 000043E7 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 25627 000043EB F9                      	STC
 25628 000043EC EB34                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 25629                                  
 25630                                  FOUND:
 25631                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 25632                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 25633                                  ; ------	------
 25634                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 25635                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 25636                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 25637                                  
 25638 000043EE 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 25639 000043F0 1F                      	POP	DS
 25640 000043F1 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 25641                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 25642 000043F5 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 25643                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
 25644 000043F8 8D740F                  	LEA	SI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_first-dir_entry.dir_attr]
 25645                                  					; point to first cluster field
 25646                                  	;test	ch,8
 25647 000043FB F6C508                  	TEST	CH,attr_volume_id	; Volume ID file?
 25648 000043FE 7409                    	JZ	short check_one_volume_id ; Nope check other attributes
 25649                                  	;test	ah,8
 25650 00004400 F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 25651                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 25652                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25653 00004403 74C2                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 25654                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25655                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 25656 00004405 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Set zero flag for $FCB_CREATE
 25657 00004407 EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 25658                                  check_one_volume_id:
 25659                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 25660 00004409 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 25661                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 25662                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25663 0000440C 74B9                    	je	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 25664                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 25665 0000440E E8AE03                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 25666 00004411 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF
 25667 00004413 F606[7E05]FF            	TEST	BYTE [CREATING],-1	; Pass back mismatch if creating
 25668                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25669                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Otherwise continue searching
 25670 00004418 74AD                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 25671                                  RETFF:
 25672 0000441A C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 25673                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25674                                  	;MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]  ; mov ah,[es:bp+0]
 25675                                  	; 15/12/2022
 25676 0000441E 268A6600                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP]
 25677                                  SETESRET:
 25678 00004422 16                      	PUSH	SS
 25679 00004423 07                      	POP	ES
 25680 00004424 C3                      	retn

 25682                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25683                                  ;
 25684                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 25685                                  ;
 25686                                  ; Inputs:
 25687                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 25688                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 25689                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 25690                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 25691                                  ; Function:
 25692                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 25693                                  ; Outputs:
 25694                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 25695                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 25696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25697                                  
 25698                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25699                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 25700                                  
 25701                                  MetaCompare:
 25702 00004425 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 25703                                  WILDCRD:
 25704 00004428 F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 25705 0000442A 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 25706                                  CHECK_META:
 25707 0000442C 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 25708 00004431 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 25709                                  MetaRet:
 25710 00004433 C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 25711                                  
 25712                                  ;Break	<NEXTENTRY -- STEP THROUGH DIRECTORY>
 25713                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25714                                  ;
 25715                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 25716                                  ;
 25717                                  ; Inputs:
 25718                                  ;	Same as outputs of GETENTRY, above
 25719                                  ; Function:
 25720                                  ;	Update BX, and [LASTENT] for next directory entry.
 25721                                  ;	Carry set if no more.
 25722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25723                                  
 25724                                  NEXTENTRY:
 25725                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25726                                  	; DOSCODE:7D4Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 25727                                  
 25728                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25729                                  	; DOSCODE:7D88h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25730                                  
 25731                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25732                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 4671h 
 25733                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 25734                                  
 25735 00004434 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 25736 00004437 3B06[DA05]              	CMP	AX,[ENTLAST]
 25737 0000443B 7422                    	JZ	short NONE
 25738 0000443D 40                      	INC	AX
 25739                                  	;ADD	BX,32
 25740 0000443E 8D5F20                  	LEA	BX,[BX+32]
 25741 00004441 39D3                    	CMP	BX,DX
 25742                                  	; 21/11/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS (DOSCODE:7D5Dh)
 25743                                  	;JB	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.0 src (dir.asm)
 25744                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25745 00004443 751C                    	jne	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.21 (DOSCODE:7D97h)
 25746 00004445 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 25747 00004449 FEC3                    	INC	BL
 25748 0000444B 3A1E[7705]              	CMP	BL,[CLUSFAC]
 25749 0000444F 7215                    	JB	short SAMECLUS
 25750 00004451 8B1E[DC05]              	MOV	BX,[NXTCLUSNUM]
 25751 00004455 E8C716                  	call	IsEOF
 25752 00004458 7305                    	JAE	short NONE
 25753                                  	; 23/07/2019
 25754 0000445A 83FB02                  	CMP	BX,2
 25755                                  	;JB	short NONE
 25756                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 25757                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25758 0000445D 732D                    	jnb	short GETENT
 25759                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25760                                  	;JB	short NONE
 25761                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 25762                                  NONE:
 25763 0000445F F9                      	STC
 25764 00004460 C3                      	retn
 25765                                  HAVIT:

 25767 00004464 F8                      	CLC
 25768                                  nextentry_retn:
 25769 00004465 C3                      	retn
 25770                                  SAMECLUS:

 25774 0000446E C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]

 25786 00004475 8B5506                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]	;AN000; >32mb

 25802 00004485 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 25803 00004487 EB23                    	JMP	short SETENTRY
 25804                                  
 25805                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25806                                  ;
 25807                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 25808                                  ;
 25809                                  ; Inputs:
 25810                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 25811                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 25812                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 25813                                  ; Function:
 25814                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 25815                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 25816                                  ; Outputs:
 25817                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 25818                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 25819                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 25820                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 25821                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 25822                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25823                                  
 25824                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25825                                  GETENTRY:
 25826                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25827 00004489 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 25828                                  
 25829                                  	;entry	GETENT
 25830                                  GETENT:
 25831 0000448C A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 25832                                  ;
 25833                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 25834                                  ; directory.
 25835                                  ;
 25836 0000448F B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 25837 00004491 D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 25838 00004493 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 25839                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25840                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 25841                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25842                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 25843                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25844 00004495 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 25845 00004497 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 25846                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 25847                                  ;
 25848                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 25849                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 25850                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 25851                                  ;
 25852                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 25853 0000449A 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25854 0000449E 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 25855                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 25856 000044A1 F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 25857 000044A3 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 25858 000044A5 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25859 000044A6 E8CCF7                  	call	DIRREAD
 25860 000044A9 5B                      	POP	BX
 25861                                  	;retc
 25862 000044AA 72B9                    	jc	short nextentry_retn	
 25863                                  SETENTRY:
 25864 000044AC 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 25865                                  	;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 25866                                  	;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 25867 000044B0 83C218                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 25868 000044B3 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 25869                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 25870 000044B5 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 25871                                  	; 29/12/2022
 25872                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS contains a 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:7E15h
 25873 000044B9 F8                      	clc
 25874 000044BA C3                      	retn
 25875                                  
 25876                                  ;Break	<SETDIRSRCH SETROOTSRCH -- Set Search environments>
 25877                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25878                                  ;
 25879                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDIRSRCH,SETROOTSRCH
 25880                                  ;
 25881                                  ; Inputs:
 25882                                  ;	BX cluster number of start of directory
 25883                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 25884                                  ;	DI next cluster number from fastopen extended info. DOS 3.3 only
 25885                                  ; Function:
 25886                                  ;	Set up a directory search
 25887                                  ; Outputs:
 25888                                  ;	[DIRSTART] = BX
 25889                                  ;	[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC] set
 25890                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 25891                                  ; destroys AX,DX,BX
 25892                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25893                                  
 25894                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25895                                  SETDIRSRCH:
 25896 000044BB 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 25897 000044BD 7437                    	JZ	short SETROOTSRCH
 25898 000044BF 891E[C205]              	MOV	[DIRSTART],BX
 25899                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 25900 000044C3 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 25901 000044C7 FEC0                    	INC	AL
 25902 000044C9 A2[7705]                	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 25903                                  
 25904                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 25905                                  	;SAVE	<SI>
 25906 000044CC 56                      	push	si
 25907                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 25908 000044CD F606[6D12]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 25909 000044D2 7507                    	JNZ	short UNP_OK
 25910                                  
 25911                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 25912                                  	;invoke	UNPACK
 25913 000044D4 E85F16                  	call	UNPACK
 25914 000044D7 7302                    	JNC	short UNP_OK
 25915                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 25916 000044D9 5E                      	pop	si
 25917                                  	;return
 25918 000044DA C3                      	retn
 25919                                  
 25920                                  UNP_OK:
 25921 000044DB 893E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],DI
 25922 000044DF 89DA                    	MOV	DX,BX
 25923 000044E1 30DB                    	XOR	BL,BL
 25924 000044E3 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 25925                                  	;invoke	FIGREC
 25926 000044E7 E8F50E                  	call	FIGREC
 25927                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 25928 000044EA 5E                      	pop	si
 25929                                  	
 25930                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25931                                  
 25932                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25933                                  	;PUSH	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 25934                                  	;MOV	DX,[HIGH_SECTOR]	   ;AN000; >32mb
 25935                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC+2],DX		   ;AN000; >32mb
 25936                                  	;POP	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 25937                                  
 25938                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25939                                  	;push	dx
 25940                                  	;mov	dx,[HIGH_SECTOR]
 25941                                  	;mov	[DIRSEC+2],dx
 25942                                  	;pop	dx
 25943                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC],dx
 25944                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25945 000044EB A1[0706]                	mov	ax,[HIGH_SECTOR]
 25946 000044EE A3[C005]                	mov	[DIRSEC+2],AX
 25947 000044F1 8916[BE05]              	MOV	[DIRSEC],DX
 25948                                  
 25949                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25950                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 25951                                  	;CLC
 25952 000044F5 C3                      	retn
 25953                                  
 25954                                  	;entry	SETROOTSRCH
 25955                                  SETROOTSRCH:
 25956 000044F6 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 25957 000044F8 A3[C205]                	MOV	[DIRSTART],AX
 25958                                  	; 22/09/2023
 25959 000044FB A3[C005]                	mov	[DIRSEC+2],ax ; 0
 25960 000044FE A2[7305]                	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],AL
 25961 00004501 48                      	DEC	AX
 25962 00004502 A3[BC05]                	MOV	[CLUSNUM],AX
 25963                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Bh]
 25964 00004505 268B460B                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_SECTOR]
 25965                                  	; 19/05/2019
 25966                                  	;;mov	dx,[es:bp+10h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 25967                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 25968 00004509 268B5611                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 25969 0000450D 29D0                    	SUB	AX,DX
 25970 0000450F A2[7705]                	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 25971 00004512 8916[BE05]              	MOV	[DIRSEC],DX		      ;F.C. >32mb
 25972                                  	; 22/09/2023
 25973                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25974                                  	;MOV	WORD [DIRSEC+2],0	      ;F.C. >32mb
 25975 00004516 F8                      	CLC
 25976 00004517 C3                      	retn

 25978                                  ;============================================================================
 25979                                  ; DIR2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 25980                                  ;============================================================================
 25981                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25982                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 25983                                  
 25984                                  ;	TITLE	DIR2 - Directory and path cracking
 25985                                  ;	NAME	Dir2
 25986                                  
 25987                                  ;Break	<GETPATH -- PARSE A WFP>
 25988                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25989                                  ;
 25990                                  ; Procedure Name : GETPATH
 25991                                  ;
 25992                                  ; Inputs:
 25993                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:\" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 25994                                  ;		terminated; d:/ (note forward slash) indicates a real device).
 25995                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 25996                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 25997                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 25998                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 25999                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 26000                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 26001                                  ;	[THISDPB] set to DPB if disk otherwise garbage.
 26002                                  ; Function:
 26003                                  ;	Crack the path
 26004                                  ; Outputs:
 26005                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk if disk file
 26006                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Unk if char device
 26007                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 26008                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 26009                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 26010                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 26011                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 26012                                  ;	   Zero set
 26013                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 26014                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 26015                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 26016                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 26017                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 26018                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 26019                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 26020                                  ;	   Zero reset
 26021                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path or attribute mismatch
 26022                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 26023                                  ;	ELSE
 26024                                  ;	   [CurBuf] = -1 if root directory
 26025                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 26026                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 26027                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points into [CURBUF] to dir_first field for entry
 26028                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 26029                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 26030                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 26031                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 26032                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 26033                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 26034                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 26035                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it.
 26036                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 26037                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 26038                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 26039                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 26040                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 26041                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 26042                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 26043                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 26044                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 26045                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26046                                  
 26047                                  ;hkn; called from delete.asm, finfo.asm, mknode.asm and rename.asm.
 26048                                  ;hkn; DS already set up at this point.
 26049                                  
 26050                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26051                                  GETPATH:
 26052                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 26053 00004518 C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Not Creating, not DEL *.*
 26054                                  
 26055                                  ; Same as GetPath only CREATING and DELALL already set
 26056                                  
 26057                                  	;entry	GetPathNoSet
 26058                                  GetPathNoSet:
 26059                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2	
 26060 0000451E C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 26061 00004523 C706[E205]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURBUF],-1	; initial setting
 26062                                  
 26063                                  ; See if the input indicates a device that has already been detected. If so,
 26064                                  ; go build the guy quickly. Otherwise, let findpath find the device.
 26065                                  
 26066 00004529 8B3E[B205]              	MOV	DI,[WFP_START]		; point to the beginning of the name
 26067                                  	;cmp	word [DI+1],5C3Ah
 26068                                  	;CMP	WORD [DI+1],'\' << 8 + ':'
 26069 0000452D 817D013A5C              	cmp	word [DI+1],':\'
 26070 00004532 7438                    	JZ	short CrackIt
 26071                                  
 26072                                  ; Let ChkDev find it in the device list
 26073                                  
 26074 00004534 83C703                  	ADD	DI,3
 26075                                  	; 18/08/2018
 26076                                  	;MOV	SI,DI			; let CHKDEV see the original name
 26077                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26078                                  	; 16/12/2022
 26079                                  	;mov	si,di ; not required ! (it is written in CHKDEV proc already!)
 26080 00004537 E8AB00                  	CALL	CHKDEV
 26081 0000453A 722E                    	JC	short InternalError
 26082                                  
 26083                                  Build_devJ:
 26084 0000453C A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 26085 0000453F A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 26086                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 26087 00004542 C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; In the particular case of
 26088                                  					; "finding" a char device
 26089                                  					; set LOCUS to Unknown. This makes
 26090                                  					; certain idiotic problems reported
 26091                                  					; by a certain 3 letter OEM go away.
 26092                                  
 26093                                  ; Take name in name1 and pack it back into where wfp_start points. This
 26094                                  ; guarantees wfp_start pointing to a canonical representation of a device.
 26095                                  ; We are allowed to do this as GetPath is *ALWAYS* called before entering a
 26096                                  ; wfp into the share set.
 26097                                  ;
 26098                                  ; We copy chars from name1 to wfp_start remembering the position of the last
 26099                                  ; non-space seen +1.  This position is kept in DX.
 26100                                  
 26101                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 26102 00004547 16                      	push	ss
 26103 00004548 07                      	pop	es
 26104                                  
 26105                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 26106 00004549 BE[4B05]                	mov	si,NAME1
 26107 0000454C 8B3E[B205]              	mov	di,[WFP_START]
 26108 00004550 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 26109 00004552 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; 8 chars in device name
 26110                                  MoveLoop:
 26111 00004555 AC                      	lodsb
 26112 00004556 AA                      	stosb
 26113 00004557 3C20                    	cmp	al," "
 26114 00004559 7402                    	jz	short NoSave
 26115                                  
 26116 0000455B 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 26117                                  NoSave:
 26118 0000455D E2F6                    	loop	MoveLoop
 26119                                  
 26120                                  ; DX is the position of the last seen non-space + 1. We terminate the name
 26121                                  ; at this point.
 26122                                  
 26123 0000455F 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 26124 00004561 C60500                  	mov	byte [di],0		; end of string
 26125 00004564 E8C402                  	call	Build_device_ent	; Clears carry sets zero
 26126 00004567 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; reset zero
 26127 00004569 C3                      	retn
 26128                                  
 26129                                  InternalError:
 26130                                  InternalError_loop:
 26131 0000456A EBFE                    	JMP	short InternalError_loop	; freeze
 26132                                  
 26133                                  ; Start off at the correct spot. Optimize if the current dir part is valid.
 26134                                  
 26135                                  CrackIt:
 26136 0000456C 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]	; get current directory pointer
 26137 00004570 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1			; valid?
 26138 00004573 7503                    	JNZ	short LOOK_SING		; Yes, use it.
 26139 00004575 8D7503                  	LEA	SI,[DI+3]		; skip D:\.
 26140                                  LOOK_SING:
 26141                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 26142 00004578 C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_directory+attr_system+attr_hidden
 26143                                  					; Attributes to search through Dirs

 26209 000045C8 07                      	POP	ES
 26210 000045C9 730D                    	JNC	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER ; crack based on cur dir
 26211                                  
 26212                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 26213                                  ;
 26214                                  ; We must cract the path beginning at the root. Advance pointer to beginning
 26215                                  ; of path and go crack from root.
 26216                                  
 26217                                  NO_CURR_D:
 26218 000045CB 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 26219 000045CF 8D7403                  	LEA	SI,[SI+3]		; Skip "d:/"
 26220 000045D2 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 26221 000045D6 EB3B                    	JMP	short ROOTPATH
 26222                                  
 26223                                  ; We are able to crack from the current directory part. Go set up for search
 26224                                  ; of specified cluster.
 26225                                  
 26226                                  GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER:

 26228 000045DC E8DCFE                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 26229                                  	;JC	short SETFERR

 26233                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26234                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 26235                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 26236                                  SETFERR:

 26238 000045E3 F9                      	STC
 26239 000045E4 C3                      	retn
 26240                                  
 26241                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26242                                  ;
 26243                                  ; Procedure Name : ChkDev
 26244                                  ;
 26245                                  ; Check to see if the name at DS:DI is a device. Returns carry set if not a
 26246                                  ;   device.
 26247                                  ; Blasts CX,SI,DI,AX,BX
 26248                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26249                                  
 26250                                  CHKDEV:
 26251 000045E5 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 26252 000045E7 8CD7                    	MOV	DI,SS
 26253 000045E9 8EC7                    	MOV	ES,DI
 26254

 26256 000045EE B90900                  	MOV	CX,9
 26257                                  TESTLOOP:
 26258 000045F1 E84910                  	call	GETLET

 26261 000045F6 740E                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE

 26265 000045FF 7405                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE

 26269                                  NOTDEV:

 26279 0000460A F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 26280 0000460C 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 26281 0000460E 8ED8                    	MOV	DS,AX
