 28356                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28357                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 28358 00004E9C D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 28359                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 28360                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 28361 00004E9E 36803E[6A00]00          	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 28362 00004EA4 7403                    	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 28363 00004EA6 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 28364 00004EA8 66                      	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 28365                                  nodd:
 28366 00004EA9 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 28367 00004EAB F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 28368 00004EAC C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 28369                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 28370 00004EAD F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 28371                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 28372 00004EAE C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 28373                                  
 28374                                  ;============================================================================
 28375                                  ; MKNODE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 28376                                  ;============================================================================
 28377                                  ; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28378                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28379                                  
 28380                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 28381                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 28382                                  
 28383                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 28384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28385                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 28386                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 28387                                  ;
 28388                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 28389                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 28390                                  ;	MakeNode
 28391                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 28392                                  ;	FREEENT
 28393                                  ;	NEWDIR
 28394                                  ;	DOOPEN
 28395                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 28396                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 28397                                  ;
 28398                                  ;	Revision history:
 28399                                  ;
 28400                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 28401                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 28402                                  
 28403                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 28404                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28405                                  ;
 28406                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 28407                                  ;
 28408                                  ; Inputs:
 28409                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 28410                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 28411                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 28412                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 28413                                  ;               entries
 28414                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 28415                                  ; Function:
 28416                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 28417                                  ; Outputs:
 28418                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 28419                                  ;       ELSE
 28420                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 28421                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 28422                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 28423                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 28424                                  ;
 28425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28426                                  
 28427                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28428                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28429                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28430                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28431                                  
 28432                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 28433                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 28434                                  
 28435                                  BUILDDIR:
 28436                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28437                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 28438                                  
 28439 00004EAF A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 28440 00004EB2 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 28441                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 28442                                          ;CLC
 28443                                          ;retn
 28444                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28445 00004EB5 7507                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)
 28446                                  
 28447                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 28448 00004EB7 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 28449 00004EBC 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 28450                                          ;STC
 28451                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28452                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 28453                                  builddir_cmc_retn:
 28454                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28455 00004EBE F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 28456                                  builddir_retn:
 28457 00004EBF C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 28458                                  
 28459                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 28460                                  NEWDIR: 
 28461 00004EC0 8B1E[C205]              	MOV     BX,[DIRSTART]
 28462 00004EC4 09DB                            OR      BX,BX
 28463 00004EC6 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR
 28464 00004EC8 E82806                  	call	GETEOF
 28465 00004ECB 72F2                            jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 28466                                  NULLDIR:
 28467 00004ECD B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 28468 00004ED0 E83905                  	call	ALLOCATE
 28469 00004ED3 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 28470 00004ED5 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 28471 00004ED9 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 28472 00004EDB 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 28473 00004EDD E8DBF5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 28474 00004EE0 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 28475 00004EE2 C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 28476 00004EE8 EB29                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 28477                                  ADDINGDIR:
 28478 00004EEA 53                              PUSH    BX
 28479 00004EEB 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 28480 00004EEF E82D0C                          call	IsEOF
 28481 00004EF2 5B                              POP     BX
 28482 00004EF3 7217                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 28483                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 28484 00004EF5 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 28485                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28486                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 28487 00004EF9 50                      	PUSH	AX
 28488 00004EFA 55                      	PUSH	BP
 28489 00004EFB B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 28490                                  	; 15/12/2022
 28491 00004EFD 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 28492                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28493                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 28494                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 28495 00004F01 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 28496 00004F05 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 28497 00004F07 E8E8DD                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 28498 00004F0A 5D                              POP     BP
 28499 00004F0B 58                              POP     AX
 28500                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28501                                          ;POP	CX
 28502                                  
 28503                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 28504                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 28505 00004F0C 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 28506 00004F0E 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 28507 00004F10 E8CC04                  	call	FIGREC
 28508                                  GOTDIRREC:
 28509                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 28510 00004F13 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28511 00004F17 FEC1                            INC     CL
 28512 00004F19 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 28513                                  ZERODIR:
 28514 00004F1B 51                              PUSH    CX
 28515                                  	; 22/09/2023
 28516                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 28517                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 28518 00004F1C B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 28519                                          ;call	GETBUFFR
 28520 00004F1E E85010                          call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 28521 00004F21 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 28522 00004F23 59                              POP     CX
 28523 00004F24 C3                              retn
 28524                                  
 28525                                  GET_SSIZE:
 28526                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 28527 00004F25 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 28528 00004F29 06                              PUSH    ES
 28529 00004F2A C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 28530                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 28531 00004F2E 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 28532 00004F33 57                              PUSH    DI
 28533                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 28534                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 28535 00004F34 83C718                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 28536 00004F37 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 28537 00004F39 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 28538 00004F3B F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 28539 00004F3D 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 28540 00004F3F AA                              STOSB
 28541                                  EVENZ:
 28542 00004F40 5F                              POP     DI
 28543                                  
 28544                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28545 00004F41 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 28546                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 28547 00004F46 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 28548 00004F48 E82D12                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 28549                                          
 28550                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 28551 00004F4B 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 28552                                  yesdirty7:
 28553 00004F50 07                              POP	ES
 28554 00004F51 59                              POP	CX
 28555                                  
 28556                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28557                                  
 28558                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28559                                  	;INC	DX
 28560                                  
 28561                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28562                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28563                                  	;add	dx,1
 28564                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 28565                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 28566                                  	;; ax=0
 28567                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 28568                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28569 00004F52 42                      	inc	dx
 28570 00004F53 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 28571 00004F55 FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 28572                                  loop_zerodir:
 28573 00004F59 E2C0                            LOOP    ZERODIR
 28574                                  
 28575 00004F5B A1[4803]                        MOV     AX,[LASTENT]
 28576 00004F5E 40                              INC     AX
 28577                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28578                                  	; cf=0
 28579                                  	;CLC
 28580 00004F5F C3                              retn
 28581                                  
 28582                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28583                                  ;
 28584                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 28585                                  ;
 28586                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 28587                                  ;
 28588                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 28589                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 28590                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 28591                                  ;
 28592                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28593                                  
 28594                                  SETDOTENT:
 28595                                  ;	Fill in name field
 28596 00004F60 AB                              STOSW
 28597 00004F61 B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 28598 00004F64 B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 28599 00004F67 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 28600 00004F69 AA                              STOSB
 28601                                  
 28602                                  ;	Set up attribute
 28603                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 28604 00004F6A B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 28605 00004F6C AA                              STOSB
 28606                                  
 28607                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 28608 00004F6D 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 28609 00004F70 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 28610                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 28611 00004F74 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 28612 00004F77 AB                              STOSW
 28613                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 28614 00004F78 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 28615 00004F7B AB                      	STOSW
 28616                                  
 28617                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 28618 00004F7C 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 28619 00004F7E AB                              STOSW
 28620                                  
 28621                                  ;	0 file size
 28622 00004F7F 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 28623 00004F81 AB                              STOSW
 28624 00004F82 AB                              STOSW
 28625 00004F83 C3                              retn
 28626                                  
 28627                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 28628                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28629                                  ;
 28630                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 28631                                  ;
 28632                                  ; Inputs:
 28633                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 28634                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 28635                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 28636                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 28637                                  ;
 28638                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 28639                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 28640                                  ;
 28641                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 28642                                  ;               terminated)
 28643                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 28644                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 28645                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 28646                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 28647                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 28648                                  ; Function:
 28649                                  ;       Make a new node
 28650                                  ; Outputs:
 28651                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 28652                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 28653                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 28654                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 28655                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 28656                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 28657                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 28658                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 28659                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 28660                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 28661                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 28662                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 28663                                  ;       ELSE
 28664                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 28665                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 28666                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 28667                                  ;               containing new node.
 28668                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 28669                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 28670                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 28671                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 28672                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 28673                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 28674                                  ;
 28675                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28676                                  
 28677                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28678                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28679                                  
 28680                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28681                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28682                                  
 28683                                  MakeNode:
 28684                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 28685 00004F84 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 28686 00004F8A 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 28687 00004F8B C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 28688 00004F90 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 28689 00004F93 E888F5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 28690 00004F96 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 28691 00004F98 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 28692 00004F9A 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 28693 00004F9B 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 28694 00004F9D 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 28695 00004F9F 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 28696 00004FA2 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 28697                                  make_err_4:
 28698 00004FA4 B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 28699                                  make_err_ret:
 28700 00004FA6 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 28701 00004FA8 F9                              STC
 28702                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 28703 00004FA9 C3                              retn
 28704                                  
 28705                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 28706                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 28707                                  make_type:
 28708                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 28709                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28710                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 28711 00004FAA F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 28712 00004FAF 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 28713 00004FB1 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 28714                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 28715                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 28716 00004FB6 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 28717 00004FBB 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 28718 00004FBD F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 28719 00004FBE B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 28720                                  	; 22/11/2022
 28721                                  make_retn:
 28722                                  	;return
 28723 00004FC1 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 28724                                  
 28725                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 28726                                  
 28727                                  make_type2:
 28728 00004FC2 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 28729 00004FC6 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 28730 00004FC8 F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 28731 00004FC9 EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 28732                                  
 28733                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 28734                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 28735                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 28736                                  ;   else => file
 28737                                  
 28738                                  make_exists:
 28739 00004FCB 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 28740 00004FCD B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 28741                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 28742 00004FCF F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 28743 00004FD4 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 28744                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 28745                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 28746 00004FD6 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 28747 00004FD8 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 28748 00004FDA 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 28749 00004FDC 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 28750 00004FDE 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 28751 00004FDF 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 28752                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 28753 00004FE3 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 28754                                  	;test	ch,1
 28755 00004FE7 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 28756 00004FEA 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 28757 00004FEC E8D0F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 28758 00004FEF 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 28759 00004FF0 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 28760 00004FF2 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 28761                                  make_share:
 28762 00004FF4 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 28763 00004FF6 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 28764 00004FF7 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 28765 00004FF8 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 28766 00004FFA E84501                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 28767 00004FFD C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 28768 00005001 56                      	push	si
 28769 00005002 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 28770 00005003 E89529                  	call	ShareEnter
 28771 00005006 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 28772                                  
 28773                                  ; User failed request.
 28774 00005008 5B                      	pop	bx
 28775 00005009 5E                      	pop	si
 28776 0000500A 59                      	pop	cx
 28777 0000500B 58                      	pop	ax
 28778                                  
 28779                                  Make_Share_ret:
 28780 0000500C B006                            MOV     AL,6
 28781 0000500E EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 28782                                  
 28783                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 28784 00005010 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 28785                                  make_err_ret_5:
 28786 00005011 B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 28787                                          ; 22/11/2022
 28788 00005013 EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 28789                                  
 28790                                  make_exists_dir:
 28791 00005015 B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 28792                                  	; 22/11/2022
 28793 00005017 EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 28794                                  
 28795                                  make_save:
 28796 00005019 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 28797 0000501A 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 28798 0000501C E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 28799 0000501F 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 28800 00005020 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 28801 00005022 B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 28802                                  make_save_retn:
 28803 00005024 C3                              retn
 28804                                  
 28805                                  make_new:
 28806 00005025 E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 28807 00005028 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 28808                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 28809 0000502A F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 28810 0000502F 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 28811                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 28812 00005031 50                      	push	ax
 28813 00005032 53                      	push	bx
 28814 00005033 56                      	push	si		
 28815 00005034 E86429                          call	ShareEnter
 28816 00005037 5E                      	pop	si
 28817 00005038 5B                      	pop	bx
 28818 00005039 58                      	pop	ax
 28819 0000503A 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 28820                                  
 28821                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 28822                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 28823                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 28824                                  
 28825 0000503C 50                              PUSH    AX
 28826 0000503D C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 28827                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 28828 00005041 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 28829                                  	
 28830                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28831                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 28832 00005045 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 28833                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 28834 0000504A 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 28835                                  	; 22/11/2022
 28836 0000504C E82911                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 28837                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 28838 0000504F 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 28839                                  yesdirty8:
 28840 00005054 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 28841                                  	; 15/12/2022
 28842 00005058 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 28843                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28844                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 28845                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 28846 0000505C E81410                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 28847 0000505F 58                              POP     AX
 28848 00005060 EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 28849                                  
 28850                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 28851                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 28852                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 28853                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 28854                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 28855                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 28856                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 28857                                  ;
 28858                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 28859                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 28860                                  
 28861                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28862                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28863                                  
 28864                                  MakeEndShare:
 28865 00005062 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 28866 00005066 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 28867 00005068 E898C8                  	call	ECritSFT
 28868 0000506B 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 28869                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 28870 0000506E 50                      	push	ax
 28871 0000506F 57                      	push	di
 28872 00005070 06                      	push	es
 28873 00005071 9C                              PUSHF
 28874 00005072 E82129                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 28875 00005075 9D                              POPF
 28876 00005076 07                      	pop	es
 28877 00005077 5F                      	pop	di
 28878 00005078 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 28879                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 28880 0000507B E8B2C8                  	call	LCritSFT
 28881                                  	; 22/11/2022
 28882                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28883 0000507E 5B                      	pop	bx
 28884 0000507F 5E                      	pop	si
 28885 00005080 59                      	pop	cx
 28886 00005081 58                      	pop	ax
 28887 00005082 E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 28888                                  
 28889                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 28890                                  
 28891 00005085 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 28892 00005087 50                      	push	ax
 28893 00005088 53                      	push	bx
 28894 00005089 56                      	push	si
 28895 0000508A 9C                              PUSHF
 28896 0000508B E80D29                          call	ShareEnter
 28897 0000508E 9D                              POPF
 28898 0000508F 5E                      	pop	si
 28899 00005090 5B                      	pop	bx
 28900 00005091 58                      	pop	ax
 28901                                  
 28902                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 28903                                  
 28904                                  makeendshare_retn:
 28905 00005092 C3                              retn
 28906                                  
 28907                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28908                                  ;
 28909                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 28910                                  ;
 28911                                  ; Inputs:
 28912                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 28913                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 28914                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 28915                                  ;               entries
 28916                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 28917                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 28918                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 28919                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 28920                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 28921                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 28922                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 28923                                  ;       If FILE
 28924                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 28925                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 28926                                  ;       If device
 28927                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 28928                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 28929                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 28930                                  ; Function:
 28931                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 28932                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 28933                                  ; Outputs:
 28934                                  ;       Carry set if error
 28935                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 28936                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 28937                                  ;       else
 28938                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 28939                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 28940                                  ;
 28941                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28942                                  
 28943                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28944                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28945                                  
 28946                                  NEWENTRY:
 28947 00005093 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 28948 00005097 7315                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 28949 00005099 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 28950                                  	;STC
 28951                                          ;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 28952                                          ; 24/09/2023
 28953 0000509E 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 28954 000050A0 E80CFE                  	CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 28955 000050A3 72ED                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 28956 000050A5 E8E4F3                          call	GETENT          ; Point at that free entry
 28957 000050A8 72E8                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 28958 000050AA EB0E                            JMP     SHORT FREESPOT
 28959                                  
 28960                                  ERRRET3:
 28961 000050AC F9                              STC
 28962                                  newentry_retn:
 28963 000050AD C3                              retn
 28964                                  
 28965                                  EXISTENT:

 28967 000050B0 7903                            JNS	short NOT_DEV1

 28969                                  
 28970                                  NOT_DEV1:

 28972 000050B8 72F3                            jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 28973                                  FREESPOT:
 28974                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 28975 000050BA F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 28976 000050BF 7407                            JZ	short NOTVOLID
 28977 000050C1 803E[7B05]00                    CMP     BYTE [VOLID],0
 28978 000050C6 75E4                            JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 28979                                  NOTVOLID:
 28980 000050C8 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 28981 000050CC 89DF                            MOV     DI,BX
 28982                                  
 28983 000050CE BE[4B05]                        MOV     SI,NAME1
 28984

 28986 000050D4 F3A5                            REP     MOVSW
 28987 000050D6 A4                              MOVSB                   ; Move name into dir entry
 28988 000050D7 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 28989 000050DA AA                      	STOSB                   ; Attributes
 28990                                  
 28991                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 28992 000050DB B105                            MOV     CL,5            ;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 28993                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 28994                                  
 28995 000050DD 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 28996 000050DF F3AB                            REP     STOSW           ; Zero pad
 28997 000050E1 E888BA                          call	DATE16
 28998 000050E4 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 28999 000050E5 AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_time
 29000 000050E6 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 29001 000050E7 AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_date
 29002 000050E8 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX

 29004                                  				; 	(recomputed for new buffer)

 29006 000050EC AB                              STOSW
 29007 000050ED AB                              STOSW
 29008                                  updnxt:
 29009 000050EE 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 29010                                  
 29011                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29012                                  
 29013                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 29014 000050F2 26F6440540              	TEST	byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 29015                                  				;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 29017 000050F9 E87C10                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT	;LB.				  ;AN000;

 29023                                  	; 15/12/2022
 29024 00005105 268A4600                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP]
 29025                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 29026                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]

 29028 00005109 50                              PUSH    AX

 29030

 29032                                  ; we have some protection against invalid media changes if an Int 24

 29068                                  ;NOTE FALL THROUGH
 29069                                  
 29070                                  ; DOSCODE:8AE4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 29071                                  
 29072                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29073                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 29074                                  
 29075                                  ; DOOPEN
 29076                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29077                                  ;
 29078                                  ; Inputs:
 29079                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 29080                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 29081                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 29082                                  ;       If FILE
 29083                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 29084                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 29085                                  ;       If device
 29086                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 29087                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 29088                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 29089                                  ; Function:
 29090                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 29091                                  ; Outputs:
 29092                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 29093                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 29094                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 29095                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 29096                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 29097                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 29098                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 29099                                  ;       If device
 29100                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 29101                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 29102                                  ;       If file
 29103                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 29104                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 29105                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 29106                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 29107                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 29108                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 29109                                  ;
 29110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29111                                  
 29112                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 29113                                  DOOPEN:
 29114                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 29115                                  
 29116 00005142 88E6                            MOV     DH,AH           ; AH to different place
 29117 00005144 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]

 29119 00005148 83C704                          ADD     DI,SF_ENTRY.sf_attr ; Skip ref_count and mode fields
 29120                                  	; 24/09/2023

 29123                                  				;   attribute of 0 (for R/O testing etc).
 29124 0000514D 08F6                            OR      DH,DH           ; See if our assumption good.
 29125 0000514F 7807                            JS	short DEV_SFT1	; If device DS=DOSGROUP
 29126 00005151 8E1E[E405]                      MOV     DS,[CURBUF+2]
 29127                                  	;mov	al,[BX+0Bh]
 29128 00005155 8A470B                          MOV     AL,[BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]

 29158                                  				; ES:DI -> sf_firclus

 29161                                  ;	(irrelevant for devices)

 29168

 29296 000051DB F3A4                            REP     MOVSB           ; sf_name
 29297 000051DD 5E                              POP     SI              ; recover DS:SI -> dir_first
 29298                                  
 29299                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29300 000051DE 16                              push	ss
 29301 000051DF 1F                      	pop	ds
 29302                                  	; 24/09/2023
 29303                                  	; cf=0
 29304                                          ;CLC
 29305 000051E0 C3                              retn
 29306                                  
 29307                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29308                                  ;
 29309                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 29310                                  ;
 29311                                  ; Inputs:
 29312                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 29313                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 29314                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 29315                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 29316                                  ; Function:
 29317                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 29318                                  ; Outputs:
 29319                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 29320                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 29321                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 29322                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29323                                  
 29324                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29325                                  FREEENT:
 29326 000051E1 1E                              PUSH    DS
 29327 000051E2 C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 29328 000051E6 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 29329                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29330                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 29331 000051E8 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29332                                  ;hkn; SS override
 29333 000051EB 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29334 000051F0 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 29335 000051F3 1F                              POP     DS
 29336 000051F4 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 29337 000051F7 722E                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 29338                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 29339 000051F9 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 29340 000051FD 7728                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 29341 000051FF 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 29342 00005201 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 29343 00005202 FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29344 00005206 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 29345 00005207 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 29346 00005209 E8AC02                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 29347 0000520C 5A                              POP     DX
 29348 0000520D 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29349 00005211 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 29350 00005213 5B                              POP     BX
 29351                                  freeent_retn:
 29352 00005214 C3                              retn			; Screw up
 29353                                  
 29354                                  GET_BUF_BACK:
 29355                                  	; 22/09/2023
 29356                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 29357                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *
 29358                                          ;XOR	AL,AL ; *
 29359                                  	;call	GETBUFFR        ; Get sector back
 29360 00005215 E8570D                  	call	GETBUFFER ; * ; pre read      
 29361                                  
 29362 00005218 5B                      	POP     BX              ; Get offset back
 29363 00005219 72F9                            jc	short freeent_retn
 29364 0000521B E8B0EA                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 29365 0000521E 031E[E205]                      ADD     BX,[CURBUF]	; Correct it for new buffer
 29366 00005222 89DE                            MOV     SI,BX
 29367                                  	;add	si,1Ah
 29368 00005224 83C61A                          ADD     SI,dir_entry.dir_first	; Get corrected SI
 29369                                  RET1:
 29370 00005227 F8                              CLC
 29371 00005228 C3                              retn
 29372                                  
 29373                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29374                                  ;
 29375                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 29376                                  ;
 29377                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 29378                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 29379                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 29380                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 29381                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 29382                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 29383                                  ;
 29384                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29385                                  
 29386                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 29387 00005229 50                      	PUSH    AX
 29388 0000522A 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 29389 0000522B 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 29390 00005230 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 29391 00005232 C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 29392 00005237 06                      	push	es
 29393 00005238 57                      	push	di
 29394 00005239 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 29395 0000523D E8ADF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 29396 00005240 5F                      	pop	di
 29397 00005241 07                      	pop	es
 29398                                  
 29399                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 29400 00005242 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 29401 00005243 58                              POP     AX
 29402 00005244 C3                              retn
 29403

 29435                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 29436                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29437                                  ;
 29438                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 29439                                  ;
 29440                                  ; Inputs:
 29441                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 29442                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 29443                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 29444                                  ; Outputs:
 29445                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 29446                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 29447                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 29448                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 29449                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 29450                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29451                                  
 29452                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29453                                  ; DOSCODE:8BF2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 29454                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29455                                  ; DOSCODE:8BB7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 29456                                  
 29457                                  FNDCLUS:
 29458 00005245 06                      	PUSH	ES
 29459 00005246 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; setup addressability to SFT
 29460                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:di+1Bh] ; MSDOS 3.3
 29461                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+35h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 29462 0000524A 268B5D35                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus]
 29463                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+19h]
 29464 0000524E 268B5519                        MOV     DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_cluspos]
 29465 00005252 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 29466 00005254 7424                    	JZ	short NOCLUS
 29467                                  
 29468 00005256 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX
 29469 00005258 7308                            JNB	short FINDIT
 29470                                  
 29471 0000525A 01D1                            ADD     CX,DX
 29472 0000525C 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 29473                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+0Bh]
 29474 0000525E 268B5D0B                        MOV     BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_firclus]
 29475                                  FINDIT:
 29476 00005262 07                              POP	ES
 29477 00005263 E313                    	JCXZ	RET9
 29478                                  
 29479                                  	;entry	SKPCLP
 29480                                  SKPCLP:
 29481 00005265 E8CE08                  	call	UNPACK
 29482 00005268 7214                            jc	short fndclus_retn	; retc
 29483                                  
 29484                                  	; 09/09/2018
 29485                                  
 29486                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 29487                                  	;push	bx
 29488                                  	;mov	bx,di
 29489                                  	;call	IsEOF
 29490                                  	;pop	bx	
 29491                                  	;jae	short RET9
 29492                                  
 29493                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29494                                  
 29495                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 29496 0000526A 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 29497 0000526C E8B008                  	call	IsEOF
 29498 0000526F 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 29499 00005271 7305                    	jae	short RET9
 29500                                  
 29501 00005273 87DF                            XCHG    BX,DI
 29502 00005275 42                              INC     DX
 29503                                  
 29504 00005276 E2ED                    	LOOP	SKPCLP			; RMFS
 29505                                  RET9:	
 29506 00005278 F8                      	CLC
 29507 00005279 C3                              retn
 29508                                  NOCLUS:

 29510 0000527B 41                              INC	CX
 29511 0000527C 4A                              DEC	DX
 29512 0000527D F8                              CLC
 29513                                  
 29514                                  fndclus_retn:
 29515 0000527E C3                              retn

 29517                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 29518                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29519                                  ;
 29520                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 29521                                  ;
 29522                                  ; Inputs:
 29523                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 29524                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 29525                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 29526                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 29527                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 29528                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 29529                                  ; Function:
 29530                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 29531                                  ;       read if necessary.
 29532                                  ; Outputs:
 29533                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 29534                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 29535                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 29536                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 29537                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 29538                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 29539                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29540                                  
 29541                                  BUFSEC:
 29542 0000527F 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 29543 00005283 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 29544                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 29545 00005287 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 29546 0000528C E85001                          CALL    FIGREC
 29547 0000528F E8E40C                  	call	GETBUFFR
 29548 00005292 72EA                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 29549                                  
 29550 00005294 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 29551 00005299 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 29552 0000529D 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 29553 0000529F 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 29554 000052A3 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 29555 000052A5 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 29556 000052A9 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 29557                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 29558 000052AD 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 29559                                  	;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 29560                                  	;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 29561 000052B2 8D7D18                          LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 29562 000052B5 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 29563 000052B9 F8                              CLC
 29564 000052BA C3                              retn
 29565                                  
 29566                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 29567                                  
 29568                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29569                                  ;
 29570                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 29571                                  ;
 29572                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 29573                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 29574                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 29575                                  ;
 29576                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 29577                                  ;
 29578                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29579                                  
 29580                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29581                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29582                                  BUFRD:
 29583 000052BB 06                              PUSH	ES
 29584 000052BC 31C0                            xor	ax, ax			; pre-read sector
 29585 000052BE E8BEFF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 29586 000052C1 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK
 29587                                  
 29588                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 29589 000052C3 07                              POP	ES
 29590 000052C4 EB2B                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED
 29591                                  
 29592                                  BUF_OK:
 29593 000052C6 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 29594 000052C8 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 29595 000052CC 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 29596 000052CE 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 29597 000052D0 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 29598                                  ;M039
 29599                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 29600                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 29601                                  	;MOVSB
 29602                                  ;EVENRD:
 29603                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 29604                                  
 29605                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 29606                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 29607                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 29608                                  
 29609                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 29610 000052D2 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 29611                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 29612                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 29613                                  	; 16/12/2022
 29614 000052D4 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 29615 000052D6 A4                      	movsb ; ****
 29616                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 29617                                  	;adc	cx,0
 29618                                  	;rep	movsb
 29619                                  ;M039
 29620                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 29621 000052D7 07                              POP	ES
 29622                                  ;hkn; SS override
 29623 000052D8 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 29624                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 29625                                  	;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 29626 000052DD 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 29627 000052E0 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 29628 000052E2 E8310C                          call	PLACEBUF
 29629                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 29630 000052E5 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 29631 000052E9 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC	; No, leave buf where it is
 29632                                  ;M039
 29633                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 29634                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 29635                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 29636                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 29637 000052EB 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 29638                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 29639                                  
 29640                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 29641 000052F0 F8                              CLC
 29642                                  RBUFPLACED:
 29643 000052F1 16                      	push	ss
 29644 000052F2 1F                      	pop	ds
 29645 000052F3 C3                              retn
 29646                                  
 29647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29648                                  ;
 29649                                  ; Procedure : BUFWRT
 29650                                  ;
 29651                                  ; Do a partial sector write via one of the system buffers
 29652                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 29653                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 29654                                  ;
 29655                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 29656                                  ;
 29657                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29658                                  
 29659                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29660                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29661                                  BUFWRT:
 29662                                          ;MOV     AX,[SECPOS]
 29663                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 29664                                  	;ADD	AX,1            	; Set for next sector
 29665                                          ;MOV	[SECPOS],AX 		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29666                                          ;ADC	word [SECPOS+2],0	;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29667                                          ; 24/09/2023

 29669 000052F8 7504                    	jnz	short bufw_secpos
 29670 000052FA FF06[C605]              	inc	word [SECPOS+2]
 29671                                  bufw_secpos:
 29672 000052FE A1[C605]                	MOV	AX,[SECPOS+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29673 00005301 3B06[CA05]                      CMP	AX,[VALSEC+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29674 00005305 B001                            MOV	AL,1			;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29675 00005307 770F                            JA	short NOREAD		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29676 00005309 720B                            JB	short _doread		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29677 0000530B A1[C405]                        MOV	AX,[SECPOS]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 29678                                  
 29679                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 29680                                  	;INC	AX
 29681                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX ; 09/09/2018
 29682                                  
 29683                                  	; 20/05/2019
 29684                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0

 29686 00005312 B001                            MOV     AL,1
 29687 00005314 7702                            JA	short NOREAD		; Skip preread if SECPOS>VALSEC
 29688                                  _doread:

 29690                                  NOREAD:

 29692 00005319 E863FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 29693 0000531C 72A5                    	JC	short BUF_IO_FAIL
 29694 0000531E 8E1E[2E03]                      MOV     DS,[DMAADD+2]
 29695 00005322 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1

 29697                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 29698                                  	;JNC	short EVENWRT ; 09/09/2018
 29699                                  	;MOVSB
 29700                                  ;EVENWRT:
 29701                                  	;REP	MOVSW
 29702                                  
 29703                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 29704                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Transfer memory block.
 29705                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Buffer.
 29706

 29709                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 29710                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 29711                                  	; 16/12/2022

 29713 00005328 A4                      	movsb ; ****

 29715                                  	;adc	cx,0
 29716                                  	;rep	movsb
 29717                                  ;M039
 29718                                  EVENWRT: ; ****

 29720

 29746                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.

 29760                                  
 29761                                  ;Break   <NEXTSEC -- Compute next sector to read or write>
 29762                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29763                                  ;
 29764                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTSEC
 29765                                  ;
 29766                                  ; Compute the next sector to read or write
 29767                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 29768                                  ;
 29769                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29770                                  
 29771                                  NEXTSEC:
 29772 00005350 F606[7405]FF            	test	byte [TRANS],0FFh ; -1 
 29773 00005355 7426                            JZ	short CLRET
 29774                                  
 29775 00005357 A0[7305]                        MOV     AL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 29776 0000535A FEC0                            INC     AL
 29777                                  	;cmp	al,[es:bp+4]
 29778 0000535C 263A4604                        CMP     AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 29779 00005360 7618                            JBE	short SAVPOS
 29780                                  
 29781 00005362 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 29782 00005366 E8B607                          call	IsEOF
 29783 00005369 7314                            JAE	short NONEXT
 29784                                  
 29785 0000536B E8C807                          call	UNPACK
 29786 0000536E 720F                            JC	short NONEXT
 29787                                  clusgot:

 29818                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed

 29891 000053D7 8826[7305]                      MOV     [SECCLUSPOS],AH
 29892 000053DB 89D1                            MOV     CX,DX           ; Anyway, make the total equal to the request
 29893 000053DD EBC8                            JMP     SHORT FINCLUS

 29895                                  ;Break	<FIGREC -- Figure sector in allocation unit>
 29896                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29897                                  ;
 29898                                  ; Procedure Name : FIGREC
 29899                                  ;

 29904                                  ; Outputs:
 29905                                  ;       DX = physical sector number           (LOW)
 29906                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR] Physical sector address (HIGH)
