 36464                                  ;**	Arena_Free_Process
 36465                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36466                                  ;	Free all arena blocks allocated to a prOcess
 36467                                  ;
 36468                                  ;	ENTRY	(bx) = PID of process
 36469                                  ;	EXIT	none
 36470                                  ;	USES	????? BUGBUG
 36471                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36472                                  
 36473                                  	; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 36474                                  	; DOSCODE:A1C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 36475                                  
 36476                                  arena_free_process:
 36477                                  	; 14/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36478                                  	; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 36479 00006843 36A1[2400]                      MOV	AX,[SS:arena_head]
 36480                                  arena_free_process_start:
 36481 00006847 BF0000                  	MOV     DI,ARENA.SIGNATURE ; 0
 36482                                  	;MOV	AX,[SS:arena_head] ; 15/04/2018  
 36483 0000684A E83000                          CALL	check_signature         ; ES <- AX, check for valid block
 36484                                  
 36485                                  arena_free_process_loop:
 36486                                          ;retc
 36487 0000684D 723D                            JC	SHORT AFP_RETN	; Retro DOS v2.0 - 05/03/2018
 36488 0000684F 06                      	PUSH    ES
 36489 00006850 1F                              POP     DS
 36490                                  	;cmp	[1],bx 
 36491 00006851 391E0100                        CMP     [ARENA.OWNER],BX	; is block owned by pid?
 36492 00006855 7504                            JNZ     SHORT arena_free_next	; no, skip to next
 36493                                  	;mov	[1],di
 36494 00006857 893E0100                        MOV     [ARENA.OWNER],DI	; yes... free him
 36495                                  
 36496                                  arena_free_next:
 36497                                  	;cmp	byte [di],5Ah ;'Z'
 36498 0000685B 803D5A                          CMP     BYTE [DI],arena_signature_end
 36499                                                                          ; end of road, Jack?
 36500                                          ;retz				; never come back no more
 36501                                  	;JZ	SHORT AFP_RETN  ; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 2.11)
 36502                                  	; 14/05/2019
 36503                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36504 0000685E 7405                    	jz	short arena_chk_umbs
 36505                                          
 36506 00006860 E81300                  	CALL    arena_next              ; next item in ES/AX carry set if trash
 36507 00006863 EBE8                            JMP     SHORT arena_free_process_loop
 36508                                  
 36509                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36510                                  arena_chk_umbs:				; M010 - Start
 36511                                  	; 20/05/2019
 36512 00006865 36A1[8C00]              	mov	ax,[ss:UMB_HEAD]	; ax = umb_head
 36513 00006869 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh		; Q: is umb_head initialized
 36514 0000686C 741E                    	je	short ret_label		; N: we're done
 36515                                  	
 36516 0000686E 8CDF                    	mov	di,ds			; di = last arena
 36517 00006870 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; Q: is last arena above umb_head
 36518 00006872 7318                    	jae	short ret_label		; Y: we've scanned umbs also. done.
 36519 00006874 EBD1                    	jmp	short arena_free_process_start
 36520                                  					; M010 - End
 36521                                  ;AFP_RETN:
 36522                                  ;	RETN
 36523                                  
 36524                                  ;	BREAK	<Arena Helper Routines>
 36525                                  
 36526                                  ;**	Arena_Next - Find Next item in Arena
 36527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36528                                  ;	ENTRY	DS - pointer to block head
 36529                                  ;		(di) = 0
 36530                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 36531                                  ;		'C' set iff arena damaged
 36532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36533                                  
 36534                                  arena_next:
 36535 00006876 8CD8                            MOV     AX,DS                   ; AX <- current block
 36536 00006878 03060300                        ADD     AX,[ARENA.SIZE]		; AX <- AX + current block length
 36537 0000687C 40                              INC     AX                      ; remember that header!
 36538                                  
 36539                                  ;       fall into check_signature and return
 36540                                  ;
 36541                                  ;       CALL    check_signature         ; ES <- AX, carry set if error
 36542                                  ;       RETN
 36543                                  
 36544                                  ;**	Check_Signature - Check Memory Block Signature
 36545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36546                                  ;	ENTRY	(AX) = address of block header
 36547                                  ;		(di) = 0
 36548                                  ;	EXIT	 ES = AX
 36549                                  ;		'C' clear if signature good
 36550                                  ;		'C' set if signature bad
 36551                                  ;	USES	ES, Flags
 36552                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36553                                  
 36554                                  check_signature:        
 36555                                  
 36556 0000687D 8EC0                    	MOV     ES,AX                   ; ES <- AX
 36557                                  	;cmp	byte [es:di],4Dh ; 'M'
 36558 0000687F 26803D4D                        CMP     BYTE [ES:DI],arena_signature_normal
 36559                                                                          ; IF next signature = not_end THEN
 36560 00006883 7407                            JZ      SHORT check_signature_ok ;   GOTO ok
 36561                                  	;cmp 	byte [es:di],5Ah ; 'Z'
 36562 00006885 26803D5A                        CMP     BYTE [ES:DI],arena_signature_end
 36563                                                                          ; IF next signature = end then
 36564 00006889 7401                            JZ      SHORT check_signature_ok ;   GOTO ok
 36565 0000688B F9                              STC                             ; set error
 36566                                  ret_label: ; MSDOS 6.0
 36567                                  AFP_RETN:
 36568                                   	; Retro DOS v2.0 - 05/03/2018
 36569                                  check_signature_ok:
 36570                                  COALESCE_RETN:
 36571 0000688C C3                      	RETN
 36572                                  
 36573                                  ;**	Coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 36574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36575                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 36576                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 36577                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 36578                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 36579                                  ;
 36580                                  ;	ENTRY	(ds) = pointer to the head of a free block
 36581                                  ;		(di) = 0
 36582                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 36583                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 36584                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 36585                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 36586                                  ;	USES	(cx)
 36587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36588                                          
 36589                                  Coalesce:
 36590                                  	;cmp	byte [di],5Ah ; 'Z'
 36591 0000688D 803D5A                  	CMP     BYTE [DI],arena_signature_end
 36592                                                                          ; IF current signature = END THEN
 36593                                          ;retz				;   GOTO ok
 36594 00006890 74FA                            jz	short COALESCE_RETN
 36595 00006892 E8E1FF                  	CALL    arena_next              ; ES, AX <- next block, Carry set if error
 36596                                          ;retc				; IF no error THEN GOTO check
 36597 00006895 72F5                    	jc	short COALESCE_RETN
 36598                                  
 36599                                  coalesce_check:
 36600                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 36601 00006897 26393E0100                      CMP     [ES:ARENA.OWNER],DI
 36602                                          ;retnz				; IF next block isnt free THEN return
 36603 0000689C 75EE                            JNZ	SHORT COALESCE_RETN
 36604                                  	;mov	cx,[ES:3]
 36605 0000689E 268B0E0300              	MOV     CX,[ES:ARENA.SIZE]	; CX <- next block size
 36606 000068A3 41                              INC     CX                      ; CX <- CX + 1 (for header size)
 36607                                          ;ADD	[3],CX
 36608 000068A4 010E0300                	ADD     [ARENA.SIZE],CX		; current size <- current size + CX
 36609 000068A8 268A0D                          MOV     CL,[ES:DI]              ; move up signature
 36610 000068AB 880D                            MOV     [DI],CL
 36611 000068AD EBDE                            JMP     SHORT Coalesce		; try again
 36612                                  
 36613                                  ; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 36614                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 641Fh
 36615                                  
 36616                                  ;	BREAK  <$Alloc - allocate space in memory>
 36617                                  
 36618                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 36619                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36620                                  ;**	$Alloc - Allocate Memory Space
 36621                                  ;
 36622                                  ;	$Alloc services the INT21 that allocates memory space to a program.
 36623                                  ;	Alloc returns a pointer to a free block of memory that
 36624                                  ;	has the requested size in paragraphs.
 36625                                  ;
 36626                                  ;	If the allocation strategy is HIGH_FIRST or HIGH_ONLY memory is 
 36627                                  ;	scanned from umb_head if not from arena_head. If the strategy is
 36628                                  ; 	HIGH_FIRST the scan is continued from arena_head if a block of 
 36629                                  ;	appropriate size is not found in the UMBs. If the strategy is 
 36630                                  ;	HIGH_FIRST+HIGH_ONLY only the UMBs are scanned for memory.
 36631                                  ;
 36632                                  ;	In either case if bit 0 of UmbFlag is not initialized then the scan
 36633                                  ;	starts from arena_head.
 36634                                  ;
 36635                                  ;	Assembler usage:
 36636                                  ;           MOV     BX,size
 36637                                  ;           MOV     AH,Alloc
 36638                                  ;           INT     21h
 36639                                  ;
 36640                                  ;	BUGBUG - a lot can be done to improve performance. We can set marks
 36641                                  ;	so that we start searching the arena at it's first non-trivial free
 36642                                  ;	block, we can peephole the code, etc. (We can move some subr calls
 36643                                  ;	inline, etc.) I assume that this is called rarely and that the arena
 36644                                  ;	doesn't have too many memory objects in it beyond the first free one.
 36645                                  ;	verify that this is true; if so, this can stay as is
 36646                                  ;
 36647                                  ;	ENTRY	(bx) = requested size, in bytes
 36648                                  ;		(DS) = (ES) = DOSGROUP
 36649                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if memory allocated
 36650                                  ;		  (ax:0) = address of requested memory
 36651                                  ;		'C' set if request failed
 36652                                  ;		  (AX) = error_not_enough_memory
 36653                                  ;		    (bx) = max size we could have allocated
 36654                                  ;		  (ax) = error_arena_trashed
 36655                                  ;	USES	All
 36656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36657                                  
 36658                                  ; MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 36659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36660                                  ;SUBTTL $Alloc - allocate space in memory
 36661                                  ;
 36662                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 36663                                  ;           MOV     BX,size
 36664                                  ;           MOV     AH,Alloc
 36665                                  ;           INT     21h
 36666                                  ;         AX:0 is pointer to allocated memory
 36667                                  ;         BX is max size if not enough memory
 36668                                  ;
 36669                                  ;   Description:
 36670                                  ;           Alloc returns  a  pointer  to  a  free  block of
 36671                                  ;       memory that has the requested  size  in  paragraphs.
 36672                                  ;
 36673                                  ;   Error return:
 36674                                  ;           AX = error_not_enough_memory
 36675                                  ;              = error_arena_trashed
 36676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36677                                  
 36678                                  ; DOSCODE:A28Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 36679                                  
 36680                                  ; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 36681                                  ; DOSCODE:A22Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 36682                                  
 36683                                  _$ALLOC:
 36684                                  	; 25/05/2019 (Procedure has been checked and confirmed)
 36685                                  	; 14/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36686                                  	; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 36687                                  	;EnterCrit critMem
 36688 000068AF E851B0                  	call	ECritMEM ; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 36689                                  
 36690                                  ; 17/12/2022
 36691                                  ; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 36692                                  ;%if 0
 36693                                  	; 14/05/2019
 36694 000068B2 16                      	push	ss
 36695 000068B3 1F                      	pop	ds
 36696                                  
 36697                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36698                                  	;mov	ax,[ss:arena_head]
 36699                                  	;mov	[ss:START_ARENA],ax	; assume LOW_FIRST
 36700                                  
 36701 000068B4 A1[2400]                	mov	ax,[arena_head]
 36702 000068B7 A3[8E00]                	mov	[START_ARENA],ax			
 36703                                  	
 36704                                  	;test	byte [ss:AllocMethod],HIGH_FIRST+HIGH_ONLY
 36705 000068BA F606[0203]C0            	test	byte [AllocMethod],HIGH_FIRST+HIGH_ONLY
 36706                                  					; Q: should we start scanning from 
 36707                                  					;    UMB's
 36708 000068BF 740D                    	jz	short norm_alloc	; N: scan from arena_head
 36709                                  		
 36710                                  	;;cmp	word [ss:UMB_HEAD],-1	; Q: Has umb_head been initialized
 36711                                  	;cmp	word [UMB_HEAD],-1
 36712                                  	;je	short norm_alloc	; N: scan from arena_head
 36713                                  
 36714                                  	;test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: are umb's linked
 36715 000068C1 F606[8900]01            	test	byte [UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; 1
 36716 000068C6 7406                    	jz	short norm_alloc	; N: scan from arena_head
 36717                                  	
 36718                                  	;mov	ax,[ss:UMB_HEAD]
 36719                                  	;mov	[ss:START_ARENA],ax	; start_arena = umb_head
 36720 000068C8 A1[8C00]                	mov	ax,[UMB_HEAD]
 36721 000068CB A3[8E00]                	mov	[START_ARENA],ax
 36722                                  					; M000 - end
 36723                                  norm_alloc:
 36724 000068CE 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 36725 000068D0 89C7                            MOV     DI,AX
 36726                                  	; 15/03/2018
 36727                                          ;MOV	[SS:FirstArena],AX	; init the options
 36728                                          ;MOV	[SS:BestArena],AX
 36729                                          ;MOV	[SS:LastArena],AX
 36730                                  	; 14/05/2019
 36731 000068D2 A3[4003]                	MOV	[FirstArena],AX		; init the options
 36732 000068D5 A3[4203]                        MOV	[BestArena],AX
 36733 000068D8 A3[4403]                        MOV	[LastArena],AX
 36734 000068DB 50                              PUSH    AX                      ; alloc_max <- 0
 36735                                  	; 04/08/2018
 36736                                  start_scan:
 36737                                  	;MOV	AX,[SS:arena_head]	; AX <- beginning of arena
 36738                                  	;MOV	AX,[arena_head]
 36739                                  
 36740                                  	; 14/05/2019	
 36741                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36742                                  	;mov	ax,[SS:START_ARENA]	; M000: AX <- beginning of arena
 36743 000068DC A1[8E00]                	mov	ax,[START_ARENA]
 36744                                  
 36745                                  	; 27/09/2023 (BugFix) (*) 
 36746                                  	; ( jump from 'alloc_chk' (ds<>ss, ax = [SS:START_ARENA]))
 36747                                  start_scan_x:
 36748                                  
 36749 000068DF E89BFF                  	CALL    check_signature         ; ES <- AX, carry set if error
 36750 000068E2 7236                            JC      SHORT alloc_err		; IF error THEN GOTO err
 36751                                  
 36752                                  ;%endif
 36753                                  
 36754                                  ; 17/12/2022
 36755                                  %if 0
 36756                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 36757                                  
 36758                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36759                                  	mov	ax,[ss:arena_head]
 36760                                  	mov	[ss:START_ARENA],ax	; assume LOW_FIRST
 36761                                  
 36762                                  	test	byte [ss:AllocMethod],HIGH_FIRST+HIGH_ONLY
 36763                                  					; Q: should we start scanning from 
 36764                                  					;    UMB's
 36765                                  	jz	short norm_alloc	; N: scan from arena_head
 36766                                  		
 36767                                  	;cmp	word [ss:UMB_HEAD],-1	; Q: Has umb_head been initialized
 36768                                  	;je	short norm_alloc	; N: scan from arena_head
 36769

 36771                                  	jz	short norm_alloc	; N: scan from arena_head
 36772                                  	
 36773                                  	mov	ax,[ss:UMB_HEAD]
 36774                                  	mov	[ss:START_ARENA],ax	; start_arena = umb_head
 36775                                  					; M000 - end
 36776                                  norm_alloc:
 36777                                          XOR     AX,AX
 36778                                          MOV     DI,AX
 36779                                  	; 15/03/2018
 36780                                  	MOV	[SS:FirstArena],AX	; init the options
 36781                                  	MOV	[SS:BestArena],AX
 36782                                  	MOV	[SS:LastArena],AX
 36783                                          PUSH    AX                      ; alloc_max <- 0
 36784                                  	; 04/08/2018
 36785                                  start_scan:
 36786                                  	;MOV	AX,[SS:arena_head]	; AX <- beginning of arena
 36787                                  	; 14/05/2019	
 36788                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36789                                  	mov	ax,[SS:START_ARENA]	; M000: AX <- beginning of arena
 36790                                  	CALL    check_signature         ; ES <- AX, carry set if error
 36791                                          JC      SHORT alloc_err		; IF error THEN GOTO err
 36792                                  %endif
 36793                                  
 36794                                  alloc_scan:
 36795 000068E4 06                              PUSH    ES
 36796 000068E5 1F                              POP     DS                      ; DS <- ES
 36797 000068E6 393E0100                        CMP     [ARENA.OWNER],DI ; 0
 36798 000068EA 7469                            JZ      SHORT alloc_free	; IF current block is free THEN examine
 36799                                  
 36800                                  alloc_next:
 36801                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; M000 - start 
 36802 000068EC 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: are umb's linked
 36803 000068F2 741C                    	jz	short norm_strat	; N: see if we reached last arena
 36804                                  	
 36805 000068F4 36F606[0203]80          	test	byte [ss:AllocMethod],HIGH_FIRST
 36806                                  					; Q: is alloc strategy high_first
 36807 000068FA 7414                    	jz	short norm_strat	; N: see if we reached last arena
 36808 000068FC 36A1[8E00]              	mov	ax,[ss:START_ARENA]
 36809 00006900 363B06[2400]            	cmp	ax,[ss:arena_head]	; Q: did we start scan from 
 36810                                  					;    arena_head
 36811 00006905 7509                    	jne	short norm_strat	; N: see if we reached last arena
 36812 00006907 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds			; ax = current block
 36813 00006909 363B06[8C00]            	cmp	ax,[ss:UMB_HEAD]	; Q: check against umb_head 
 36814 0000690E EB03                    	jmp	short alloc_chk_end
 36815                                  
 36816                                  norm_strat:
 36817                                  	;cmp	byte [di],5Ah ; 'Z'
 36818 00006910 803D5A                          CMP     BYTE [DI],arena_signature_end
 36819                                                                          ; IF current block is last THEN
 36820                                  alloc_chk_end:
 36821 00006913 740E                            JZ      SHORT alloc_end		;   GOTO end
 36822 00006915 E85EFF                          CALL    arena_next              ; AX, ES <- next block, Carry set if error
 36823 00006918 73CA                            JNC     SHORT alloc_scan	; IF no error THEN GOTO scan
 36824                                  
 36825                                  alloc_err:

 36827                                  
 36828                                  alloc_trashed:
 36829                                  	;LeaveCrit critMem
 36830 0000691B E812B0                  	call    LCritMEM ; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0	
 36831                                          ;error	error_arena_trashed
 36832                                  	;mov	al,7
 36833 0000691E B007                    	MOV	AL,error_arena_trashed
 36834                                  alloc_errj:
 36835 00006920 E9579D                  	JMP	SYS_RET_ERR
 36836                                  
 36837                                  alloc_end:
 36838                                  	; 18/05/2019
 36839 00006923 36833E[4003]00                  CMP	WORD [SS:FirstArena],0
 36840 00006929 7403                    	jz	short alloc_chk 
 36841 0000692B E98400                  	jmp	alloc_do_split
 36842                                  
 36843                                  alloc_chk:
 36844                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 36993                                  
 36994                                  ;	BREAK $SETBLOCK - change size of an allocated block (if possible)
 36995                                  
 36996                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 36997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36998                                  ;**	$SETBLOCK - Change size of an Allocated Block
 36999                                  ;
 37000                                  ;	Setblock changes the size of an allocated block. First, we coalesce
 37001                                  ;	any following free space onto this block; then we try to trim the
 37002                                  ;	block down to the size requested.
 37003                                  ;
 37004                                  ;	Note that if the guy wants to grow the block but that growth fails,
 37005                                  ;	we still go ahead and coalesce any trailing free blocks onto it.
 37006                                  ;	Thus the maximum-size-possible value that we return has already
 37007                                  ;	been allocated! This is a bug, dare we fix it? BUGBUG
 37008                                  ;
 37009                                  ;	NOTE - $SETBLOCK is in bed with $ALLOC and jumps into $ALLOC to
 37010                                  ;		finish it's work. For this reason we build the allocsf
 37011                                  ;		structure on the frame, to make us compatible with $ALLOCs
 37012                                  ;		code.
 37013                                  ;
 37014                                  ;	ENTRY	(es) = segment of old block
 37015                                  ;		(bx) = newsize
 37016                                  ;		(ah) = SETBLOCK
 37017                                  ;
 37018                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 37019                                  ;		'C' set if error
 37020                                  ;		  (ax) = error_invalid_block
 37021                                  ;		       = error_arena_trashed
 37022                                  ;		       = error_not_enough_memory
 37023                                  ;		       = error_invalid_function
 37024                                  ;		  (bx) = maximum size possible, iff (ax) = error_not_enough_memory
 37025                                  ;	USES	???? BUGBUG
 37026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37027                                  
 37028                                  ; MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 37029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37030                                  ;SUBTTL $SETBLOCK - change size of an allocated block (if possible)
 37031                                  ;
 37032                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 37033                                  ;           MOV     ES,block
 37034                                  ;           MOV     BX,newsize
 37035                                  ;           MOV     AH,setblock
 37036                                  ;           INT     21h
 37037                                  ;         if setblock fails for growing, BX will have the maximum
 37038                                  ;         size possible
 37039                                  ;   Error return:
 37040                                  ;           AX = error_invalid_block
 37041                                  ;              = error_arena_trashed
 37042                                  ;              = error_not_enough_memory
 37043                                  ;              = error_invalid_function
 37044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37045                                  
 37046                                  _$SETBLOCK:        
 37047                                  	; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 37048                                  	;EnterCrit   critMem
 37049 00006A05 E8FBAE                  	call	ECritMEM ; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 37050                                  
 37051 00006A08 BF0000                  	MOV     DI,ARENA.SIGNATURE
 37052 00006A0B 8CC0                            MOV     AX,ES
 37053 00006A0D 48                              DEC     AX
 37054 00006A0E E86CFE                          CALL    check_signature
 37055 00006A11 7303                            JNC     SHORT setblock_grab
 37056

 37058 00006A13 E905FF                          JMP     alloc_trashed
 37059

 37077                                  ;
 37078                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear of OK
 37079                                  ;		'C' set if error

 37081                                  ;	USES	???? BUGBUG
 37082

 37139                                  
 37140                                  ;	BREAK $AllocOper - get/set allocation mechanism
 37141                                  
 37142                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 37143                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37144                                  ;**	$AllocOper - Get/Set Allocation Mechanism
 37145                                  ;
 37146                                  ;	Assembler usage:
 37147                                  ;           MOV     AH,AllocOper
 37148                                  ;           MOV     BX,method
 37149                                  ;           MOV     AL,func
 37150                                  ;           INT     21h
 37151                                  ;
 37152                                  ;	ENTRY	
 37153                                  ;		(al) = 0
 37154                                  ;		  Get allocation Strategy in (ax)
 37155                                  ;
 37156                                  ;		(al) = 1, (bx) = method = zw0000xy
 37157                                  ;		  Set allocation strategy.
 37158                                  ;		   w  = 1  => HIGH_ONLY
 37159                                  ;		   z  = 1  => HIGH_FIRST
 37160                                  ;		   xy = 00 => FIRST_FIT
 37161                                  ;		      = 01 => BEST_FIT
 37162                                  ;		      = 10 => LAST_FIT
 37163                                  ;
 37164                                  ;		(al) = 2
 37165                                  ;		  Get UMB link state in (al)
 37166                                  ;
 37167                                  ;		(al) = 3
 37168                                  ;		  Set UMB link state
 37169                                  ;		   (bx) = 0 => Unlink UMBs
 37170                                  ;		   (bx) = 1 => Link UMBs
 37171                                  ;
 37172                                  ;
 37173                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 37174                                  ;
 37175                                  ;		 if (al) = 0
 37176                                  ;		  (ax) = existing method
 37177                                  ;		 if (al) = 1
 37178                                  ;		  Sets allocation strategy
 37179                                  ;		 if (al) = 2
 37180                                  ;		  (al) = 0 => UMBs not linked
 37181                                  ;		  (al) = 1 => UMBs linked in
 37182                                  ;		 if (al) = 3
 37183                                  ;		  Links/Unlinks the UMBs into DOS chain
 37184                                  ;
 37185                                  ;		'C' set if error
 37186                                  ;		  AX = error_invalid_function
 37187                                  ;
 37188                                  ;	Rev. M000 - added support for HIGH_FIRST in (al) = 1. 7/9/90
 37189                                  ; 	Rev. M003 - added functions (al) = 2 and (al) = 3. 7/18/90
 37190                                  ;	Rev. M009 - (al) = 3 will return 'invalid function' in ax if
 37191                                  ;		    umbhead has'nt been initialized by sysinit and 'trashed
 37192                                  ;		    arena' if an arena sig is damaged.
 37193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37194                                  
 37195                                  ; MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 37196                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37197                                  ;SUBTTL $AllocOper - get/set allocation mechanism
 37198                                  ;
 37199                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 37200                                  ;           MOV     AH,AllocOper
 37201                                  ;           MOV     BX,method
 37202                                  ;           MOV     AL,func
 37203                                  ;           INT     21h
 37204                                  ;
 37205                                  ;   Error return:
 37206                                  ;           AX = error_invalid_function
 37207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37208

 37325 00006AAC 83FB01                  	cmp	bx,1			
 37326 00006AAF 7204                    	jb	short UnlinkUmbs
 37327 00006AB1 741C                    	jz	short LinkUmbs
 37328                                  	
 37329 00006AB3 EBB7                    	jmp	short AllocOperError
 37330                                  	
 37331                                  UnlinkUmbs:
 37332                                  	;test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],1
 37333 00006AB5 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: umbs unlinked?
 37334 00006ABB 7410                    	jz	short unlinked		; Y: return 
 37335                                  	
 37336 00006ABD E82900                  	call	GetLastArena		; get arena before umb_head in DS
 37337 00006AC0 72B4                    	jc	short AllocArenaError	; M009: arena trashed
 37338                                  	
 37339                                  					; make it last
 37340 00006AC2 C60600005A              	mov	byte [0],arena_signature_end
 37341                                  	
 37342                                  	;and	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],0FEh
 37343 00006AC7 368026[8900]FE          	and	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],~LINKSTATE ; indicate unlink'd state in umbflag
 37344                                  	
 37345                                  unlinked:
 37346                                   	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37347                                  	;transfer SYS_RET_OK
 37348                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37349 00006ACD EBB7                    	jmp	short AllocOperOk
 37350                                  	;jmp	short AllocOperOkj2
 37351                                  	;;JMP	SYS_RET_OK
 37352                                  
 37353                                  LinkUmbs:
 37354 00006ACF 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: umbs linked?
 37355 00006AD5 7510                    	jnz	short linked		; Y: return
 37356                                  	
 37357 00006AD7 E80F00                  	call	GetLastArena		; get arena before umb_head
 37358 00006ADA 729A                    	jc	short AllocArenaError	; M009: arena trashed
 37359                                  	
 37360                                  					; make it normal. M061: ds points to
 37361                                  					; arena before umb_head
 37362 00006ADC C60600004D              	mov	byte [0],arena_signature_normal
 37363                                  	
 37364 00006AE1 36800E[8900]01          	or	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; indicate link'd state in umbflag
 37365                                  linked:
 37366                                   	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37367                                  	;transfer SYS_RET_OK
 37368                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37369 00006AE7 EB9D                    	jmp	short AllocOperOk
 37370                                  	;jmp	short unlinked
 37371                                  	;;JMP	SYS_RET_OK

 37373                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 37374                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37375                                  ; Procedure Name : GetLastArena		-  M003
 37376                                  ;
 37377                                  ; Inputs	 : cx = umb_head
 37378                                  ;
 37379                                  ;
 37380                                  ; Outputs	 : If UMBs are linked
 37381                                  ;			ES = umb_head
 37382                                  ;			DS = arena before umb_head
 37383                                  ;		   else
 37384                                  ;			DS = last arena
 37385                                  ;			ES = next arena. will be umb_head if NC.
 37386                                  ;
 37387                                  ;		   CY if error
 37388                                  ;
 37389                                  ; Uses		 : DS, ES, DI, BX
 37390                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37391                                  
 37392                                  ; 14/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37393                                  ; DOSCODE:A4D6h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37394                                  
 37395                                  ; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37396                                  ; DOSCODE:A476h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37397                                  	
 37398                                  GetLastArena:
 37399 00006AE9 50                      	push	ax			; save ax
 37400                                  
 37401 00006AEA 36A1[2400]              	mov	ax,[ss:arena_head]
 37402 00006AEE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; es = arena_head
 37403 00006AF0 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 37404                                  
 37405 00006AF2 26803D5A                	cmp     byte [es:di],arena_signature_end
 37406                                  					; Q: is this the last arena
 37407 00006AF6 7419                    	je	short GLA_done		; Y: return last arena in ES		
 37408                                  					
 37409                                  GLA_next:
 37410 00006AF8 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 37411 00006AFA E879FD                  	call	arena_next		; ax, es -> next arena
 37412                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37413                                  	;jc	short GLA_err
 37414                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37415 00006AFD 7228                    	jc	short GLA_err2
 37416                                  
 37417 00006AFF 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: are UMBs linked
 37418 00006B05 7506                    	jnz	short GLA_chkumb	; Y: terminating condition is 
 37419                                  					;    umb_head
 37420                                  					; N: terminating condition is 05Ah
 37421                                  
 37422 00006B07 26803D5A                	cmp     byte [es:di],arena_signature_end
 37423                                  					; Q: is this the last arena
 37424 00006B0B EB02                    	jmp	short GLA_@f
 37425                                  GLA_chkumb:
 37426 00006B0D 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx			; Q: is this umb_head
 37427                                  GLA_@f:
 37428 00006B0F 75E7                    	jne	short GLA_next		; N: get next arena
 37429                                  
 37430                                  GLA_done:
 37431                                  					; M061 - Start
 37432 00006B11 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: are UMBs linked
 37433 00006B17 750B                    	jnz	short GLA_ret		; Y: we're done
 37434                                  					; N: let us confirm that the next 
 37435                                  					;    arena is umb_head
 37436 00006B19 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 37437 00006B1B E858FD                  	call	arena_next		; ax, es -> next arena
 37438                                  	;jc	short GLA_err
 37439 00006B1E 7207                    	jc	short GLA_err2
 37440 00006B20 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx			; Q: is this umb_head
 37441 00006B22 7502                    	jne	short GLA_err		; N: error
 37442                                  					; M061 - End
 37443                                  GLA_ret:
 37444                                  	; 17/12/2022				
 37445                                  	;clc
 37446                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37447                                  	;clc
 37448 00006B24 58                      	pop	ax			; M061
 37449 00006B25 C3                      	retn				; M061
 37450                                  
 37451                                  GLA_err:
 37452 00006B26 F9                      	stc				; M061
 37453                                  GLA_err2:
 37454 00006B27 58                      	pop	ax
 37455 00006B28 C3                      	retn
 37456

 37484                                  ;BREAK <ServerCall -- Server DOS call>
 37485                                  
 37486                                  ; DOSCODE:A517h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37487                                  ; DOSCODE:A4B7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37488

 37490                                  ;Public SRVC001S,SRVC001E
 37491                                  ;SRVC001S label byte
 37492                                  
 37493                                  SRVC001S:
 37494                                  
 37495 00006B29 [2D6B]                  SERVERTAB:	dw	SERVER_DISP
 37496 00006B2B [7F6B]                  SERVERLEAVE:	dw	SERVERRETURN
 37497 00006B2D 0B                      SERVER_DISP:	db	(SERVER_DISP_END-SERVER_DISP-1)/2 ; = 11
 37498 00006B2E [E76B]                  		dw	SRV_CALL	; 0
 37499 00006B30 [806B]                  		dw	COMMIT_ALL	; 1
 37500 00006B32 [B66B]                  		dw	CLOSE_NAME	; 2
 37501 00006B34 [C16B]                  		dw	CLOSE_UID	; 3
 37502 00006B36 [C86B]                  		dw	CLOSE_UID_PID	; 4
 37503 00006B38 [CF6B]                  		dw	GET_LIST	; 5
 37504 00006B3A [286C]                  		dw	GET_DOS_DATA	; 6
 37505 00006B3C [4C6C]                  		dw	SPOOL_OPER	; 7

 37507 00006B40 [4C6C]                  		dw	SPOOL_OPER	; 9
 37508 00006B42 [586C]                  		dw	_$SetExtendedError  ; 10
 37509                                  
 37510                                  SERVER_DISP_END:  ;  LABEL BYTE
 37511                                  
 37512                                  ;SRVC001E label byte
 37513                                  
 37514                                  SRVC001E:
 37515                                  
 37516                                  ;hkn; TABLE	ENDS
 37517                                  
 37518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37519                                  ;
 37520                                  ; Procedure Name : $ServerCall
 37521                                  ;
 37522                                  ; Inputs:
 37523                                  ;	DS:DX -> DPL  (except calls 7,8,9)
 37524                                  ; Function:
 37525                                  ;	AL=0	Server DOS call
 37526                                  ;	AL=1	Commit All files
 37527                                  ;	AL=2	Close file by name (SHARING LOADED ONLY) DS:DX in DPL -> name
 37528                                  ;	AL=3	Close all files for DPL_UID
 37529                                  ;	AL=4	Close all files for DPL_UID/PID_PID
 37530                                  ;	AL=5	Get open file list entry
 37531                                  ;		    IN: BX File Index
 37532                                  ;			CX User Index
 37533                                  ;		    OUT:ES:DI -> Name
 37534                                  ;			BX = UID
 37535                                  ;		    CX = # locked blocks held by this UID
 37536                                  ;	AL=6	Get DOS data area
 37537                                  ;		    OUT: DS:SI -> Start
 37538                                  ;			CX size in bytes of swap if indos
 37539                                  ;			DX size in bytes of swap always
 37540                                  ;	AL=7	Get truncate flag
 37541                                  ;	AL=8	Set truncate flag
 37542                                  ;	AL=9	Close all spool files
 37543                                  ;	AL=10	SetExtendedError
 37544                                  ;
 37545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37546                                  
 37547                                  _$ServerCall:
 37548                                  	; 13/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37549                                  	; DOSCODE:A4D2h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)		
 37550                                  	; 10/06/2019
 37551                                  	; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37552                                  	; DOSCODE:A532h (MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 37553                                  
 37554                                  	; 05/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 37555                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 657Bh
 37556 00006B44 3C07                    	CMP	AL,7
 37557 00006B46 7204                    	JB	short SET_STUFF
 37558 00006B48 3C09                    	CMP	AL,9
 37559 00006B4A 761A                    	JBE	short NO_SET_ID		; No DPL on calls 7,8,9
 37560                                  SET_STUFF:
 37561 00006B4C 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; Point to DPL with DS:SI
 37562                                  	;mov	bx,[si+12h]
 37563 00006B4E 8B5C12                  	MOV	BX,[SI+DPL.UID]
 37564                                  
 37565                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37566                                  ;SR;
 37567                                  ; WIN386 updates the USER_ID itself. If WIN386 is present we skip the updating
 37568                                  ; of USER_ID
 37569                                  
 37570 00006B51 36F606[A110]01          	test	byte [SS:IsWin386],1
 37571 00006B57 7505                    	jnz	short skip_win386

 37574                                  	; 15/08/2018

 37576                                  
 37577                                  skip_win386:
 37578 00006B5E 8B5C14                  	MOV	BX,[SI+DPL.PID]
 37579 00006B61 36891E[3C03]            	MOV	[SS:PROC_ID],BX		; Set process ID
 37580                                  NO_SET_ID:
 37581                                  	; 10/06/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37582 00006B66 2EFF36[2B6B]            	PUSH	word [cs:SERVERLEAVE]	; push return address
 37583 00006B6B 2EFF36[296B]            	PUSH	word [cS:SERVERTAB]	; push table address

 37590                                  	;error	error_invalid_function
 37591                                  	;mov	al,1
 37592 00006B7A B001                    	MOV	AL,error_invalid_function
 37593                                  servercall_error:
 37594 00006B7C E9FB9A                  	JMP	SYS_RET_ERR
 37595                                  
 37596                                  SERVERRETURN:
 37597 00006B7F C3                      	retn
 37598                                  
 37599                                  ; Commit - iterate through the open file list and make sure that the
 37600                                  ; directory entries are correctly updated.
 37601                                  
 37602                                  	; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37603                                  COMMIT_ALL:
 37604 00006B80 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			;   for (i=0; ThisSFT=getSFT(i); i++)
 37605 00006B82 16                      	push	ss
 37606 00006B83 1F                      	pop	ds
 37607 00006B84 E87CAD                  	call	ECritSFT		; Gonna scan SFT cache, lock it down
 37608                                  CommitLoop:
 37609 00006B87 53                      	push	bx
 37610 00006B88 E82401                  	call	SFFromSFN
 37611 00006B8B 7222                    	JC	short CommitDone
 37612 00006B8D 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0
 37613                                  	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_Ref_Count],0
 37614                                  					; if (ThisSFT->refcount != 0)
 37615 00006B91 7418                    	JZ	short CommitNext
 37616                                  	;cmp	word [es:di],0FFFFh ; -1
 37617 00006B93 26833DFF                	cmp	word [ES:DI],sf_busy
 37618                                  	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_Ref_Count],sf_busy  
 37619                                  					; BUSY SFTs have god knows what
 37620 00006B97 7412                    	JZ	short CommitNext	;   in them.
 37621                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37622 00006B99 26F6450680              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags+1],(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 37623                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet ; 8000h
 37624 00006B9E 750B                    	JNZ	short CommitNext	;  Skip Network SFTs so the SERVER
 37625                                  					;	doesn't deadlock
 37626 00006BA0 893E[9E05]              	MOV	[THISSFT],DI
 37627 00006BA4 8C06[A005]              	MOV	[THISSFT+2],ES
 37628 00006BA8 E8CFCA                  	call	DOS_COMMIT		;	DOSCommit ();
 37629                                  CommitNext:
 37630 00006BAB 5B                      	pop	bx
 37631 00006BAC 43                      	INC	BX
 37632 00006BAD EBD8                    	JMP	short CommitLoop
 37633                                  CommitDone:

 37635 00006BB2 5B                      	pop	bx
 37636                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37637                                  Commit_Ok:

 37695                                  ;endif

 37715                                  SRV_CALL:

 37717 00006BE8 1E                      	push	ds

 37722                                  
 37723                                  ; DS:SI point to stack
 37724                                  ; ES:DI point to DPL
 37725

 37727                                  
 37728                                  ; DS:SI point to DPL
 37729                                  ; ES:DI point to stack
 37730                                  ;
 37731                                  ; We now copy the registers from DPL to save stack
 37732                                  
 37733 00006BF2 56                      	push	si
 37734 00006BF3 B90600                  	MOV	CX,6
 37735 00006BF6 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			; Put in AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI
 37736 00006BF8 47                      	INC	DI
 37737 00006BF9 47                      	INC	DI			; Skip user_BP

 37739 00006BFB A5                      	MOVSW				; ES

 37743                                  	;mov	bx,[si+2]

 37756 00006C11 8E5C0C                  	MOV	DS,[SI+DPL.DS]

 37760 00006C15 368C1E[EC05]            	MOV	[SS:SAVEDS],DS

 37763 00006C25 E94D97                  	jmp	REDISP
 37764                                  
 37765                                  GET_DOS_DATA:
 37766 00006C28 16                      	push	ss
 37767 00006C29 07                      	pop	es
 37768 00006C2A BF[2003]                	MOV     DI,SWAP_START
 37769 00006C2D B9[AC0A]                	MOV     CX,SWAP_END
 37770 00006C30 BA[3A03]                	MOV     DX,SWAP_ALWAYS
 37771 00006C33 29F9                    	SUB     CX,DI
 37772 00006C35 29FA                    	SUB     DX,DI
 37773 00006C37 D1E9                    	SHR     CX,1                    ; div by 2, remainder in carry
 37774 00006C39 83D100                  	ADC     CX,0                    ; div by 2 + round up
 37775 00006C3C D1E1                    	SHL     CX,1                    ; round up to 2 boundary.

 37791                                  			; STACK: WORD subfunction

 37793                                  			; STACK unchanged

 37796                                  	;JC	short func_err2
 37797 00006C53 7390                    	jnc	short Commit_Okj2
 37798                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37799                                  	;;jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 37800                                  	;jmp	short Commit_Okj2
 37801                                  	
 37802                                  func_err2:
 37803 00006C55 E9229A                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 37804                                  
 37805                                  ;Break	<$SetExtendedError - set extended error for later retrieval>

 37809                                  ;
 37810                                  ; $SetExtendedError takes extended error information and loads it up for the
 37811                                  ; next extended error call. This is used by interrupt-level proccessors to
 37812                                  ; mask their actions.

 37822

 37826                                  	;mov	ax,[si+10]

 37837 00006C76 368826[2303]            	MOV	[SS:EXTERR_LOCUS],AH
