 41039 0000762D BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; temp spot for path
 41040 00007630 E865FB                  	call	TransPathSet		; go get normalized path
 41041 00007633 59                      	pop	cx

 41043 00007636 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [ss:CMETA],-1	; meta chars?	;smr;SS Override
 41044 0000763C 750E                    	JNZ	short NotFound

 41046 0000763F 1F                      	pop	ds

 41049 00007642 E81C01                  	call	SetAttrib
 41050 00007645 E8DBB4                  	call	DOS_DELETE		; remove that file
 41051                                  	;JC	short UnlinkE 		; error is there
 41052                                  	; 17/12/2022
 41053 00007648 728D                    	jc	short NORERR
 41054                                  
 41055                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41056                                  UnlinkOk:
 41057                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; okey doksy
 41058 0000764A EBDB                    	jmp	short OpenOkj3

 41073                                  ;BREAK <$RENAME - move directory entries around>

 41078                                  ;	    LES     DI, dest
 41079                                  ;	    IF VIA SERVER DOS CALL
 41080                                  ;	      MOV   CX,SEARCH_ATTRIB
 41081                                  ;	    MOV     AH, Rename
 41082                                  ;	    INT     21h
 41083                                  ;
 41084                                  ;   Error returns:
 41085                                  ;	    AX = error_file_not_found
 41086                                  ;	       = error_not_same_device
 41087                                  ;	       = error_access_denied
 41088                                  ;
 41089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41090                                  
 41091                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41092                                  _$RENAME:
 41093                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 41105 00007668 1F                      	pop	ds
 41106 00007669 59                      	pop	cx			; get back source and possible CX arg
 41107                                  epjc2:

 41109 0000766C 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [ss:CMETA],-1			;smr;SS Override

 41117 0000767F 1F                      	pop	ds

 41167                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 41168                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41169                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry.  Return a file handle if there
 41170                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 41171                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 41172                                  ;
 41173                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 41174                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 41175                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 41176                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 41177                                  ;		Carry Set:
 41178                                  ;		    AX has error code
 41179                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 41180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41181                                  
 41182                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 41183 000076C3 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack

 41185 000076C7 E914FF                  	JMP	AccessSet		; use good ol' open

 41187                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 41188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41189                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 41190                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 41191                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 41192                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 41193                                  ;
 41194                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 41195                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 41196                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 41197                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 41198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41199                                  
 41200                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 41201                                  ;BinToAscii:
 41202                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 41203                                  ;bta5:
 41204                                  ;	push    cx
 41205                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 41206                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 41207                                  ;	push    ax
 41208                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 41209                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 41210                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 41211                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 41212                                  ;	add     al,7
 41213                                  ;bta6: 
 41214                                  ;	stosb
 41215                                  ;	pop     ax
 41216                                  ;	pop     cx
 41217                                  ;	loop    bta5
 41218                                  ;	retn
 41219                                  
 41220                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 41221                                  BinToAscii:
 41222 000076CA B90404                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 41223                                  bta5:	
 41224 000076CD D3C0                    	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 41225 000076CF 50                      	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 41226 000076D0 240F                    	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 41227 000076D2 0441                    	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 41228 000076D4 AA                      	STOSB				; drop in the character
 41229 000076D5 58                      	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 41230 000076D6 FECD                    	dec	ch
 41231 000076D8 75F3                    	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 41232 000076DA C3                      	retn
 41233                                  
 41234                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 41235                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41236                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 41237                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 41238                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 41239                                  ;
 41240                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 41241                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 41242                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 41243                                  ;		AX has handle
 41244                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 41245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41246                                  
 41247                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41248                                  
 41249                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 41250                                  	;Enter
 41251 000076DB 55                      	push	bp
 41252 000076DC 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 41253                                  
 41254                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 41255                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 41256                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 41257                                  
 41258 000076DE 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 41259                                  
 41260                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 41261 000076E1 F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 41262 000076E5 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 41263                                  
 41264                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 41265                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 41266                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 41267                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 41268                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 41269                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 41270                                  
 41271                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 41272 000076E7 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 41273 000076EA EB69                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 41274                                  
 41275                                  OKatts:
 41276                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 41277 000076EC 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 41278                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 41279 000076EF 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 41280                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 41281 000076F2 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 41282                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 41283 000076F5 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 41284 000076F8 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 41285 000076F9 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 41286 000076FA 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 41287 000076FC 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 41288 000076FE F7D9                    	NEG	CX			; number of bytes remaining in segment
 41289                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 41290 00007700 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;AN000;MS. cx=0 ? ds:dx on segment boundary
 41291 00007702 7501                    	JNZ	short okok		;AN000;MS. no
 41292                                  	;MOV	CX,-1			;AN000;MS.
 41293                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41294                                  	; 17/12/2022
 41295 00007704 49                      	dec	cx  ; mov cx,-1
 41296                                  	;mov	cx,-1 ; 0FFFh
 41297                                  okok:					;AN000;
 41298 00007705 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			;AN000;
 41299 00007707 F2AE                    	REPNZ	SCASB			;AN000;
 41300                                  					;AN000;
 41301 00007709 4F                      	DEC	DI			; point back to the null
 41302 0000770A 268A45FF                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI-1]		; Get char before the NUL
 41303 0000770E E882DF                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; Is it a path separator?
 41304 00007711 7403                    	JZ	short SETENDPTR		; Yes
 41305                                  STOREPTH:
 41306 00007713 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 41307 00007715 AA                      	STOSB				; Add a path separator (and INC DI)
 41308                                  SETENDPTR:
 41309                                  	;MOV	EndPtrL,DI		; pointer to the tail
 41310 00007716 8856FC                  	mov	[bp-4],dl
 41311                                  CreateLoop:
 41312 00007719 16                      	push	ss			; let ReadTime see variables
 41313 0000771A 1F                      	pop	ds
 41314 0000771B 55                      	push	bp
 41315 0000771C E87794                  	call	READTIME		; go get time
 41316 0000771F 5D                      	pop	bp
 41317                                  ;
 41318                                  ; Time is in CX:DX. Go drop it into the string.
 41319                                  ;
 41320                                  	;les	di,EndPtr		; point to the string
 41321 00007720 C47EFC                  	les	di,[BP-4]
 41322 00007723 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 41323 00007725 E8A2FF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store upper word
 41324 00007728 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 41325 0000772A E89DFF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store lower word
 41326 0000772D 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 41327 0000772F AA                      	STOSB				; nul terminate
 41328                                  	;LDS	DX,FilPtr		; get name
 41329 00007730 C556F8                  	lds	dx,[bp-8]
 41330                                  	;MOV	CX,Attr 		; get attr
 41331 00007733 8B4EF6                  	mov	cx,[bp-10]
 41332 00007736 55                      	push	bp
 41333 00007737 E889FF                  	CALL	_$CreateNewFile		; try to create a new file
 41334 0000773A 5D                      	pop	bp
 41335 0000773B 7319                    	JNC	short CreateDone	; failed, go try again
 41336                                  
 41337                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 41338                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 41339                                  
 41340                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3			; M049 - start
 41341                                  ;;	mov	ax,[ss:EXTERR]				;smr;SS Override
 41342                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_file_exists
 41343                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; file existed => try with new name
 41344                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_access_denied
 41345                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; access denied (attr mismatch)
 41346                                  
 41347                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 41348                                  	;cmp	al,50h
 41349 0000773D 3C50                    	CMP	AL,error_file_exists	; Q: did file already exist
 41350 0000773F 74D8                    	JZ	short CreateLoop	; Y: try again
 41351                                  	;cmp	al,5
 41352 00007741 3C05                    	CMP	AL,error_access_denied	; Q: was it access denied
 41353 00007743 7510                    	JNZ	short SETTMPERR		; N: Error out
 41354                                  					; Y: Check to see if we got this due
 41355                                  					;    to the network drive. Note that
 41356                                  					;    the redir will set the exterr
 41357                                  					;    to error_cannot_make if this is 
 41358                                  					;    so. 
 41359 00007745 36803E[2403]41          	CMP	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_net_access_denied ; M069
 41360                                  					; See if it's REALLY an att mismatch
 41361 0000774B 7408                    	je	short SETTMPERR		; no, network error, stop
 41362                                  ;M070
 41363                                  ; If the user failed on an I24, we do not want to try again
 41364                                  ;
 41365 0000774D 36803E[2403]53          	cmp	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_FAIL_I24 ;User failed on I24? ;M070
 41366                                  	;je	short SETTMPERR		;yes, do not try again ;M070
 41367                                  
 41368                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop	;attr mismatch, try again ;M070
 41369                                  	; 17/12/2022
 41370 00007753 75C4                    	jne	short CreateLoop ; 10/06/2019 
 41371                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41372                                  	;jz	short SETTMPERR
 41373                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop
 41374                                  
 41375                                  ;;	MOV	AL,error_access_denied	; Return this "extended" error
 41376                                  					; M049 - end
 41377                                  SETTMPERR:
 41378 00007755 F9                      	STC
 41379                                  CreateDone:
 41380                                  	;Leave
 41381 00007756 89EC                    	mov	sp,bp
 41382 00007758 5D                      	pop	bp
 41383 00007759 7203                    	JC	short CreateFail
 41384 0000775B E9128F                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; success!
 41385                                  CreateFail:
 41386 0000775E E9198F                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 41387                                  
 41388                                  ;   SetAttrib will set the search attribute (SAttrib) either to the normal
 41389                                  ;   (CH) or to the value in CL if the current system call is through
 41390                                  ;   serverdoscall.
 41391                                  ;
 41392                                  ;   Inputs:	fSharing == FALSE => set sattrib to CH
 41393                                  ;		fSharing == TRUE => set sattrib to CL
 41394                                  ;   Outputs:	none
 41395                                  ;   Registers changed:	CX
 41396                                  
 41397                                  SetAttrib:

 41399 00007767 7502                    	jnz	short Set
 41400 00007769 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 41401                                  Set:
 41402 0000776B 36880E[6D05]            	mov	byte [ss:SATTRIB],cl		;smr;SS Override
 41403 00007770 C3                      	retn

 41409                                  
 41410                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 41411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41412                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 41413                                  ;	 BX= mode
 41414                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 41415                                  ;	 DX= flag
 41416                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 41417                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 41418                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 41419                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 41420                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 41421                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE
 41422                                  ; Function: Extended Open
 41423                                  ; Output: carry clear
 41424                                  ;		     AX= handle
 41425                                  ;		     CX=1 file opened
 41426                                  ;			2 file created/opened
 41427                                  ;			3 file replaced/opened
 41428                                  ;	  carry set: AX has error code
 41429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41430                                  
 41431                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41432                                  _$Extended_Open:			  ;AN000;
 41433                                  	;ASSUME	CS:DOSCODE,SS:DOSDATA	  ;AN000;
 41434 00007771 368916[F405]            	MOV	[SS:EXTOPEN_FLAG],DX	  ;AN000;EO. save ext. open flag;smr;SS Override
 41435 00007776 36C706[F705]0000        	MOV	word [SS:EXTOPEN_IO_MODE],0 ;AN000;EO. initialize IO mode;smr;SS Override
 41436                                  	; 17/12/2022
 41437 0000777D F6C6FE                  	test	dh,0FEh ; 04/12/2022 
 41438                                  	;;test	dx,0FE00h
 41439                                  	;TEST	DX,RESERVED_BITS_MASK	  ;AN000;EO. reserved bits 0  ?
 41440 00007780 7545                    	JNZ	short ext_inval2	  ;AN000;EO. no
 41441 00007782 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL			  ;AN000;EO. make sure flag is right

 41631                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 41633                                  
 41634                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 41635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41636                                  ;
 41637                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 41638                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 41639                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 41640                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 41641                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 41642                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 41643                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 41644                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 41645                                  ;	    INT     21h
 41646                                  ;
 41647                                  ;   Error returns:
 41648                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 41649                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 41650                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 41651                                  ;
 41652                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 41653                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 41654                                  ;
 41655                                  ;				    0? lock all
 41656                                  ;				    8? lock write
 41657                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 41658                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 41659                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 41660                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 41661                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 41662                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 41663                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 41664                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 41665                                  ;	    INT     21h
 41666                                  ;
 41667                                  ;   Error returns:
 41668                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 41669                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 41670                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 41671                                  ;
 41672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41673                                  
 41674                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41675                                  _$LockOper:

 41681 000078C4 731D                    	JNC	short lock_do 		       ; have valid handle
 41682 000078C6 5F                      	POP	DI			       ; Clean stack
 41683                                  	;mov	al,6
 41684 000078C7 B006                    	mov	al,error_invalid_handle
 41685                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 41686                                  ;lockoperr:
 41687                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 42018                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 42019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42020                                  ; Inputs:
 42021                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 42022                                  ;       AX has error code
 42023                                  ; Function:
 42024                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 42025                                  ; Outputs:
 42026                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 42027                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 42028                                  ;
 42029                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed

 42032                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 42033 00007970 1E                      	PUSH    DS
 42034 00007971 06                      	PUSH	ES
 42035 00007972 57                      	PUSH    DI
 42036 00007973 C606[7505]00            	MOV     byte [READOP],0		; All share errors are reading
 42037                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 42038 00007978 C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 42039 0000797D C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 42040 00007981 BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 42041 00007984 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI
 42042                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 42043 00007986 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]

 42051 00007995 C3                      	retn

 42053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42054                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 42055                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 42056                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 42057                                  ;
 42058                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 42059                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 42060                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 42061                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42062                                  
 42063                                  ShareEnd:
 42064                                  	; 26/07/2019
 42065 00007996 FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 42066 0000799A C3                      	retn
 42067                                  
 42068                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 42069                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42070                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 42071                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 42072                                  ;
 42073                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 42074                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 42075                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 42076                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 42077                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 42078                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42079                                  
 42080                                  ShareEnter:
 42081 0000799B 51                      	push	cx
 42082                                  retry:
 42083 0000799C 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 42084                                  attempt:
 42085 000079A0 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 42086 000079A4 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 42087                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 42088 000079A6 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 42089 000079AA 51                      	push	cx
 42090 000079AB E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 42091 000079AE 59                      	pop	cx
 42092 000079AF 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 42093 000079B1 E8489E                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 42094 000079B4 E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 42095 000079B6 E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 42096 000079B9 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 42097                                  done:
 42098 000079BB 59                      	pop	cx
 42099 000079BC C3                      	retn

 42106                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 42107                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42108                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 42109                                  ;
 42110                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 42111                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 42112                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code

 42114                                  ;	Revision history:
 42115                                  ;
 42116                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90

 42118                                  
 42119                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42120                                  ;
 42121                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 42122                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 42123                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 42124                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 42125                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 42126                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 42127                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 42128                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 42129                                  ;
 42130                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42131

 42183                                  ExecReady:
 42184 000079BD 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 42185                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 42186                                  	; 17/12/2022
 42187 000079BF F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 42188                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 42189 000079C3 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 42190                                  
 42191                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 42192 000079C5 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 42193 000079C8 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 42194 000079CB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 42195                                  
 42196                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 42197 000079CD 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 42198                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 42199 000079D0 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 42200                                  
 42201                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 42202 000079D3 36FF16[880D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 42203                                  	
 42204                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 42205                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 42206                                  
 42207                                  er_setver:
 42208                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 42209                                  	; 17/12/2022
 42210 000079D8 F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 42211                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 42212 000079DC 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 42213                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 42214 000079DE 1E                      	push	ds
 42215 000079DF 56                      	push	si
 42216                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 42217 000079E0 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 42218 000079E3 E876ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 42219 000079E6 E887ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 42220 000079E9 5E                      	pop	si
 42221 000079EA 1F                      	pop	ds
 42222                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 42223 000079EB 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 42224 000079EE 36A1[020F]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 42225 000079F2 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 42226                                  
 42227                                  er_chkdoshi:
 42228 000079F6 36803E[870D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 42229 000079FC 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 42230                                  
 42231                                  					; M068 - Start
 42232                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 42233 000079FE 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 42234                                  
 42235                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 42236 00007A01 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 42237                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 42238                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 42239                                  					; explanation
 42240                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 42241                                  	; 17/12/2022
 42242 00007A07 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 42243                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 42244 00007A0B 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 42245                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 42246 00007A0D 1E                         	push	ds
 42247 00007A0E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 42248 00007A10 E88E02                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 42249 00007A13 1F                      	pop	ds
 42250                                  
 42251                                  er_setA20:
 42252                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 42253                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 42254                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 42255                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 42256                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 42257                                  
 42258 00007A14 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 42259 00007A19 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 42260                                  					; turned OFF.
 42261                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 42262 00007A1D 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 42263 00007A1F C3                      	retn

 42271                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42272                                  ;
 42273                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 42274                                  ;
 42275                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 42276                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 42277                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 42278                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 42279                                  ;
 42280                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 42281                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 42282                                  ;
 42283                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 42284                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 42285                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 42286                                  ;
 42287                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 42288                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 42289                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 42290                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 42291                                  ; or not.
 42292                                  ;
 42293                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 42294                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 42295                                  ; running in the HMA.
 42296                                  ;
 42297                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 42298                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 42299                                  ;
 42300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42301                                  
 42302                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 42303                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 42304                                  
 42305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42306                                  ;
 42307                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 42308                                  ;
 42309                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42310                                  
 42311                                  rpFind1:
 42312                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 42313                                  
 42314                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 42315                                  
 42316                                  ;	cli
 42317                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 42318                                  ;	pusha
 42319                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 42320                                  ;	out	43h, al
 42321                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 42322                                  
 42323                                  rpFind1a:
 42324                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 42325                                  
 42326                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 42327                                  
 42328                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 42329                                  ;	out	37h, al
 42330                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 42331                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 42332                                  
 42333                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 42334                                  
 42335                                  rpFind2:
 42336                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 42337                                  
 42338                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 42339                                  
 42340                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 42341                                  
 42342                                  rpFind3:
 42343                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 42344                                  
 42345                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 42346                                  
 42347                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 42348                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 42349                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 42350                                  
 42351                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 42352                                  
 42353                                  rpRepl2:
 42354                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 42355                                  
 42356                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 42357                                  
 42358                                  ;	push	eax
 42359                                  ;	push	cx
 42360                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 42361                                  
 42362                                  rpRepl3:
 42363                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 42364                                  
 42365                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 42366                                  
 42367                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 42368                                  ;	pop	cx
 42369                                  ;	pop	eax
 42370                                  
 42371                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 42372                                  
 42373                                  rpFind4:
 42374                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 42375                                  
 42376                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 42377                                  
 42378                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 42379                                  ;	pop	ax
 42380                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 42381                                  
 42382                                  rpFind5:
 42383                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 42384                                  
 42385                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 42386                                  
 42387                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 42388                                  ;	int	67h
 42389                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 42390                                  ;	jmp	bx
 42391                                  
 42392                                  rpRepl4:
 42393                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 42394                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 42395                                  
 42396                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 42397                                  
 42398                                  	db	00h, 00h
 42399                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 42400                                  
 42401                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 42402                                  
 42403                                  	db	00h, 00h
 42404                                  
 42405                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 42406                                  
 42407                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 42408                                  ;	pop	ax
 42409                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 42410                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 42411                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 42412                                  
 42413                                  rpRepl5:
 42414                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 42415                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 42416                                  
 42417                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 42418                                  
 42419                                  	db	00h, 00h
 42420                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 42421                                  
 42422                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 42423                                  
 42424                                  	db	00h, 00h
 42425                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 42426                                  
 42427                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 42428                                  
 42429                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 42430                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 42431                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 42432                                  ;	jmp	bx
 42433                                  
 42434                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 42435                                  
 42436                                  rpFind6:
 42437                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 42438                                  
 42439                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 42440                                  
 42441                                  ;	cli
 42442                                  ;	push	dx
 42443                                  ;	push	cx
 42444

 42446                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 42447

 42449                                  
 42450                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 42451                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 42452

 42455

 42457

 42459                                  ;	pop	dx
 42460                                  ;	pop	bx
 42461

 42464

 42466

 42479                                  ;	pop	ecx
 42480                                  ;	pop	ebx

 42482                                  ;	pop	bx
 42483

 42485

 42488

 42490                                  
 42491                                  ;	pusha
 42492                                  ;	push	es
 42493                                  ;	push	ds
 42494                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 42495                                  ;	mov	ds, ax

 42501

 42512                                  ;	push	es

 42517

 42519                                  
 42520                                  ;	pop	ds
 42521                                  ;	pop	es
 42522                                  ;	popad
 42523                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 42524                                  
 42525                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42526                                  
 42527                                  struc SearchPair
 42528                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 42529                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 42530                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 42531                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 42532                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 42533                                   .size:
 42534                                  endstruc
 42535                                  
 42536                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 42537                                  
 42538                                  rpBug1Strs:
 42539                                  	dw	rpFind2
 42540                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 42541                                  	dw	rpFind3
 42542                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 42543                                  	dw	20h
 42544

 42546

 42549                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 42550                                  	dw	rpFind5
 42551                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 42552                                  	dw	80h
 42553

 42555

 42557                                  	dw	rpFind6
 42558                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 42559                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 42560                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 42561                                  	dw	80h
 42562

 42564

 42567                                  	dw	4
 42568                                  	dw	rpFind9
 42569                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 42570                                  	dw	80h

 42574                                  struc StackVars
 42575                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 42576                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 42577                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 42578                                   .size:
 42579                                  endstruc
