 42582                                  
 42583                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 42584                                  
 42585                                  Rational386Patch:
 42586                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 42587                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 42588                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 42589                                  
 42590                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 42591                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 42592                                  
 42593                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 42594                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 42595                                  
 42596                                  	push	ax
 42597                                  
 42598                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 42599                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 42600                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 42601                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 42602                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 42603                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 42604                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 42605                                  rp3QO_ax:
 42606                                  	pop	ax
 42607                                  rp3QuickOut:
 42608                                  	retn
 42609                                  
 42610                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 42611                                  
 42612                                  rp3Maybe:
 42613                                  	cld
 42614                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 42615                                  	push	cx
 42616                                  	push	dx
 42617                                  	push	si
 42618                                  	push	di
 42619                                  	push	es
 42620                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 42621                                  	push	bp
 42622                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 42623                                  	mov	bp,sp
 42624                                  
 42625                                  	push	cs
 42626                                  	pop	ds
 42627                                  
 42628                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 42629                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 42630                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 42631                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 42632                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 42633                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 42634                                  
 42635                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 42636                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 42637                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 42638                                  ; an 80286 system.
 42639                                  
 42640                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 42641                                  
 42642                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 42643                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 42644                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 42645                                  
 42646                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 42647                                  
 42648                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 42649                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 42650                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 42651                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 42652                                  
 42653                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 42654                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 42655                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 42656                                  
 42657                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 42658                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 42659                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 42660                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 42661                                  
 42662                                  rp3Exit_j:
 42663                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 42664                                  
 42665                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 42666                                  
 42667                                  rpGotPatch:
 42668                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 42669                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 42670                                  
 42671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42672                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 42673                                  
 42674                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 42675                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 42676                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 42677                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 42678                                  
 42679                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 42680                                  	call	FindBadCode
 42681                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 42682                                  
 42683                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 42684                                  
 42685                                  	push	di
 42686                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 42687                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 42688                                  
 42689                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 42690                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 42691                                  
 42692                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 42693                                  	inc	dx
 42694                                  rp_no_cx:
 42695                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 42696                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 42697                                  	call	GenPatch
 42698                                  
 42699                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 42700                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 42701                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 42702                                  
 42703                                  	mov	byte [es:di-1],90h		;   yes, no-op it
 42704                                  rp_no_cx2:
 42705                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 42706                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 42707                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 42708                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 42709                                  
 42710                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 42711                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 42712                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 42713                                  	call	CopyPatch
 42714                                  
 42715                                  	pop	bx				; find3 offset
 42716                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 42717                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 42718                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 42719                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 42720                                  						;   area pointer
 42721                                  
 42722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42723                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 42724                                  
 42725                                  rpBug2:
 42726                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 42727                                  	call	FindBadCode
 42728                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 42729                                  
 42730                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 42731                                  
 42732                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 42733                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 42734                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 42735                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 42736                                  
 42737                                  	mov	di,si
 42738                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 42739                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 42740                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 42741                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 42742                                  
 42743                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 42744                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 42745                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 42746                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 42747                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 42748                                  	call	GenJump
 42749                                  
 42750                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 42751                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 42752                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 42753                                  						;   main-line code
 42754                                  
 42755                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 42756                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 42757                                  
 42758                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 42759                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 42760                                  
 42761                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 42762                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 42763                                  
 42764                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 42765                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 42766                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 42767                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 42768                                  	add	ax,4
 42769                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 42770                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 42771                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 42772                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 42773                                  
 42774                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 42775                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 42776                                  						; patch area
 42777                                  
 42778                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42779                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 42780                                  
 42781                                  rpBug3:
 42782                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 42783                                  	call	FindBadCode
 42784                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 42785                                  
 42786                                  	;add	di,9
 42787                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 42788                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 42789                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 42790                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 42791                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 42792                                  	pop	si
 42793                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 42794                                  
 42795                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 42796                                  
 42797                                  	mov	di,si
 42798                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 42799                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 42800                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9
 42801                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 42802                                  
 42803                                  	pop	di
 42804                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 42805                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 42806                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 42807                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 42808                                  
 42809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42810                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 42811                                  
 42812                                  rpBug4:
 42813                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 42814                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 42815                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 42816                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 42817                                  
 42818                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 42819                                  	call	FindBadCode
 42820                                  	jc	short rp3Exit
 42821                                  
 42822                                  	push	di				; save find9 code offset
 42823                                  
 42824                                  	mov	di,si
 42825                                  	mov	dx,3
 42826                                  	mov	si,rpRepl8
 42827                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl8Len ; 4
 42828                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find8 code
 42829                                  
 42830                                  	pop	di				; find9 offset
 42831                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 42832                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; patch find9 to jmp to
 42833                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 42834                                  
 42835                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 42836                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 42837                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 42838                                  
 42839                                  rp3Exit:
 42840                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 42841                                  	pop	bp
 42842                                  	pop	ds
 42843                                  	pop	es
 42844                                  	pop	di
 42845                                  	pop	si
 42846                                  	pop	dx
 42847                                  	pop	cx
 42848                                  	pop	bx
 42849                                  	pop	ax
 42850                                  	retn
 42851                                  
 42852                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42853                                  ;
 42854                                  ; FindBadCode
 42855                                  ;
 42856                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 42857                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 42858                                  ;
 42859                                  ; Entry:
 42860                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 42861                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 42862                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 42863                                  ;
 42864                                  ; Exit:
 42865                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 42866                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 42867                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 42868                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 42869                                  ;
 42870                                  ; Used:
 42871                                  ;	CX
 42872                                  ;
 42873                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42874                                  
 42875                                  ;struc SearchPair
 42876                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 42877                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 42878                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 42879                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 42880                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 42881                                  ; .size:
 42882                                  ;endstruc
 42883                                  
 42884                                  FindBadCode:
 42885                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 42886                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 42887                                  
 42888                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 42889                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 42890                                  	
 42891                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 42892                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 42893                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 42894                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 42895                                  
 42896                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 42897                                  
 42898                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 42899                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 42900                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 42901                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 42902                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 42903                                  
 42904                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 42905                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 42906                                  
 42907                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 42908                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 42909                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 42910                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 42911                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 42912                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 42913                                  
 42914                                  	clc
 42915                                  	retn
 42916                                  
 42917                                  fbc_error:
 42918                                  	stc
 42919                                  	retn
 42920                                  
 42921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42922                                  ;
 42923                                  ; GenPatch
 42924                                  ;
 42925                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 42926                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 42927                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 42928                                  ; code.
 42929                                  ;
 42930                                  ; Entry:
 42931                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 42932                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 42933                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 42934                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 42935                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 42936                                  ;
 42937                                  ; Exit:
 42938                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 42939                                  ;
 42940                                  ; Used:
 42941                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 42942                                  ;
 42943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42944                                  
 42945                                  GenPatch:
 42946                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 42947                                  
 42948                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 42949                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 42950                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 42951                                  	call	GenJump
 42952                                  
 42953                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 42954                                  
 42955                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 42956                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 42957                                  
 42958                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 42959                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 42960                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 42961                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 42962                                  	retn
 42963                                  
 42964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42965                                  ;
 42966                                  ; CopyPatch
 42967                                  ;
 42968                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 42969                                  ;
 42970                                  ; Entry:
 42971                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 42972                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 42973                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 42974                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 42975                                  ;
 42976                                  ; Exit:
 42977                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 42978                                  ;
 42979                                  ; Used:
 42980                                  ;	SI, Flags
 42981                                  ;
 42982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42983                                  
 42984                                  CopyPatch:
 42985                                  	push	cx
 42986                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 42987                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 42988                                  	cld
 42989                                  	rep movsb
 42990                                  	pop	cx
 42991                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 42992                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 42993                                  	retn
 42994                                  
 42995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42996                                  ;
 42997                                  ; GenJump
 42998                                  ;
 42999                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 43000                                  ;
 43001                                  ; Entry:
 43002                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 43003                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 43004                                  ;
 43005                                  ; Exit:
 43006                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 43007                                  ;
 43008                                  ; Used:
 43009                                  ;	AX
 43010                                  ;
 43011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43012                                  
 43013                                  GenJump:
 43014                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 43015                                  	stosb
 43016                                  
 43017                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 43018                                  	sub	ax,di
 43019                                  	sub	ax,2
 43020                                  
 43021                                  	stosw			; output offset
 43022                                  
 43023                                  	retn
 43024                                  
 43025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43026                                  ;
 43027                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 43028                                  ;
 43029                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 43030                                  ;
 43031                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 43032                                  ;
 43033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43034                                  
 43035                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 43036                                  	mov	di,200h
 43037                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 43038                                  	push	cx
 43039                                  	sub	cx,dx
 43040                                  	inc	cx
 43041                                  scsagain:
 43042                                  	push	si
 43043                                  	push	di
 43044                                  	push	cx
 43045                                  	mov	cx,dx
 43046                                  	rep	cmpsb
 43047                                  	pop	cx
 43048                                  	pop	di
 43049                                  	pop	si
 43050                                  	je	short scsfound
 43051                                  	inc	di
 43052                                  	loop	scsagain
 43053                                  scsfound:
 43054                                  	pop	cx
 43055                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 43056                                  	retn
 43057                                  	
 43058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43059                                  ;
 43060                                  ; VerifyVersion
 43061                                  ;
 43062                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 43063                                  ; from ES:2A.
 43064                                  ;
 43065                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 43066                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 43067                                  ;
 43068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43069                                  
 43070                                  VerifyVersion:
 43071                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 43072                                  					;  in ascii
 43073                                  	mov	bl,10
 43074                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 43075                                  
 43076                                  	call	VVDigit
 43077                                  	jne	short vvexit
 43078                                  	call	VVDigit
 43079                                  	jne	short vvexit
 43080                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 43081                                  	jne	short vvexit
 43082                                  	dec	si
 43083                                  	;call	VVDigit
 43084                                  	; 18/12/2022
 43085                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 43086                                  ;vvexit:
 43087                                  	;retn
 43088                                  VVDigit:
 43089                                  	div	bl
 43090                                  	add	ah,'0'
 43091                                  	dec	si
 43092                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 43093                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 43094                                  	retn
 43095                                  
 43096                                  %endif
 43097                                  
 43098                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 43365                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 43366                                  ;
 43367                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 43368                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 43369                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 43370                                  ; Output		:		
 43371                                  ;
 43372                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 43373                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 43374                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 43375                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 43376                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 43377                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 43378                                  ;		 6. endif
 43379                                  ;	      7. endif
 43380                                  ;	   8. endif
 43381                                  ;	9. endif

 43384                                  ; Uses			: NONE

 43578                                  ;
 43579                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: chk_common_str
 43580                                  ;
 43581                                  ;	Input		: DS = DOSCODE
 43582                                  ;			; ES:DI points to string in packed file
 43583                                  ;
 43584                                  ;	Output		; Z if match else NZ
 43585                                  ;

 43589                                  chk_common_str:
 43590 00007C56 BE[507B]                	mov	si,scan_com
 43591                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 43592                                  	;mov	cx,32
 43593 00007C59 B92000                  	mov	cx,size_scan_com
 43594                                  
 43595 00007C5C F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb	       
 43596                                  
 43597                                  					; M046 - start
 43598                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a 
 43599                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 43600                                  	;
 43601                                  	; 	db  75h, 6Bh		;jne CorruptExe		
 43602                                  	;
 43603                                  	; If the mismatch at this point is due to a 56h instead of 6Bh 
 43604                                  	; we shall try to match the rest of the string
 43605                                  	;
 43606                                  
 43607 00007C5E 7409                    	jz	short ccs_done
 43608 00007C60 26807DFF56              	cmp	byte [es:di-1],56h
 43609 00007C65 7502                    	jnz	short ccs_done
 43610                                  
 43611 00007C67 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb	    
 43612                                  ccs_done:				; M046 - end
 43613 00007C69 C3                      	retn
 43614                                  
 43615                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43616                                  ;
 43617                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 43618                                  ;
 43619                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 43620                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 43621                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 43622                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 43623                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 43624                                  ;
 43625                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 43626                                  ;				NC
 43627                                  ;			  else
 43628                                  ;				CY
 43629                                  ;
 43630                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI
 43631                                  ;
 43632                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43633                                  
 43634                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43635                                  chk_patchsum:
 43636 00007C6A 57                      	push	di
 43637                                  
 43638 00007C6B F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb			   
 43639                                  
 43640 00007C6D 7518                    	jnz	short cp_fail		; Q: does the patch match
 43641                                  					; N: exit
 43642                                  					; Y:	
 43643                                  
 43644                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the 
 43645                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 43646                                  		; unpacking code.
 43647                                  
 43648 00007C6F 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 43649 00007C74 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 43650                                  
 43651 00007C76 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 43652 00007C78 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 43653                                  ep_chksum:
 43654 00007C7A 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 43655 00007C7D 83C702                  	add	di,2
 43656 00007C80 E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 43657                                  
 43658 00007C82 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 43659                                  
 43660 00007C83 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 43661                                  	;jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 43662                                  					; Y: 
 43663                                  	; 25/09/2023
 43664                                  	;clc	
 43665                                  	;retn
 43666 00007C85 74E2                    	je	short ccs_done ; cf=0
 43667                                  	
 43668                                  cp_fail:
 43669 00007C87 F9                      	stc
 43670 00007C88 C3                      	retn
 43671                                  
 43672                                  ; 28/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.1
 43673                                  %if 0
 43674                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 43675                                  
 43676                                  
 43677                                  ; M020 : BEGIN
 43678                                  ;
 43679                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43680                                  ;
 43681                                  ; procedure : RationalPatch
 43682                                  ;
 43683                                  ; A routine (in Ration DOS extender) which is invoked at hardware interrupts
 43684                                  ; clobbers CX register on 286 machines. (123 release 3 uses Rational DOS
 43685                                  ; extender). This routine identifies Buggy Rational EXEs and fixes the bug.
 43686                                  ;
 43687                                  ; THE BUG is in the following code sequence:
 43688                                  ;
 43689                                  ;8b 0e 10 00	mov	cx, ds:[10h]		; delay count
 43690                                  ;90		even				; word align
 43691                                  ;e2 fe		loop	$			; wait		CLOBBERS CX
 43692                                  ;e8 xx xx	call	set_A20			; enable A20
 43693                                  ;
 43694                                  ; This patch routine replaces the mov & the loop with a far call into a
 43695                                  ; routine in DOS data segment which is in low memory (because A20 line
 43696                                  ; is off). The routine (RatBugCode) in DOS data saves & restores CX around
 43697                                  ; a mov & loop.
 43698                                  ;
 43699                                  ; Identification of Buggy Rational EXE
 43700                                  ; ====================================
 43701                                  ;
 43702                                  ; (ALL OFFSETS ARE IN THE PROGRAM SECTION - EXCLUDING THE EXE HEADER)
 43703                                  ;
 43704                                  ; OFFSET				Contains
 43705                                  ; ------				--------
 43706                                  ; 0000h			100 times Version number in binary
 43707                                  ;			bug exists in version 3.48 thru 3.83 (both inclusive)
 43708                                  ;
 43709                                  ; 000ah			the WORDS : 0000h, 0020h, 0000h, 0040h, 0001h
 43710                                  ;
 43711                                  ; 002ah			offset where version number is stored in ASCII
 43712                                  ;				e.g. '3.48A'
 43713                                  ;
 43714                                  ; 0030h			offset of copyright string. Copyright strings either
 43715                                  ;			start with "DOS/16M Copyright...." or
 43716                                  ;			"Copyright.....". The string contains
 43717                                  ;			"Rational Systems, Inc."
 43718                                  ;
 43719                                  ; 0020h			word : Paragraph offset of the buggy code segment
 43720                                  ;				from the program image
 43721                                  ; 0016h			word : size of buggy code segment
 43722                                  ;
 43723                                  ;	Buggy code is definite to start after offset 200h in its segment
 43724                                  ;
 43725                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43726                                  
 43727                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43728                                  ; DOSCODE:B976h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 43729                                  
 43730                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43731                                  ; DOSCODE:B654h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 43732                                  
 43733                                  RScanPattern1:
 43734                                  	db	0, 0, 20h, 0, 0, 0, 40h, 0, 1, 0
 43735                                  
 43736                                  RLen1 equ $ - RScanPattern1
 43737                                  
 43738                                  RScanPattern2:
 43739                                  	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 90h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 43740                                  
 43741                                  RLen2 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 43742                                  
 43743                                  RScanPattern3:
 43744                                  	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 43745                                  
 43746                                  RLen3 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 43747                                  
 43748                                  ; DOSCODE:B98Fh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 43749                                  ; DOSCODE:B66Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 43750                                  
 43751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43752                                  ;
 43753                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 43754                                  ;
 43755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43756                                  
 43757                                  RationalPatch:
 43758                                  	cld
 43759                                  	push	ax
 43760                                  	push	bx
 43761                                  	push	cx
 43762                                  	push	dx
 43763                                  	push	si
 43764                                  	push	di
 43765                                  	push	es
 43766                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 43767                                  	mov	di,0Ah			; look for pat1 at offset 0Ah
 43768                                  	push	cs
 43769                                  	pop	ds
 43770                                  	
 43771                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern1
 43772                                  	;mov	cx,10
 43773                                  	mov	cx,RLen1
 43774                                  	rep	cmpsb			; do we have the pattern ?
 43775                                  	jne	short rpexit
 43776                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]
 43777                                  	cmp	ax,348			; is it a buggy version ?
 43778                                  	jb	short rpexit
 43779                                  	cmp	ax,383			; is it a buggy version
 43780                                  	ja	short rpexit
 43781                                  
 43782                                  	call	VerifyVersion
 43783                                  	jne	short rpexit
 43784                                  
 43785                                  	mov	cx,[es:16h]		; Length of buggy code seg
 43786                                  	sub	cx,200h			; Length we search (we start
 43787                                  					;  at offset 200h)
 43788                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=buggy code segment
 43789                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern2
 43790                                  	;mov	dx,8	
 43791                                  	mov	dx,RLen2
 43792                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq with nop
 43793                                  	jz	short rpfound
 43794                                  
 43795                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern3
 43796                                  	;mov	dx,15
 43797                                  	mov	dx,RLen3
 43798                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq w/o nop
 43799                                  	jnz	short rpexit
 43800                                  
 43801                                  rpfound:
 43802                                  	
 43803                                  ;	we set up a far call into DOS data
 43804                                  ;	dx has the length of the code seq we were searching for
 43805                                  
 43806                                  	mov	al,9Ah			; far call opcode
 43807                                  	stosb
 43808                                  	mov	ax,RatBugCode
 43809                                  	stosw
 43810                                  	mov	ax,ss
 43811                                  	stosw
 43812                                  	mov	cx,dx
 43813                                  	sub	cx,6			; filler (with NOPs)
 43814                                  	mov	al,90h
 43815                                  	rep	stosb
 43816                                  rpexit:
 43817                                  	pop	ds
 43818                                  	pop	es
 43819                                  	pop	di
 43820                                  	pop	si
 43821                                  	pop	dx
 43822                                  	pop	cx
 43823                                  	pop	bx
 43824                                  	pop	ax
 43825                                  	retn
 43826                                  
 43827                                  ; M020 END
 43828                                  
 43829                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43830                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 43831                                  
 43832                                  ; DOSCODE:B6D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 43833                                  
 43834                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43835                                  ;
 43836                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 43837                                  ;
 43838                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 43839                                  ;
 43840                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 43841                                  ;
 43842                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43843                                  
 43844                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 43845                                  	; 17/12/2022
 43846                                  	mov	di,200h
 43847                                  ;ScanCodeSeq_di:
 43848                                  	push	cx
 43849                                  	sub	cx,dx
 43850                                  	inc	cx
 43851                                  	; 17/12/2022
 43852                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 43853                                  	;mov	di,200h
 43854                                  scsagain:
 43855                                  	push	si
 43856                                  	push	di
 43857                                  	push	cx
 43858                                  	mov	cx,dx
 43859                                  	rep	cmpsb
 43860                                  	pop	cx
 43861                                  	pop	di
 43862                                  	pop	si
 43863                                  	je	short scsfound
 43864                                  	inc	di
 43865                                  	loop	scsagain
 43866                                  scsfound:
 43867                                  	pop	cx
 43868                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 43869                                  	retn
 43870                                  
 43871                                  
 43872                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43873                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 43874                                  
 43875                                  ; DOSCODE:B6F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 43876                                  
 43877                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43878                                  ;
 43879                                  ; VerifyVersion
 43880                                  ;
 43881                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 43882                                  ; from ES:2A.
 43883                                  ;
 43884                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 43885                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 43886                                  ;
 43887                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43888                                  
 43889                                  VerifyVersion:
 43890                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 43891                                  					;  in ascii
 43892                                  	mov	bl,10
 43893                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 43894                                  
 43895                                  	call	VVDigit
 43896                                  	jne	short vvexit
 43897                                  	call	VVDigit
 43898                                  	jne	short vvexit
 43899                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.' ; 2Eh
 43900                                  	jne	short vvexit
 43901                                  	dec	si
 43902                                  	;call	VVDigit
 43903                                  	; 18/12/2022
 43904                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 43905                                  ;vvexit:
 43906                                  	;retn
 43907                                  VVDigit:
 43908                                  	div	bl
 43909                                  	add	ah,'0' ; 30h
 43910                                  	dec	si
 43911                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 43912                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 43913                                  	retn
 43914                                  
 43915                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 43916                                  %endif	; 28/12/2022
 43917                                  
 43918                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43919                                  ;
 43920                                  ;	M068
 43921                                  ;
 43922                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: IsCopyProt
 43923                                  ;
 43924                                  ;	Inputs		: DS:100 -> start of com file just read in
 43925                                  ;
 43926                                  ;	Outputs		: sets the A20OFF_COUNT variable to 10 if 
 43927                                  ;			  the program loaded in DS:100 uses a MICROSOFT
 43928                                  ;			  copy protect scheme that relies on the A20 line
 43929                                  ;			  being turned off for it's scheme to work.
 43930                                  ;
 43931                                  ;			  Note: The int 21 function dispatcher will turn 
 43932                                  ;				a20 off, if the A20OFF_COUNT is non-zero 
 43933                                  ;				and dec the A20OFF_COUNT before	iretting 
 43934                                  ;				to the user. 
 43935                                  ;
 43936                                  ;	Uses		: ES, DI, SI, CX
 43937                                  ;
 43938                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43939                                  
 43940                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43941                                  
 43942                                  CPStartOffset	EQU	0175h
 43943                                  CPID1Offset	EQU	011Bh
 43944                                  CPID2Offset	EQU	0173h
 43945                                  CPID3Offset	EQU	0146h
 43946                                  CPID4Offset	EQU	0124h
 43947                                  ID1		EQU	05343h
 43948                                  ID2		EQU	05044h
 43949                                  ID3		EQU	0F413h
 43950                                  ID4		EQU	08000h
 43951                                  
 43952                                  ; DOSCODE:B9FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 43953                                  
 43954                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43955                                  ; DOSCODE:B71Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 43956                                  
 43957                                  CPScanPattern:
 43958 00007C89 89264801                	db	89h,26h,48h,01h		 ; mov [148],sp
 43959 00007C8D 8C0E4C01                	db	8Ch,0Eh,4Ch,01h		 ; mov [14C],cs
 43960 00007C91 C7064A010001            	db	0C7h,06h,4Ah,01h,00h,01h ; mov [14A],100h 
 43961 00007C97 8C0E1301                	db 	8Ch,0Eh,13h,01h		 ; mov [113],cs
 43962 00007C9B B82001                  	db	0B8h,20h,01h		 ; mov ax,120h
 43963 00007C9E BE0001                  	db	0BEh,00h,01h		 ; mov si,100h
 43964                                  
 43965                                  CPSPlen	EQU $ - CPScanPattern
 43966                                  
 43967                                  ; DOSCODE:BA12h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 43968                                  ; DOSCODE:B734h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 43969                                  
 43970                                  IsCopyProt:
 43971 00007CA1 813E1B014353            	cmp	word [CPID1Offset],ID1
 43972 00007CA7 752D                    	jne	short CP_done
 43973                                  
 43974 00007CA9 813E73014450            	cmp	word [CPID2Offset],ID2
 43975 00007CAF 7525                    	jne	short CP_done
 43976                                  
 43977 00007CB1 813E460113F4            	cmp	word [CPID3Offset],ID3
 43978 00007CB7 751D                    	jne	short CP_done
 43979                                  
 43980 00007CB9 813E24010080            	cmp	word [CPID4Offset],ID4
 43981 00007CBF 7515                    	jne	short CP_done
 43982                                  
 43983 00007CC1 0E                      	push	cs
 43984 00007CC2 07                      	pop	es
 43985 00007CC3 BF[897C]                	mov	di,CPScanPattern	; es:di -> Pattern to find
 43986                                  
 43987 00007CC6 BE7501                  	mov	si,CPStartOffset	; ds:si -> possible location 
 43988                                  					; of pattern
 43989                                  
 43990 00007CC9 B91800                  	mov	cx,CPSPlen ; 24		; cx = length of pattern
 43991 00007CCC F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 43992 00007CCE 7506                    	jnz	short CP_done
 43993                                  
 43994 00007CD0 36C606[8500]0A          	mov	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT],0Ah ; M071
 43995                                  CP_done:
 43996 00007CD6 C3                      	retn
 43997

 44906                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44907                                  ;
 44908                                  ;	check_XMM: routine to check presence of XMM driver
 44909                                  ;
 44910                                  ;	Exit:   Sets up the XMM entry point in XMMcontrol in DOSDATA
 44911                                  ;
 44912                                  ;	USED:	none
 44913                                  ;
 44914                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44915                                  
 44916                                  check_XMM: ; proc near
 44917                                  ;
 44918                                  ; determine whether or not an XMM driver is installed
 44919                                  ;
 44920 00007FD2 50                      	push	ax
 44921                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_INSTALL_CHECK
 44922 00007FD3 B80043                  	mov	ax,4300h
 44923 00007FD6 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 44924                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - INSTALLATION CHECK
 44925                                  		; Return: AL = 80h XMS driver installed
 44926                                  		; AL <> 80h no driver
 44927 00007FD8 3C80                    	cmp	al,80h			; Q: installed
 44928 00007FDA 751D                    	jne	short cXMM_no_driver	; N: set error, quit
 44929                                  ;
 44930                                  ; get the XMM control functions entry point, save it, we
 44931                                  ; need to call it later.
 44932                                  ;
 44933 00007FDC 53                      	push	bx
 44934 00007FDD 52                      	push	dx
 44935 00007FDE 1E                      	push	ds
 44936 00007FDF 06                      	push	es
 44937                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_FUNCTION_ADDR
 44938 00007FE0 B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 44939 00007FE3 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 44940                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - GET DRIVER ADDRESS
 44941                                  		; Return: ES:BX -> driver entry point
 44942                                  
 44943 00007FE5 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 44944                                  
 44945 00007FEA 891E[AD11]              	mov	[XMMcontrol],bx
 44946 00007FEE 8C06[AF11]              	mov	[XMMcontrol+2],es
 44947                                  cXMMexit:
 44948 00007FF2 F8                      	clc
 44949 00007FF3 07                      	pop	es
 44950 00007FF4 1F                      	pop	ds
 44951 00007FF5 5A                      	pop	dx
 44952 00007FF6 5B                      	pop	bx
 44953 00007FF7 58                      	pop	ax
 44954 00007FF8 C3                      	retn				; done
 44955                                  ;
 44956                                  ; set carry if XMM driver not present
 44957                                  ;
 44958                                  cXMM_no_driver:
 44959 00007FF9 F9                      	stc
 44960 00007FFA 58                      	pop	ax
 44961 00007FFB C3                      	retn

 44963                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44964                                  ;
 44965                                  ; Procedure Name : seg_reinit
 44966                                  ;
 44967                                  ; Inputs	 : ES has final dos code location
 44968                                  ;		   AX = 0 / 1
 44969                                  ;
 44970                                  ; Outputs	 : Patch in the sharer and other tables with seg in ES
 44971                                  ;		   if AX =0
 44972                                  ;		      if first entry
 44973                                  ;			 patch segment & offset of vectors with stub
 44974                                  ;			 and stub with segment in ES
 44975                                  ;		      else
 44976                                  ;			 patch stub with segment in ES
 44977                                  ;
 44978                                  ;		   else if AX = 1
 44979                                  ;			patch segment of vectors with segment in ES
 44980                                  ;
 44981                                  ; NOTE		 : This routine can be called at most twice!
 44982                                  ;
 44983                                  ; Regs Mod.	 : es, ax, di, cx, bx
 44984                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44985                                  
 44986 00007FFC 00                      num_entry: db	0		; keeps track of the # of times this routine
 44987                                  				; has been called. (0 or 1)
 44988                                  
 44989                                  	; 04/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ref: MSDOS 5.0)
 44990                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BAB7h
 44991                                  	; 25/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ref: MSDOS 6.21)
 44992                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BDA5h
 44993                                  
 44994                                  seg_reinit:	; proc	far
 44995 00007FFD 1E                      	push	ds
 44996                                  
 44997 00007FFE 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 44998                                  
 44999 00008003 E88600                  	call	patch_misc_segments	; patch in segments for sharer and 
 45000                                  					; other tables with seg in ES.
 45001                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45002                                  	; cx = 0
 45003 00008006 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx ; 0
 45004                                  	;cmp	ax,0
 45005 00008008 753D                    	jne	short patch_vec_seg	; patch vectors with segment in es
 45006                                  
 45007                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45008 0000800A 2E380E[FC7F]            	cmp	[cs:num_entry],cl ; 0
 45009                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:num_entry],0	; Q: is it the first call to this
 45010 0000800F 7508                    	jne	short second_entry	; N: just patch the stub with 
 45011                                  					;    segment in ES
 45012                                  					; Y: patch the vectors with stub
 45013 00008011 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 45014 00008013 E83E00                  	call	patch_vec_segments	; patch the segment of vectors
 45015 00008016 E8BD00                  	call	patch_offset		; patch the offsets of vectors 
 45016                                  					; with those in the stub.
 45017                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45018                                  	; cx = 0
 45019                                  second_entry:
 45020 00008019 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es			; patch the stub with segment in es
 45021                                  
 45022                                  	;mov	di,OFFSET DOSDATA:DOSINTTABLE
 45023                                  	;mov	di,1062h	; (same table addr for MSDOS 5.0 and MSDOS 6.21)
 45024 0000801B BF[AC10]                	mov	di,DOSINTTABLE
 45025                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45026                                  	; cx = 0
 45027                                  	;mov	cx,9
 45028 0000801E B109                    	mov	cl,9
 45029 00008020 1E                      	push	ds			
 45030 00008021 07                      	pop	es			; es:di -> DOSINTTABLE
 45031                                  
 45032                                  dosinttabloop:
 45033                                  	;add	di,2
 45034                                  	; 19/06/2023
 45035 00008022 47                      	inc	di
 45036 00008023 47                      	inc	di
 45037 00008024 AB                      	stosw
 45038 00008025 E2FB                    	loop	dosinttabloop	
 45039                                  
 45040                                  ; For ROMDOS, this routine will only be called when the DOS wants to
 45041                                  ; use the HMA, so we don't want to check CS
 45042                                  
 45043                                  ;ifndef ROMDOS
 45044 00008027 3D00F0                  	cmp	ax,0F000h		; Q: is the DOS running in the HMA
 45045 0000802A 7220                    	jb	short sr_done		; N: done
 45046                                  ;endif
 45047 0000802C E8A3FF                  	call	check_XMM		; Y: set up the XMS entry point

 45049                                  					; A20 toggling in the stub.
